The bright sunlight told him that his struggles had only begun.

He was tossed onto the ground, where he could only weakly bring himself up. As he brought himself up, he was greeted by...
02113121212.title: only minutes had passed, the pigs 'play'...

choices: The pigs kiss with Simba stuck in the middle
She puts on a show just for Zeus
021131212121.content:
"Zeus was right, you are fun to play with." Hera said with a big grin on her face.

Simba was still shaken by the savage treatment she had given him. Mashed around in her fatty rolls and drenched in stinking pig sweat. The cub had to fight the urge to gag, but thankfully Hera was there to make him forget all about it. She'd already lined herself up for her next move and quickly informed the lion of her intent. She opened her cavernous maw wide, letting a wave of horrid pig breath wash over him. She licked her chops and moved forward. The cub took a shaky step back but he knew there was nowhere to run in this small pen. Her tongue flew forward, trying to lick him but the lion dodged out of the way. She was not deterred so easily and approached him again, this time opening her maw even wider before craning her neck forward and trying to swallow everything in front of her.

He tried to backpedal further, but the reach of her slavering maw caught up with him. Her lips met around his midsection, leaving his butt and legs hanging outside her maw. Inside she set about thoroughly licking and suckling on her prize. She left Simba's lower body dangling outside so Zeus could see the helpless cub flinch and twitch whenever her tongue got rough with him. Wrapping around his neck and squeezing or trying to pry open that cute little muzzle. When the lion started to fight back too much for her taste she would violently swing her head from side to side, thrashing the cub. Zeus looked at the sadistic display with an amorous spark in his eye. This was the sow he fell in love with so long ago and seeing her 'play' with the cub made him feel those same butterflies in his substantial belly. Hera noticed his almost drooling gaze and knew what to do.

How does she involve him in the action?
021131212121.title: ...Hera's face

0211312121211.content:
The cub's world shifted as he was pushed aside by Hera's large tongue. He found himself pinned between two rows of dull molars. The sow had no interest in biting down, but she needed the little lion out of the way as she tried to speak to her lover.

"Look at you, feeling all left out. Come on, there's enough me to go around. Let's show that little brat what love truly feels like."

Zeus didn't need to be told twice. He happily hoisted his bulk towards his mate and prepared for their little game. Simba was pushed back into his original position. The tightly closed lips of the sow made it impossible to see outside, but the warm breath of the hog was all he needed to quiver like a reed. He knew the mammoth pig was close by and soon he made himself known.

The huge maw opened and Simba saw the first bit of light in a long time. He screamed in terror as the very first thing he saw outside of his saliva-soaked prison was Zeus' quickly approaching open mouth. The two pigs locked lips, sealing the cub completely in their powerful kiss. The cavernous wet hell had doubled in size and neither pig wasted a moment to showcase to the little lion all the ways in which he'd be involved in their romantic antics. Their strong tongues pushed, pulled and threw the cub around. their gullets rumbled menacingly down the back of their throats, a dire warning for any cub who would prove too disobedient.

Simba had little he could do as both pigs had their way with him. They kissed with a fiery commitment to involve the cub in as many team actions as possible. They began to bat the cub back and forth with their slobbery tongue. Soon more intimate actions followed. The cub winced in disgust as the felt the rough, slimy surface drag itself along his buttcrack or past his sheath. Next they began coiling around his body, squeezing him and seeking to get him to open his mouth. The little lion's maw was the grand prize. Without saying a word they agreed that whoever got their tongue down the cub's throat was the winner.

His fight was valiant, but the large pigs simply outlasted him. Finally, when the cub was too tired to fight of the large tongues it was Hera's who found its way in. She immediately pushed it in as far as she could, driving it far down his throat and threatening to suffocate him. Not wishing any major harm on the little lion yet, she withdrew just as quickly, leaving the cub gasping for air. Not even the foul stench in the cavernous maw could stop him from sucking down as much oxygen as possible. Finally their lips parted and the bruised cub was allowed to flop on to the floor in a puddle of pig drool. Hera looked down at him with disdain, but Zeus had all but stopped paying attention to the cub. His focus was on the sow of his dreams. When she looked him in the eye it was clear to the both of them that there was no other way. It was time to make some epic love. What role will Simba play in this?
0211312121211.title: The pigs kiss with Simba stuck in the middle

choices: Cody rushes in and knocks him over
Cody simply turns around and sits on Simba
022.content:
Sim a took his place in the corner, staring at the barn door. He felt through his paws massive trembles, as something was walking out of the barn. The doors opened to reveal a massive creature. Simba could hardly recognize it, it looked like a zebra but instead and black and white strips it was completely black and much larger.

"And introducing, the Crushing Clydesdale, the Horrible Horse, the Boundaries Butt Basher! It's Cody!" The vulture announced, the crowd cheering wildly as the horse snorted before walking into the middle, leaving a trail of huge hoofsteps in the mud.

The horse looked down at Simba, who gave the lion cub an evil look, making Simba shiver a bit in fright.

"I'm gonna enjoying squashing you under my rear." He said in a deep, booming voice. He soon backed up as the vulture hit the bell above the barn, starting the fight.
022.title: Cody

choices: The horse keeps tormenting Simba with his ass.
The horse keeps gassing the cub!
The horse gets back up, letting the cub slip back out!
0223.content:
The lion cub decided to stay in place and looks over the massive horse, deciding what he should do next. Just then the horse turns around and moves his tail to expose his muscular ass...The lion sat there in shock. He has seen the backsides of the zebras, but this one has to be the biggest equine rear has seen so far...before the lion could ponder much else, the horse suddenly sits down hard on the lion, making a loud "SPLAT" noise with the mud.

Thankfully, the cub is unharmed...for now. The cub sees himself stuck between the stallion's butt cheeks, erfing as it reeks heavily under the horse's tail. The horse would wiggle his rear, trapping the cub further in between his butt cheeks. Just then, a low rumbling is heard before the horse grunts, letting out a deep fart over the cub. Simba would gag heavily as the fumes lingered around him under the horse's butt...
0223.title: Cody simply turns around and sits on Simba!!!

choices: Cody lets Simba recover so he can torment him more
Cody shows no mercy and crushes the cub unconscious
02231.content:
With the lion gagging and coughing between his cheeks Cody offers him a glimpse of mercy. He lifts her enormous equine rear and allows the cub to see daylight once more. But the horse had far more painful plans for the little lion. Plans he would put into effect in short order. The was as simple as it was savage. He swayed his butt a little to the side. Above the cub now hovered nothing but a vast expanse of horse buttcheek. No crack to slip into this time. It would be the full weight of his rear atop the little lion. The horse practically felt himself go hard at the mere idea. He'd give the lion a few more seconds to work out his impending doom, smiling with glee.

Simba stared up at the unmoving surface of the horse's buttcheek. It was dirty and muddy, the short hairs matted together a little mirroring his own fur. He slowly recovered from the gassy assault he'd endured wedged between those cheeks. It was only when the large surface began to lower that he panicked. With a loud scream he tried to race away, but Cody's butt smashed down upon him, flattening him completely beneath it's immense bulk. In a flash the flabby cheek had enveloped the little lion, the horse whinnying with joy. He felt the pathetic subdued wiggles tickling him and gave the cub the attention he so craved. Slowly and cruelly he dragged his ass from side to side, heavily grinding the cub against the hard floor of the arena. The muffled screaming informed him he was doing well.

With his opponent thoroughly dominated the horse faced a difficult decision. Crush the cub unconscious now or let him out to recover. He had so many more things he wanted to do with this strange little creature. But he could do all of that after claiming him too. Cody milled it over whilst grinding the cub beneath his butt some more. Finally he made up his mind.
02231.title: The horse keeps tormenting Simba with his ass.

choices: Betty casually trots towards Simba, licking her chops
Simba struggles through the mud to attack Betty
Betty taunts the lion, letting him take a free hit
023.content:
The cub didn't expect the thick mud to be this much of a hassle. It slowed him down considerably and carried a faint earthen stink. With some effort he'd reached his corner, but he could only hope his opponent would be bogged down as much as him. If not this fight might have been decided long before it started.

"Laaaadies and geeeentlemen, tonight's show has got a new challenger! For the distant lands of Africa, our very first lion, Simba!" The crowd reaction was a mix between cheering and laughter at the cub's struggles with the muddy arena floor. The cub was feeling a little heartened by the folks cheering for him. He didn't receive much outside of laughter anymore at home. Hopefully he could keep the crowd on his side for a while out here.

"In the other corner... The Big Bovine... The Eater of Everything... The Monstrous Maw... Our very own... Betty!" The cub's confidence was shaken. He had no idea what kind of animal he was about to face, but the announcer made it sound like a huge evil predator. What kind of predators would this farm setting even have? He'd seen some cats earlier, but those were smaller than him even when fully grown. Maybe it was a dog? Those looked pretty scary, or at least some of them did. A bigger question popped into his mind. Where was his opponent? Nobody in the crowd seemed worried. Was his opponent so small he couldn't see it?

Suddenly a bunny charges into the arena. The thick slop quickly catches him and within a few hops he's hopelessly stuck. This was the Monstrous Maw? Simba felt like he was being tricked by the announcer. Slowly walking after the fleeing bunny was a creature he'd seen on the farm already. It looked slow and dull-witted. The cub was reminded of the wildebeest at home, but lacking the horns and coated in a bright black and white fur coat. The crowd erupted in applause. Was this slovenly beast his adversary? The bunny seemed to believe so, as it started loudly begging for his life. "No, Betty, don't! Please, I beg you don't eat me! Noooooo..."

The cow resolutely ignored the little critter's pleading and opened her maw wide. Simba was horrified at the spectacle unfolding. Betty's large tongue tasted the bunny before wrapping around his midsection and hoisting him out of the mud. With ease she pulled her prey into her large maw and stood tall. A loud gulp sealed the deal as a squirming bulge traveled down her neck. What kind of psychotic horror show did Timon sign him up for. The crowd was on their feet, cheering at full volume for the show Betty was giving.

Suddenly the cow began to heave, a distinct bulge rising up her neck again. With a loud cough she spat out the bunny again. His fear for the cow seemed to have evaporated. He stood on his hind legs and took a bow. The bunny patted the cow on the snout and hopped out of the ring. Betty stepped forward, her large frame completely unimpeded by the mud. With heavy steps she hoofed it to her corner. Simba begins to realize the bunny was all part of her entrance. It sure as hell left an impression on him. Was this cow going to do the same to him, minus the releasing? With trembling limbs he looked to his opponent. Her size alone would make defeating Betty damn near impossible. Her head was practically the size of his whole body and her own large mass could match a wildebeest and then some. Whatever she was eating, she ate a lot of it.

The announcer spoke to the two wrestlers directly. "Alright you two, the rules are simple. No blood, No eating your opponents and winner gets to claim the loser! Now get ready!" No eating, well that was a relief. But what did he mean by claiming the loser? Simba wasn't given any more time for questions. A loud horn signaled the start of the fight.
023.title: Betty

0231.content:
While Simba struggled to pull himself, Betty trotted along like she was in her element. She moved with sheer ease, and, to Simba's horror, she licked her lips. This prompted Simba to try harder to escape. He pulled one way and another, but Betty was already upon him. She leaned down, and grinned at the fearful lion, before opening up her salivating maw.

"NO!" Simba shouted out before she wrapped her lips around his head. He tried to wrench himself out, desperately trying to pry his head out from between her lips. But she kept her grip. Just to add to the torment, she licked at his face as if he were a candy in her maw. He sputtered and shook about harder than before. After much struggling...
0231.title: Betty casually trots towards Simba, licking her...

choices: she slurps the rest of him into her maw
She spits him out and squashes him
02312.content:
The cow's strong tongue slaps wetly against the struggling cub's head. It snakes past his cheek and coils around his neck. Simba would be impressed by the agility of this tongue if Betty wasn't currently using it to choke him. With a firm grip established the hungry bovine lifts her head. The little lion feels his body get pulled free from the thick mud, dangling from the cow's lips. He thrashes and swings his body around but the lethargic movements of his tormentor were unaffected.

The smiling cow stood tall facing the crowd, showing them the trapped cub. They knew what this cow was capable of and held their applause in baited breath. She rolled her large eyes, knowing what she was expected to do. But the struggling cub was so much fun to play with. Maybe she could entertain the crowd a little like that. Her domination of the lion was a certainty already. She had every advantage and soon the little opponent would be too dizzy to react. He felt her large head rear into motion. She swayed it to the left, then the right. Faster and faster the evil cow shook her head, tossing the cub's body back and forth. Simba felt a little queasy, but the constricting tongue left little room for anything other than panicked gasping. She violently thrashed the cub around, earning her the much-beloved applause she sought after.

When the cow was done Simba hung limply bar for a few twitches. He'd learned not to fight her lest she shakes him up again. Betty is pleased to see Simba knows who's in charge in this fight. Now the dominant cow had a lion to break in. How does she do this?
02312.title: ...Betty keeps up the tongue torment

choices: Betty licks him like a piece of candy
Betty keeps smothering him in saliva
Betty slurps up that rabbit to tag team Simba
023121.content:
Betty grinned at Simba's sudden limpness. She knew she had her little morsel right where she wanted him, and he knew it as well. She unclenched her tongue, only to loudly slurp up Simba. The crowd laughed as the lion disappeared into her maw like he was a simple noodle strand. Soon, his tail disappeared past her lips, and the little cat found himself surrounded by darkness, and hot breath. He knew she couldn't swallow him, but he knew she could do a lot to him in this position.

Already, the ground underneath him began to shift as her tongue stirred. He groaned as he felt her tongue slide up his belly and flick up his face. He turned around and tried to push himself through her lips. He managed to get his face out, much to Betty's annoyance.

"Help me!" Simba shouted. Unfortunately, that was all he was able to shout out. And his plead was met with laughter. Meanwhile, Betty's tongue curled around his tail, and pulled him back, trapping him in darkness. Then, presumably to punish him for that outburst, she dunked him snout first into a pool of saliva under her tongue. He groaned out in disgust at the initial slam.
023121.title: she slurps the rest of him into her maw

choices: She squashes Simba into the mud with a heavy hoof.
She turns around and sits on the cub.
0231211.content:
The muscular cow tongue was having a field day with its little prey. The cub was practically swimming in its undulating grasp, waves of cow slobber washing over him. The flexible tongue licked every part of the tasty lion. It poked and prodded at every available orifice, prying its way into Simba's nose and rear. Betty seemed almost fanatical in her devotion to suckling every last part of the lion. Her tongue kept getting ever more aggressive, shoving him around. Eventually it wrapped itself around the little lion and squeezed.

Simba yelped in shock. The cow's agile tongue was crushing him like a powerful snake. How did she even do this? More importantly, with her tongue all around him, how would he get out of this position, let alone defeat her. So far he'd spent most of the match either stuck in the mud or stuck in her maw. His uncommon flavour was intoxicating. Betty knew she had to do everything in her considerable power to win this. Many an idea sprung to mind on what to do once she'd claimed her prize. But as she was getting carried away with her fantasies the tongue loosened. The cub didn't know why she relented, but he took the opportunity and dashed forward. He shot past her slobbery lips and fell flat into the mud. The fresh air was welcome, but he had to face the facts. He was seconds from being slurped back in and tormented again.

The cow, annoyed that her inattentiveness had cost her a tasty lion, was looking to spice this fight up. She would taste him again, but first there was the matter of humiliating him into submission. How does Betty approach this?
0231211.title: Betty licks him like a piece of candy

02312112.content:
"Well that settles it, little one. You are far too tasty to be allowed to walk away. Let's just get this over with. Surrender."

Still shaken from his adventures inside her maw, the cub didn't hear what the cow said. He looks up to her and offers a shaking "What?" His dazed state annoys Betty to no end. She wanted him to give up so she could start putting all her delightful ideas into motion. Fine, if he wasn't going to play ball, she'd make sure he'd be too flattened to keep fighting. With an angry huff she turned around, further confusing the cub. He was left staring at her ass, hovering high above him on a pair of strong hind legs. Whatever she had in mind, the cub knew sitting around and letting her do it would not be good for his chances in this farce of a fight. He trudges through the thick mud, away from the cow, but he was far too slow. He didn't even notice her sliding those hind legs forward, letting that distant butt crash down with meteoric speed.

It smashed into the mud with a great big splat, showering half the audience with the sloppy dirt. They burst into applause. Less so because of their sudden mud bath but more because they saw and heard the lion. He howled in pain, buried up to his neck beneath that vast butt. Betty grimaced too. Slamming herself down on the ground like that stung a little. But listening to the squashed lion's agony made it so very worth it. If he wouldn't surrender to her she'd mash him into submission. The cruel cow began to shuffle back and forth, grinding her overwhelming weight on the cub. Her thoughts turned to fantasies once again. Maybe she could play with him a little using her backside. Squeeze him into her buttcrack or cram him into her pucker. No, something that tasty could only go into her through the front door, where she could savour that taste again. Maybe she could give him the full tour of her insides. He'd probably survive that, right? The cow was shaken out of it by the loud voice of the ref. Simba had stopped screaming and looked about ready to die under her. She quickly got up, freeing the cub from his heavy prison.

He was alive, but couldn't even muster the strength to stand on his legs anymore. It was clear as day that this fight was over. The ref quickly flew in to make things official.

"Simba cannot fight any further. Your winner is Betty!"

The cub wanted to protest, but he couldn't kid himself. He wasn't even able to stand. This fight had been a complete joke from the start and the punchline was her being allowed to claim him now. Hearing her moan whenever her tongue was wrapped around his body told him enough about what would happen next. He didn't even hear the ref ask her if she wanted to claim him as her prize.

"Oh yes please. I claim this tasty morsel."

Normally she'd carry off her prey in her maw and wait until she's at least out of the ring, but the temptation was just too high. She looks at the crowd and asks with her sweetest voice.

"Should I swallow him here?" The first members of the crowd were ready to leave but they froze upon hearing that question. Looks like this fight might get an encore. Their response is every bit as unsurprising as she'd expected.
02312112.title: She turns around and sits on the cub.

choices: She spits him back out to taste him some more
She keeps him safely in her belly for the night
023121121.content:
The cow smiled, hearing the crowd demand in unison that she swallow Simba right away. The ref sighed a little and flew away. The fight was over, the cub was hers to do with as she pleased. Normally she'd have the decorum to at least wait until she's out of his ring. But with such an exotic guest fighter he couldn't blame the cow for not wanting to wait. He flew into the barn to set up tomorrow's fight.

Betty was alone with Simba, who still couldn't even manage to stand up. She licked her chops in an exaggerated fashion, spooking the cub with the loud slurping and licking noises. They both knew this couldn't go any other way, but she was adamant in milking this moment for all it's worth. Her maw was drooling like crazy, leaving a trail behind as she leaned down to inspect her meal.

The little lion grunted, tapping into whatever strength was still left in him. Suddenly he felt himself get on his feet. Unfortunately it was all too clear where this sudden surge of power came from, as he felt the moist tongue under his belly lifting him up. It wrapped all the way around his midsection, savouring the taste of his bruised body. The subtle hint of cow butt added to his flavour. Her tongue withdrew and he flopped right back down again. Betty could not contain herself any longer. The looming maw opened wide and descended on the cub's hindquarters.

She took his hind legs and most of his lower body into her large mouth in one go. Her tongue coiled itself around his legs and she lifted the cub for all to see. With practiced patience she pulled him inside, loudly slurping as he slipped past those slobbering lips millimeter by millimeter. She was working her hardest to draw out the moment. He barely had it in him to struggle and scream, but when the probing tongue slipped past his butthole adrenaline began to rush through him. Betty saw the cub liven up when she did that and she knew how to get a show out of him. Her tongue returned, this time probing inside a little. It was enough for him to start fighting for his life, hurling abuse and trying to swat at the huge bovine's head. None of it did anything as she suckled unabated, pulling him into her maw.

With the cub in her maw she played around with him some more. Simba was drenched in cow slobber and thrown around the inside of her mouth. Her strong tongue kept him in check at all times. But the cow had waited long enough to do this. With a playful flick of the tongue he was pushed further back than ever before. Her gullet was hungering for him, opening a little to showcase the dark abyss with his name on it. The lion fought for his life but another push put his lower half firmly in the tight grip of Betty's throat. She parted her jaws wide to show the cub's predicament to the audience. They applauded wildly, finding ways to increase the volume with every little gulp sucking more of the cub down her neck.

With most of him in her gullet the cow could not hold herself back. Her instincts took over and a loud gulp made the lion disappear with a last terrified scream. The crowd got on their feet and gave her a standing ovation whilst the cub was reduced to a weakly squirming bulge traveling down her neck. It quickly entered her body, leaving no visible impression of her meal. With tears of joy she stood before the elated crowd, happy to have given such an amazing performance in the ring and even happier to be able to conclude it like this. When the applause finally simmered down she thanked everyone for coming to the show and walked to the barn she lived in.
023121121.title: Yes! Swallow him!

choices: She wants him to replace the bunny for a few weeks
She wants him to experience a full tour of her body
0231211212.content:
Simba's final moments in the ring were filled with sheer terror. The strong grasp of Betty's gullet overpowering him and one final gulp sending him to his doom. The passage around him was unbelievably cramped, squeezing him along the slimy length with some difficulty. Gradually it widened until he slipped past a narrow sphincter into a pool of mush. It smelled atrocious and he screamed loudly inside the spacious chamber of Betty's stomach. The cow was well on her way to her barn when she noticed the cub's protests. With a dismissive tone she chided the little lion.

"Quiet down you. I can't digest you in there. I'm a herbivore, I eat plants and grass and stuff." Simba had a hard time believing the cow. She was much too fond of his taste for her to no be eating meat. "I mean, maybe if I leave you in there for days but otherwise you'll be just fine. And you better learn to live with that fact because you're not coming out until tomorrow."

Conflict beset his little lion mind. She was going to keep him in this sweltering pit of gunk for a whole night? That was horrid, far beneath his princely stature. But what was that about coming out? Was he going to avoid death by cow belly? Many questions swarmed him, but the cow was silent. Perhaps a subtle hint that she wanted to sleep and the cub was keeping her awake with his incessant babbling. Betty was contemplating coughing up the lion and giving him some painfully heavy cow discipline. But before she got any madder, she heard the cub inside her belly.

"Okay, good night miss Betty." Whatever Simba's plan might be, pretending to be friendly could only help his position. The cow smiled and laid down, preparing herself for the night. Inside of her the cub was shaken about by the sudden change in movement. The thick goop present in the cow's stomach washed over him when she laid on her side. He coughed a little and tried to make the best out of this bad situation. He shoved together the clumps of half-digested grass into a makeshift bed and tried to get some sleep inside the noisy cavern. All around him was the symphony of Betty's body. The dripping of stomach juices, the low thump of her heart and the gentle churning of the stomach itself. The background track to his slow and inevitable demise maybe, but for now he'd be safe from digestion if the cow was to be believed.

With little other choice the lion settles down and attempts some form of sleep. To his great fortune Betty was a heavy sleeper, nearly unshakable in her position. It afforded Simba the calm he sought to catch a few hours of sleep himself. A real blessing, he thought. The cub knew well that whatever this day held, it probably wouldn't be pleasant. He shuddered at the not insignificant chance the cow might eat him up again at the end of tomorrow, even if just for safekeeping. She felt damn near orgasmic pleasure swallowing him, there's no way she wouldn't try that again.

The next morning Simba awoke to great tumult. Everything was shaking and sloshing around him. He could barely grasp which way was up or down. Loud heaving could be heard and suddenly he was pushed into a familiar sphincter. Slowly he slithered back up along her neck until Bessy finally coughed up the cub, looking triumphantly.

"Good morning little guy. You look good for someone who's been in my belly for hours."

"I guess..." He said, unsure of where the cow wanted to go with her statement."

After an awkwardly silent moment the cub spoke up. "So, now what? You're just gonna keep eating me?"

"Not quite..." The cow answered cryptically.

What did Betty have in mind for Simba?
0231211212.title: She keeps him safely in her belly for the night

choices: It's time for Betty's next match
Betty plays with her new Simba toy
02312112121.content:
"I want you to help me with my act."

Simba raised an eyebrow. What did she mean with act? Betty saw his confused stare and sighed.

"Do you remember the bunny I ate right at the start of our match? It's a classic part of my entrance before every fight. I swallow someone up and spit em back out to show what part of me is the most dangerous." The cub silently nodded. He had firsthand experience of the horrors that huge maw could inflict. He became a little fearful of what she might ask next.

"Well, that bunny has been helping me for months now and I think he's earned a vacation. But I still need something or someone to eat before the match starts. That's where you come in. For the next two weeks, I want you to take the bunny's place. You just run away in panic, get stuck in the mud and beg loudly before I swallow you. Do this for me and in two weeks I'll let you go."

The little lion was not a fan of her idea. Getting swallowed probably daily did not rank high on the list, but he thought for a moment about the alternatives. Betty wasn't just going to let him walk if he refused and whatever plans she had for him in that even likely involved swallowing him too. If he accepted her proposal he could at least gain a tenuous amount of leverage. With the bunny away she would rely on him for her entrance. If she mistreated him outside the ring he could threaten to mess up her entrance. His logic sounded ironclad.

"Okay, that sounds... fair enough I guess."

"Thank you so much, Duster will be delighted to hear this."

"Duster?"

"The bunny."

"Ah. Out of curiosity, what would've happened if I said no?"

"Well, I'd eat you. No points for guessing there. Though afterwards I'd probably push you all the way through my digestive system and let you simmer in my rectum for a bit to smell my farts. That or I'd just digest you."

The cub gulped. He didn't want to be known as the lion that met his end in the stomach of a cow of all creatures. One last important question still burned in his mind. He was worried asking it may land him in some trouble, but he couldn't live in uncertainty.

"Betty, what are you going to do to me outside of the matches?"

The cow laughed, making the little lion shudder in fear. She looked down with those big piercing eyes and smiled. Her large tongue probed outward and licked her chops. She leant in extra close until her large muzzle hovered just beside his ear. With a low tone in her voice she whispered ominously:

"Whatever I damn well please, my little lion toy."
02312112121.title: She wants him to replace the bunny for a few weeks

choices: Yes, he makes a run for it
023121121211.content:

“Well, they take care of you, don’t they?” She asked. “Doesn’t that make them family?”

“I take care of myself,” Simba said, bitterly. Vixen frowned at his tone.

“Well, then, who taught you how to take care of yourself?” She asked, and Simba remained silent. “As I thought. Remember, prince, there’s a lot you don’t know about this world. It’s okay to be dependent on, and learn from, other people.”

“Wait… how do you know I was a prince?” Simba asked.

She smiled sagely. “I know lots of things,” she said, vaguely. Before Simba could respond, she continued. “Well, here we are. This is where you’ll be staying for a while.” Simba looked around, only to realize how far they had travelled from the arena. He had only been distracted for a few minutes, and it seems the reindeer had somehow travelled dozens of miles! The same thing happened when Timon and Pumbaa were bringing him to this place. Something strange was going on here, but Simba couldn’t quite figure out what. Besides that, the place Vixen seemed to be referring to was a small, cramped cave in the side of a cliff, just a few meters away from the bitter ocean.

“What… is this?” Simba asked. “What lesson is this going to teach me?”

“I -- and a few others -- am going to be teaching you how to survive out here, in the cold,” Vixen explained. “You’re out of your element, so you’ll need the help and guidance of others to survive… which means you’ll need to leave your ego at the door.” Simba shivered. Even though it was July, the unrelenting cold of Antarctica was already getting to him. How long was she planning on keeping him here? Did he really need to go through all this just to learn his lesson? “But you don’t have to worry about that, right now. You just need to get some rest. I’ll keep you warm,” Vixen promised. She set Simba down on the floor of the empty, seemingly desolate cave, letting the exhausted lion find a comfortable spot to relax.

When Simba laid down, the huge reindeer curled up all around him, her warm body and thick fur keeping him surprisingly comfy and warm. “Good night, little lion,” she said as she snuggled in around him, letting him use her soft belly like a pillow. Despite his worries, Simba found himself falling to sleep in a matter of minutes...
035221.title: Learning His Lesson

04.content:
Now Simba knew why they insisted on blindfolding him for the entire journey.

âWhat the hell?â the lion stuttered as his eyes adjusted to the light. He had never seen anything like this place before. Before now, the pride rock was the biggest thing heâd ever seen; but here, huge mountains touched the sky all around him, leaving him in awe of their grandeur. Trees of all shapes and sizes heâd never seen before stretched out every horizon, and it seemed almost greener than the jungle was. âHow far have we been walking?â

âOh. Just about eight thousand miles or so,â Timon said matter-of-factly, not even bothering to look up from his makeshift map as he led the trio along the mountainous paths.

âWhat?â Simba balked. âItâs been, like, three hours!â

âI know, right? What a workout!â Pumbaa smiled, stomping his hooves on the dusty forested ground, as if this was the most normal thing in the world. Simba stared at his companions, wondering if they were messing with him. It was, of course, impossible that theyâd travelled that distanceâ¦ but Simba certainly didnât recognize any part of this place, so he was definitely outside of Africa, at least. Scaling the sheer mountain, they came across an old building with a strange gazebo with two curved roofs ▼
https://www.writing.com/main/redirect.ph...
, with looked like it had been abandoned by humans long ago. As they walked towards the entrance, Simba gawked at all the animals that were loitering in the grass around the gazebo. He thought he had seen every animal there was to see back in the pridelands, but there were many here he simply didnât recognize. Were those the other contestants? They looked terrifying! Standing in the strange structure, looking down almost meditatively on the landscape below, was a black-necked crane; a species that looked comfortably similar to a few birds Simba knew back home. âHello? Madame?â Pumbaa said, proudly pushing Simba forward. âWeâve got a prime contestant here! A verifiable African prince!â

Simba shivered as the bird loomed over him, eyeing the lion. âOoh! How exotic!â she said optimistically, in an accent Simba had never heard before. He felt humiliated as the bird sized him up. âHmmâ¦ apparently lions are a little smaller than I thought theyâd be,â she confessed, sounding a little disappointed. Before Simba could retort, she continued. âNo matter! If the legends Iâve heard were true, a lion will fit in quite nicely here! How much do you want for him?â

Simba looked up at her, confused. He wasnât some servant to be bought and sold! âWhat is that supposed to me-â Simba starts to say, but Timon interrupts him.

âErr, we can talk business later, madame,â the meerkat says, wrapping an arm around the birdâs âshoulderâ. âIn meantime, why donât we get our friend here accustomed with his opponents, yeah?â

âWhy of course! Right this way, little lion,â the black-necked crane led Simba away, and although he followed obediently, he was starting to regret coming here. There was something Pumbaa and Timon werenât telling him. Eventually, the crane paraded him out in front of all the other animals. âDÃ jiÄ, dÃ jiÄ! Say hello to our new contestant!â the crane yelled, introducing him, and the little lion cub shrunk beneath the stares of the huge animals. To his surprise, his introduction was met with a chorus of laughter, although the crane seemed unphased. He backed away, intimidated by the crowd, but the crane pushed him forward. âGo on, donât be shy. Make a friend!â With that, she retreated back in the gazebo, presumably to discuss âbusinessâ with Timon and Pumbaa. Whatever that meansâ¦

Now all alone, the shy lion looked among the crowd of contestants, desperate to find somebody that can tell him what was going on around here. Eventually, he lays eyes on...

Chu-Lin, a Giant Panda who enjoys lazily crushing his opponents beneath his flab. He's currently munching on some leaves, completely apathetic to the lion.

Zhulong, a monocled cobra who likes to immobilize his opponents with his strong tail, allowing them to do whatever he wants to them. He might even gulp them down if they're small enough. He's currently snoozing up in a tree.

BÃ¡i HÇ, a South China tiger who's the most veteran contestant in this coliseum. She's been here for so long, humiliating her opponents has gotten boring; still, she knows hundreds of tricks to please a crowd. She's currently relaxing in one of the hot springs.

Wu Fu, an anthropomorphic greater flying fox who loves coming up with creative ways to humiliate her enemies while flying through the air. She's currently signing autographs for a few of her fans.
04.title: Hot Spring Showdown in East Asia

042.content:
Having recently emerged victorious from the coliseum, Zhulong was lazily twist around in the branches of a dove tree. As the only snake in the coliseum, he had a fearsome reputation for how easily he could immobilize his opponents with his tail, and how sadistic he was with his powerless quarry. He smiled a bit from his perch in his tree, his serpentine dual shafts already half-erect as he reminisced about his matches. Just earlier today he was holding a corsac fox tightly in his coils, thrusting into both of her holes while she moaned helplessly before the audience, before he topped it off by swallowing her whole. It was all in good fun, of course; the two of them were good friends, and he let her out unharmed afterwards, but still, the feeling of power over his opponents was always intoxicating. Even after all that, he was feeling strangely unsatisfied today, like he needed something more. He doubted anyone would challenge him today, though, after a match like that. As if on cue, he heard an unfamiliar voice calling to him from the bottom of the tree. “Shéi jiào wǒ qǐlái?” the serpent asked, only to slowly lull his head out of the tree and find himself staring face-to-face with an african lion. That was about the last thing he expected to see today…

“What?” the lion asked, uncomprehending.

Zhulong sighed. “Far from home?” the serpent assumed in that same unfamiliar accent, and the lion nodded. “You’re in the motuo county, little lion. China.”

“China?” the lion gasped, baffled. Even though the snake was corroborating Timon and Pumbaa’s story, it just didn’t seem possible. He didn’t know much about the world outside of Africa, but he did know that China was supposed to be pretty far away. “How did I get to China?”

Zhulong titled his head, in the closest equivalent to a shrug a serpent can muster, lacking shoulders. “Don’t ask me,” he said, still not fully understand why this tiny lion had decided to bother him, of all people. “Is there something you wanted? A fight?”

Simba stared at him, momentarily confused. “A fight?”

“Sorry. I assumed you wanted to be broken in,” Zhulong said, seeing his mistake, and lifting his head back into the trees.

“Wait!” Simba yells, and the snake groans and looks back at him, lazily. “What do you mean by ‘broken in’?”

“You’re new blood, aren’t you? If you want animals around here to accept you, you have to show what you can do in the coliseum,” Zhulong explained, begrudgingly. Simba considers it silently for a few seconds. Compared to all the other animals here, the snake didn’t seem that scary. Back in the pridelands, snakes were a relatively easy form of prey; just had to step on their tails just below the neck, so they couldn’t bite you. How hard could it be?

“Maybe… you could show me to the coliseum…?” Simba asks, and the serpent grimaces. He was about to turn the lion down, but… he was feeling up for round two. Zhulong prefered female opponents most of the time, but the lion did look small enough to swallow down for a while. Male or female, once they were in his belly, they all felt the same.

“Alright. I’ll get you started,” Zhulong agreed, sliding down the tree before the little lion. Seeing the huge snake’s full length, Simba was starting to regret his decision, but it was too late now. The coliseum was already being prepped for a...
042.title: The Snake

043.content:
Scars.

Scars ran up and down the tiger’s body. Each one had a story. She had been fighting all around Asia for so long, she had more stories than she could ever tell, even if she tried. The calming waters of the hot springs were all that soothed the scars the Bái Hǔ had acquired. She was a tough old feline, though quite bitter and cynical in her age; though she was popular, none of her fans ever dared approach her. Other than the occasional fool who challenged her in the arena in the pursuit of personal glory, nobody ever really talked to the huge tiger, and that was fine by her. She just wanted to be left alone. Ironically, it was because of her experience and lack of empathy that she was so popular in the coliseum. She always knew exactly what would please the crowd the most, and humiliated her opponents without any regard for their safety. Sometimes she'd devour them, or crush them, or smother them... whatever the audience demanded. She didn’t particularly enjoy it, of course, but she had to make a living somehow, and this was the only thing she was really good at. Just as she got comfortable in the hot springs, Bái Hǔ heard another set of small paws entering the water. She grimaced quietly, praying that the visitor wasn’t going to bother her with some inane gibberish. Unfortunately for her, he did.

“Uh… hello?” Simba said, nervously, sitting across the spring from the huge, quiet tiger. “Everybody says that you know a lot about this place…” The tiger didn’t open her eyes, not yet acknowledging his presence. “Think you could help me out? I’m a little lost…” Simba laughed nervously, but the tiger remained completely silent. The lion was quiet for a while, unsure of whether Bái Hǔ was simply sleeping or ignoring him, but he grew impatient quickly. “Uh, hey. I’m talking here!” Simba said, a little louder, trying to get her attention as she sat there motionless, hoping he would go away. “Miss? Can you hear me?” Eventually Simba was certain that the tiger was just completely ignoring. Offended, he started pushing at her side, forcing her to notice him. “Hey! I’m talking to you! Don’t just ignore me!” Eventually, the tiger’s resolve hit its breaking point. Her paw suddenly reached up, and dunked Simba’s head beneath the hot springs with terrifying force. She held him under the hot waters for a long time, until she finally relented, allowing the lion to come up for air just before he passed out.

When Simba’s head emerged from the water again, he found himself face-to-face with Bái Hǔ, who looked frustrated. “What. Do. You. Want,” she said, slowly. Unlike the other animals, this tiger didn’t seem at all phased by the presence of a lion. She must have seen crazier things in her time. Still coughing up water, Simba was equally angry, confused and frightened by the sudden act.

“You - crazy - bitch...” Simba said, being interrupted intermittently by his coughs. “I just wanted help!” Bái Hǔ stared at him, her expression unreadable. Was this the new blood, she wondered? If so, the bratty little lion was definitely going to be a thorn in her side for as long as he stuck around. She should get rid of him quickly. She hadn’t been in the actual coliseum in a while, and people have been begging her to give them another show; perhaps this was the prime opportunity. After all, once they were in the coliseum, she could do whatever she wanted to him, and she doubted that he could fight back. Just as Simba got his bearings, the tiger grabbed him by the scruff of his neck, hoisting him out of the hot spring as if he was one of her own cubs. “H-hey! What are you doing?”

“Teaching you a lesson,” she said, her booming, deep voice almost stunning Simba into silence. Despite all the complaining and wriggling of the cub, the tiger was able to carry him easily down the hill to the coliseum. They had arrived just in the nick of time, as the coordinators were preparing a...
043.title: The Tiger

044.content:
âYÄ«gÃ¨ jiÄ yÄ«gÃ¨! QÇng!â Wu fu was surrounded by cats and otters who had come all the way from Heilongjiang just to see the arena. While she wasnât the most popular contestant in the coliseum, she was known as one of the most amicable, and she loved interacting with fans. The visitors handed over leaves and scraps of paper for autographs, and Wu Fu took to scribbling as simple a âäºè â she could muster onto every one of them. Her fun-loving nature in the ring presided over her competitiveness, but being an anthro, her dexterity gave her an edge against her opponents. Her ability to fly helped as well, of course; she loved to grab her opponents and lift them high into the air, only letting them come down if they promised to do whatever she wanted. Simba came to her partially because she looked nice, but mostly out of curiosityâs sake. Heâd never seen an anthro before. With all the humans gone, anthropomorphic animals were the closest thing they had left. Her bipedal form was strange to the lion, with sylphlike legs and torso dominated by her large breasts, which were prominent on her chest for all to see. âNÇ shÃ¬ fÄnsÄ«?â she asked him, while he was distracted staring at her bust.

He shook his head, knocking himself out of his stupor. All the other animals had dispersed, satisfied, leaving Wu Fu alone with the lion. "W-what?â Simba asked, confused. The bat woman giggled.

âAre you a fan?â she clarified. âYou must have come a very long way to get here. Iâve never seen anything like you before.â Before he could reply, the bat lifted him up gently by the scruff of his back. She cradled the small lion gently, holding him comfortably against her soft breasts. âIâve got to admit, Iâve seen a lot of animals, but you are. The. CUTEST little critter Iâve ever seen!â She rocked him back and forth slightly, in a slightly emasculating way, but Simba was too comfortable to resist. âWhere did you come from?â

âA far, far way from here,â Simba answered. This, at least, he knew for certain. âButâ¦ my friends sort of dumped me here. I was kind of hoping for somebody to show me aroundâ¦â

â... oh! Youâre not a fan, are you? Youâre a competitor,â Wu Fu realized. Simba didnât really know either way, so he just took the batâs word for it. He was too busy relaxing in the womanâs arms to think too much about his situation. âWell, welcome then! Allow me to show you around!â She continued holding the lazy, half-asleep lion in her arms as she walked around the coliseum grounds, introducing him to other competitors and pointing out buildings of interest. Finally, she showed the lion a structure that looked like it had been built into the jungle long ago ▼
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736...
. It was obviously built by humans, but after being abandoned, had been decorated by the bat. âThis is my home. You can rest here if youâd like, while you get settled in,â she offered, and the lion nodded lazily. However, Simba was starting to get worried. How long was he supposed to stay here? He thought heâd only stick around for one match! But before he could ask, she moved on to the main course; the huge stadium that towered over everything else on the mountain. âAnd that right there is the coliseum. Want to take a look inside? There might be a match going on.â

The famous âcoliseumâ everybodyâs been talking about. The arena Simba may or may not have travelled halfway across the world for. If he wanted answers, thatâs where heâd find them. âAlright, letâs take a look,â the lion agreed.

Inside, spectators were cheering in anticipation for a...
044.title: The Bat

choices: She lifted him up in the air
She came crashing down on top of him
0441.content:
Being competitors, the two of them were allowed into a free side entrance near the bottom of the building. After walking through darkness for a while, Simba emerged to see a large stone arena with animals watching from stands all around ▼
http://lh6.ggpht.com/-pzem1ZdhgY0/UYC4jU...
. The two of them emerged just in time to see a leopard fighting against a wolf in the middle of the coliseum. Wu Fu sat Simba down on the bench beside her as they watched. Simba had to admit, it was cool to see the two animals fight. Both of them were jumping around, batting eachother with their paws in devastating displays of might. Eventually, though, the two competitors had gotten even more close-quarters, as they grappled with eachother on the ground. In fact, the way they had started wrestling seemed kind ofâ¦ strange. âWhoo! Get him, Liling!â Wu Fu called out, temporarily soothing Simbaâs concerns. They both looked like they were trying to overpower the other, but eventually, the leopardess emerged on top.

The leopard had the wolf pinned under her, in a veryâ¦ unorthodox hold, it seems. Honestly, it didnât seem like it would be that difficult to push her off, but the wolf didnât seem to be resisting much. Waitâ¦ what was she doing? On closer inspection, Simba realized that leopard was definitely riding that wolf dick right in front of the cheering crowd. It was hard to make out any details from this distance, but their movements made it clear. The wolf tried half-heartedly to push her off, but even in the heat of battle, he couldnât help but give in to the pleasure. The audience erupts into giggles and laughter as the wolf leans back and pants, letting the leopard dominate him however she wanted. Simba was horrified by the sudden display, but couldnât bring himself to look away; he had never seen anything like this before! âWhat the hell kind of coliseum is this?â Simba exclaimed, but his question was drowned out by the cheering of the crowd. After a long while, the leopard finally let out a ear-shattering roar as she climaxed right in the middle of the coliseum floor, before rolling off the unmoving wolf, satisfied.

âI think we have our winner, ladies and gentleman,â the crane announced. The leopard paraded around the coliseum, still panting, while basking in the adoration of the crowd, while the wolf lied motionless and defeated, his half-erect shaft hanging in the air, still dripping. He wasnât injured; he was simply too exhausted to continue. The rest of the audience seemed unphased by this -- in fact, they loved it! The mood in the crowd seemed jovial, with animals laughing and telling jokes while they watched the incident occurring below. âChoose your reward, Liling. Claim money, food, shelterâ¦ or your opponent.â The leopard seemed to consider this for a while, before getting a devious look on her face.

âI think Iâll be taking this poor fella here home,â the leopardess smirked, lifting the wolf up onto her back, who didnât even bother to resist. Simba watched with horror as the leopard trotted off with the helpless wolf, heading away to do god-knows-what to him. Once she disappeared out of sight, Simba turned back to the crowd, still shivering. Somebody else must have realized how bizarre that was, right? That was practically rape! To his astonishment, everybody else seemed to be acting like this was completely normal. Even Wu Fu, the seemingly normal woman, was amused by the events.

This trip to the coliseum had definitely left Simba with more questions than answers. This place, and all the animals in it, were insane. Simba had to get out of here as fast as he could.

To his horror, the crane happened to notice the two of them. âOh! And what do we have here?â she smiled. âLooks like our newest contestant is eager to fight! A little lion, coming all the way from Africa, just to be here at the coliseum! What dedication, am I right?â She rung a loud bell, announcing a new match. âCome on out, little guy. Donât be shy!â

The audience cheered loudly, hoping to coax the lion to come out onto the battlefield. âUh oh. Looks like Madame Wenqing wants us onstage,â Wu Fu frowns, immediately standing up to heed the call. However, Simba lingered behind, terrified at the prospect of entering the coliseum proper. The bat gives him a little smile, bending down and petting him for a while to try and offer some reassurance. âDonât worry, little lion. Iâll go super easy on you.â She convinced Simba to reluctantly walk onstage. The cheering of the audience hurt Simbaâs ears as he emerged into the coliseum, and he whimpered when he saw dozens of eyes on him, perversely waiting for a âshowâ. Wu Fu took her position on one side of the arena, and Simba nervously stood on the opposite side.

âReady?â the announcer called, before ringing the bell once again, presumably to signal the beginning of the battle. The cheering of the audience was deafening. âFight!â Before Simba could even get his bearings, Wu Fu had taken to the air, her huge wings splitting the evening sky as she soared above him. Simba could only watch, and pray that she kept her promise to go easy on him...
0441.title: 1v1 with Wu Fu

045.content:
Those contestants are all a little too large and intimidating for Simba’s liking. He looks around for smaller opponents…

Tiān Māo, a Eurasian lynx that prioritizes putting on a show over actually fighting, and who enjoys being dominated by larger opponents. Still, she’s not afraid to turn the tables on them if she gets the opportunity. She’s currently flirting with an uninterested wolf.

Shanhao, a steppe polecat who likes to embarrass his opponents in submission with creative tactics, up to and including worming his way into their various orifices to humiliate them from the inside. He is currently helping set up the coliseum.
045.title: Somebody else

0451.content:
Tiān Māo leaned against the side of the much larger, muscular gray wolf, who seemed to be doing his best to ignore her presence. She’s been trying to get have some fun with him for so long, but he’s got sort of a warrior monk thing going on. Maybe she can at least get him to ‘humiliate’ her in the coliseum. “Kàn kàn zhège dà láng. Yěxǔ nǐ kěyǐ duìdài wǒ…” She slinked between his legs, rubbing her soft fur along his underbelly as she walked, imagining the powerful wolf mounting her then and there while all the other contestants watched. Instead, however, he simply shoved her aside, having been bothered by the annoying lynx dozens of times before. “Nǐ hěn wúliáo…” she pouted. While some other contestants have grown tired of the coliseum after a few years, Tiān Māo has wholly enjoyed her ‘experiences’. She almost never wins, of course, but she enjoys being humiliated in front of an audience in any way her opponent desires. The coliseum doesn’t have to be so serious all the time, after all! Doesn’t seem like anybody’s biting today, though. Looks like she might have to go talk to Chu-Lin. She really doesn’t like that guy, but a dick’s a dick…

Just as she was about to give up, a new contestant she had never seen before poked her in the side. She turned, stunned, only to find herself looking eye-to-eye with an african lion! A very small lion, sure, but still, very exciting! “Uh, hey. Excuse me, miss...” Simba asked, glad to be able to talk to somebody roughly his size, though the lynx was still a few inches larger. “I kinda got ditched here, and I’m sort of lost.”

Before he knew it, the lynx was clutching the lion to her chest. “Oh, oh, oh, you poor little thing!” Simba was a bit surprised by the sudden close contact, but the lynx seemed to mean well. “Don’t worry, little lion, I’ll show you around. Where do you come from?”

“Uh, Kenya,” Simba replied.

“How exotic!” Tiān Māo smiled. “I’m sure you must have so many exciting tales!”

“Actually, I do,” Simba said, thinking back on the events that brought him to Timon and Pumbaa in the first place.

“Grand, then! Make sure to tell me all about them tonight, okay?” Tiān Māo said, as she started walking, leading the small lion on a tour through the area.

“Tonight?” Simba asked.

“Oh, we are going to be busy all day getting you settled in!” Tiān Māo said. “But tonight, we can just relax and cuddle under the stars. Doesn’t that sound nice?” Simba was a bit taken aback by this, but figured the lynx was just being friendly. She slightly reminded him of some of the lionesses back in the pride lands. “That right there is Madame Wenqing’s building. You can talk to her sometimes if you need anything, but never interrupt her meditation,” the lynx explained, passing by the strange gazebo from before. She led Simba up the mountain path, where he first noticed a huge, strange circular building. “And that, my friend, is the coliseum! A whole arena built out of an old chuxi. That’s where all the magic happens… and where new competitors prove themselves…” she smiled, stopping and allowed Simba to gaze upon it in all its wonder. Seeing that she has his attention, the sly lynx took the opportunity to lure the lion inside. “In fact, maybe we could fight it out a bit. See what you’re made of, you know?”

Simba smiled. Being only a little big taller than him, the lynx seemed like the perfect opponent for his first match. That was actually the reason he talked to her in the first place. “Of course we can!” Simba replied.

“Perfect. Now, being a big, strong lion, I’m sure you could beat me in a heartbeat,” Tiān Māo complimented, even though the lion obviously had no fighting experience. “But I’m sure you’ll go easy on me, right?” This inflated the egotistical lion’s confidence instantly, and before he knew it, the two of them were standing at the entrance to the coliseum. The lynx smirked as she led him inside. The poor little lion had no idea what he was getting himself into…

Inside, animals were busy at working preparing for a...
0451.title: The Lynx

choices: She turns around and sits on him
She wraps her maw around his head
04513.content:
By chance, the organizers had already been preparing for a rare 2v2 match, and they’ve been looking for another 2 competitors before they could start the match. “Oh! Looks like we’re going to be fighting in the same team!” The lynx smiled as she led the lion down the exclusive passageway to the coliseum. “What luck!”

“What do you mean, same team?” He asked. He was excited at first, but the more he thought about it, this might actually turn out to be bad news. “Who are we fighting, then?”

“I don’t know yet. I guess that’s part of the surprise,” she shrugged, hurrying as they approached the arena. “This first match shows off what kind of competitor you’re going to be, so be sure to make a good first impression!” She yelled over her shoulder. “How much do you know about fighting?”

“A little bit,” Simba replied, though the lynx was already too far ahead to hear him. His father had trained him in combat daily, preparing him for the throne; however, the lion had no actual experience in battle. He wasn’t particularly worried, however. Lions were just strong, naturally, right? He’d never seen any animal take down a lion before, after all.

“Jīntiān shì tèbié de! Liǎng duì jiāng jìngzhēng!” The announcer yelled as the two of them stepped into the coliseum, Simba feeling deafened by the cheering of the audience. “Simba hé Tiān Māo xiāngduì Liling hé Bào!” Simba’s heart sunk a little in his chest as he saw what the two of them were up again. A female clouded leopard and a male gray wolf sat on the other end of the coliseum, impatiently awaiting their opponents. These two looked tough; he was sure they weren’t going to go easy on him. Simba was starting to have second thoughts, but he couldn’t back out now. It’s not like there was any chance they’d hurt him for real… right? “Zhǔnbèi?” The announcer called, which the uncomprehending lion mostly tuned out. “Dòuzhēng!”

12332111232.content:
Luna was confused, but if a veteran fighter like Shenzi wanted her to, that's what she would do.

All she really understood were the words gas and farts. She knew Shenzi wanted her to show off the power of her ass, and it could certainly deliver a powerful blast when she wanted it to. Luna focused and prepared, she let the muscles of her cheeks relax slightly.

Shenzi and Simba heard a gurgling sound from above them and started to panic. The hyena shoved the cub forward, hoping to block the brunt of the blast, but as Luna's anus opened, its sheer size let Shenzi know her attempt was hopeless.

Luna unleashed massively loud and powerful fart that nearly deafened the referee. The force of the blast sent Shenzi flying out, tumbling into the corner of the ring. Unfortunately for the prince, he was positioned too deep and the hyena blocked his exit. As the fart ended, Simba found himself still trapped between the elephant's massive cheeks.

Somehow, Shenzi was still conscious as Luna scampered up to her, eager for an evaluation.

"How was that? I have no idea why you'd want me to fart when you were point blank, or why you would go diving in yourself, but...." Luna started enthusiastically. But Shenzi cut her off.

"Why I would WANT THAT?" the hyena seethed. She then unleashed a stream of curse words not fit for a Disney character to know, directing them at Luna.

But this was not an elephant that was in a mood to be bullied.

"Ahem," Luna cleared her throat, interrupting Shenzi and cutting off her rant by wrapping the hyena up in her own massive trunk.

"I think you're forgetting your place," she said sternly. "You were just deep between my ass. You just got farted out. I'd be very happy to reunite you with your lion friend if you want..." Luna threatened.

Shenzi recovered from the impact, scrabbling to get on her feet and out of that corner. Luna was already moving in for her next move. The hyena feared the elephant might try to take over her bout, but she didn't expect her to rise to the occasion so quickly. She'd barely made it back on her feet when the immense grey form of Luna's butt hovered over her. With a terrified squeak the hyena made a run for it, but the huge ass came down fast. When she felt the coarse skin brush against her back she knew she had failed to escape. In a split second it was all over for her.

BOOM!

The ring shook with the heavy butt slam Luna had delivered. She felt the struggling form of the hyena try to break free, but against the huge mass of her backside there was no hope. She had buried Shenzi up to her neck under an avalanche of ass. The slam was so powerful even the little cub felt it. He was shaken loose, shifting a bit further away from the gassy pucker but still thoroughly trapped between those huge cheeks. The elephant could not have aimed her attack better. With Shenzi's face still free she had a front row seat to the hyena's screams of pain and pleas for mercy. She lifted her huge elephantine ass just a little, making breathing merely difficult for the hyena instead of impossible.

"Please, let me go. We're supposed to put that little brat in his place! We should aaaaAAAAH!" Shenzi was interrupted by the elephant putting her weight back onto her back. When she had screamed all the air out of her lungs, Luna coldly replied.

"I am putting a little brat in their place, two of them even." The crowd hollered and cheered. They didn't care if this was all planned beforehand or just pure happenstance, they loved the drama unfolding in the ring.

Cruelly the elephant let Shenzi waste a few more lungfuls of air with meaningless pleas before crushing her flat again. The constant shifting of her rear over the struggling hyena caused the cub the be ground between the rough surfaces of her cheeks. Luna almost completely forgot about him and soon enough he began to emerge from his prison. A few more shuffles and he was freed. But the heavy grinding had taken its toll on him, not to mention the monstrous point blank fart from a few minutes ago. He took a few steps, coughing loudly before his wobbling legs gave out.

The ref flew in and commanded the elephant to get off Shenzi. He ordered them both to opposite corners of the ring and attempted to regain some control of the match. He grabbed the cub and held him high for all to see.

"Simba can no longer fight in this match. He will be the prize for the winner of this bout. On top of the usual rules of course. Wrestlers, prepare yourself."

Shenzi was visibly nervous at the prospect of fighting an elephant. Her back still ached from their last scuffle and Luna wasn't going to go easy on her. But with a moment of recovery she could focus all her energy on taking that newbie elephant down a peg. With a vicious scowl she looked at her adversary, still starstruck that this is really happening. She should never have invited that damn Luna into the ring. The hyena huffed at the amount of work she now had to do to get her grimy paws on that little lion.

The bell sounded and the two cautiously approached eachother. Luna had the wits not to charge in blindly. She knew her opponent had experience fighting in this ring. She might be up several tonnes of weight, but she couldn't afford to get sloppy. Shenzi, grateful for the moment of calm before the storm, offered the elephant a deal.

"If you take a dive, I'll give you the lion after the match."

Luna responded with an icy tone. "Why should I settle for just one toy?"

Who emerges victorious to claim both the lion and the loser?

1233211123222.content:
Shenzi wracked her brain to come up with a strategy that would allow her to defeat Luna. With her size, strength, and sheer mass, there was no way she could physically beat the elephant. She'd have to out smart her. Get her disqualified.

Oh no...

The hyena didn't like the plan that was coming together in her mind, but it was the only thing that seemed to give her a prayer of coming out victorious. Assuming she "came out" at all of course. Luna was clearly already very mad, both from Simba's attempted retreat and then from the hyena's own sharp response. If Shenzi could capitalize on that anger, she could get Luna to go a little too far and break the rules of the match. It would get the elephant disqualified and get Shenzi a nice, large new pet to boss around. She'd rule the pack with Luna by her side and at her command!

Shenzi swallowed hard.She knew exactly what this meant. But she was in this for the long game. Luna could win the battle, the hyena would have the war.

"Fine, you don't want to take my deal?" Shenzi hollered at Luna, "Just remember I was generous when I own you after this is over with," she growled.

"After this is over, you'll see just how generous I am. With my gas," Luna retorted with a snarl.

The two continued to slowly circle each other. Shenzi had to ramp it up.

"I never should have even offered you the chance to come in the ring. All you do is take up space and muck things up. I'm sure you'll be right at home with me in the graveyard though. Plenty of space for you there with the other deadbeat elephants," she snarled.

Luna paused for a moment, "Graveyard?"

"That's my home tubby. I gotta say, you elephants take up a lot less space without all that flesh. No need to worry about turning around and getting accidentally sat on or shoved up someone's ass,"

Luna was fuming. The elephant graveyard was not something to be disrespected. "Oh don't you worry hun, there will be nothing accidental about it where I'm going to shove you," she seethed, charging at the hyena.

But Shenzi was too quick for Luna and easily evaded her attack.

"Ha, too slow moron. You really think you can catch me? I spend all day sliding up and down rib cages twice your size," she laughed.

Luna had no response but to reverse course and charge at the hyena again with a growl.

The crowd was fully behind Luna at this point, cheering her on against the bullying tactics of the hyena. They booed as Shenzi dodged once again.

"You're nothing but a coward, just like the lion," Luna growled.

"I'm nothing like the lion. But we both know you wouldn't have even caught him if it weren't for my help! What are you even doing in this ring? Go back to the crowd where you belong!" Shenzi continued to taunt Luna.

"Where I belong? I'll show you where you belong!" Luna howled.

Shenzi smiled, she had the elephant right where she wanted her. The hyena intentionally started her dodge too early and Luna easily caught her in her trunk. The elephant held the hyena to her face and squeezed.

"Now I've got you. No more running little pup," Luna taunted.

"Is...that all you've...got?" Shenzi taunted back through strained breath. "I've gotten a better squeeze from the bones in my bed!" she cackled.

Luna's eyes narrowed.

"How's this for a squeeze?" she asked. Luna carried Shenzi over to the corner of the ring and started to climb. The tree strained beneath her weight, but held. Luna wasn't a gifted climber, but she had a very specific goal in mind. The hyena swallowed hard as the elephant savored the fear in Shenzi's eyes. Upon reaching the highest part of the tree, Luna reached back and parted her cheeks with her hands. With a devious smile that mixed anger and hunger, the elephant slammed Shenzi to the mat. The hyena quickly composed herself, selling the pain as best she could as she stumbled to her feet. If she remained on her back, she'd be squashed flat and lose.

Luna didn't so much leap backwards as she allowed herself to fall backwards, her exposed crack aimed squarely at the hyena. The crowd gasped and then erupted into a loud cheer when she made impact. The elephant moaned in pleasure as she felt Shenzi's body rocket up her back door. The hyena had braced herself for this impact, but had to complete her plan.

"How's that for a tight space pup?" Luna laughed as she bounced in place.

A look of confusion registered on the elephant's face as she felt something she didn't expect. Shenzi was squirming, but not for escape like she expected. She was moving...deeper?

Oh no.

The elephant stood up quickly and exposed her cheeks to attempt to pry Shenzi out, but she was too late. Shenzi had pulled every last hair of her tail into Luna's ass and the elephant's pucker was sealed tight. The audience groaned as Luna realized she had fallen right into Shenzi's trap.

The ref flew in and evaluated the scene. "No full insertion Luna! Disqualification! Shenzi is the winner!" he declared.

If Luna was angry before, she was furious now. And she had Shenzi perfectly positioned to pay for it.

"Let her out Luna," the ref demanded.

Does Luna listen?
1233211123222.title: Brain Over Brawn...Butt At What Cost?

12332111232221.content:

"We'll see about that." The ref replied sternly. "First, get her out!"

"I'm trying, I'm trying!" Luna yelped, her voice increasingly emotional. "But she's not stopped, she's trying to stay in. I'm pushing as hard as I can." 1233211123222111.content:
As Shenzi tiptoes her way out of recovery, it's not hard to find Luna. The elephant is still trumpeting in anger loudly. The hyena makes her way to her former opponent. She quickly speaks before Luna can attack.

"Hold on Luna, I know you're pissed and you have a right to be. But hear me out," Shenzi asked hesitantly.

Luna's eyes narrowed and she crossed her arms, but she didn't leap at the hyena, so Shenzi continued.

"First, I didn't mean any of those things I said in the ring, I just had to get in your head to get the DQ. You're an amazing competitor, especially since this was your first match right out of the crowd. And I don't even live in the Elephant Graveyard, we left that neighborhood for Pride Rock."

Luna seemed unmoved, but Shenzi continued.

"Just come back to Pride Rock with me as my backup. After we're done, if you want, you can come right back here to the ring. I'll even endorse you to be a regular. But I have a feeling you might want to stick around for a while. How would you feel about squashing another lion?" Shenzi asked with a devious smile on her face.

At the sound of the opportunity to squash another so-called king, Luna finally cracked a smile.

"Besides, give me some credit here, you put me through hell to get that DQ win. I felt like I was in your ass forever!" Shenzi responds with a smile of her own.

Luna took two big steps toward the hyena. "If I don't like what I see at Pride Rock, you really will be in my ass forever. But you've got a deal Shenzi." Luna said in a threatening agreement.

Shenzi swallowed hard and clenched her cheeks over her other prize as if he was a furry little stress ball.

__________________________________

During the long walk back to Pride Rock, Shenzi and Luna had a chance to talk strategy. They both knew exactly what to expect when they arrived. Even so, Luna was surprised by the sheer number of hyenas surrounding the rock. Even she couldn't take down that many at once.

"Don't worry about it kid," Shenzi whispered as they walked through the crowd, "The pack won't touch you when you're with me. Just walk confident and be your usual, tough self," the hyena said with a smile.

As they approached the throne, where Scar was lazily sprawled across the seat, they paused. A murmur crossed the crowed on sight of Shenzi, who had been gone for a while. Stirring, Scar sat up and growled at his lackey.

"Shenzi! Where in the lion's mane have you been!" he seethed. "And who is this?!" The old lion stood up and began to circle the hyena, as the rest of his hyena henchmen started to chuckle in anticipation of what was coming.

"Scar, this is Luna. Luna, this is Scar. He's the lion I was telling you about earlier," Shenzi said with a smile.

"You dare address me by name! I am King Scar! And you should both be on you knee-----ULP!" Scar began, before finding his scrawny body wrapped up tightly in Luna's massive trunk.

Like she had with Simba earlier, Luna lifted Scar high into the air and slammed him to the unforgiving surface of Pride Rock. The lion stirred, he was a great deal tougher than the cub, but Luna wasn't close to finished yet. The enormous elephant reared back on her hind legs and delivered a devastatingly painful stomp to Scar's smaller, frail body. She wasn't satisfied with just one.

STOMP!

STOMP!

STOMP!

Shenzi kept her head on a swivel to ward off any hyenas or lions who might attempt to interfere and save Scar, but laughed to herself as she noticed a look of approval appearing on their faces. They were enjoying this almost as much as Luna was!

With a final loud stomp, Luna stepped back and revealed a paper thin Scar. He looked like he could be a throw rug. But the duo wasn't quite done.

"Hey Luna, how about we see that full moon again?" Shenzi said with a laugh.

Smiling back, Luna used a wall to support herself as she parted her huge cheeks. Shenzi grabbed the devastated Scar by the scruff of his neck. He was too battered to resist, but he saw what was coming and whimpered.

"You should have been a better king," she whispered to him before running straight toward the elephant.

Shenzi was very careful about her footing this time, and when she released her hold on the lion, she breathed a sigh of relief when she didn't follow him herself. Her aim was true and she laughed heartily when she saw Luna's massive cheeks close over Scar's thin body.

"Phew, we had quite a walk didn't we Luna? Why don't you take a rest?" Shenzi says with a smile. Luna nods and smiles in return before plopping down onto her ass in a seated position. Her smile grows broader as she feels Scar get pushed in deeper.
