1233211123222111.title: Truce? Truce

12332111232221111.content:
The strategy discussion between Shenzi and Luna wasn't the only conversation that took place on the long walk back to Pride Rock.

----Quick Flash Back---

Shenzi pulled the squashed cub from between her cheeks and ducked him in cold water until he coughed himself awake. She needed him awake and aware for this conversation.

"Listen Prince," Shenzi seethed, "Luna and I have a plan that's going to finally rid us of your evil uncle. The one who, by the way, killed your dad."

Simba's eyes shot wide open at this revelation, but he didn't get the opportunity to ask any questions.

"So seeing as how we're pretty much going to avenge your dad for you, once it's done, there's something you need to do for me. Keep in mind, you're technically my property and if you disobey, Luna and I won't have a problem putting on a repeat performance from the wrestling ring. Get it?"

Simba nodded meekly as Shenzi explained exactly what she expected.

---End Flash Back---

Shenzi and Luna bathed in the glorious round of cheers from the crowd of lions and hyenas, finally united in something. But Shenzi had further plans to reveal.

Her hand moved quickly to her ass and revealed Simba. The sight of the prince, who many thought was dead, silenced the cheers and drew a loud unified gasp. It wasn't just the sight of Simba, but where he had been. The gasp started to transition into an uneasy murmuring amongst the lions in the crowd. That was Simba's cue.

With a gasp, Simba spoke the words he was given earlier.

"Th.....thank you Shenzi. You kept me safe from my Uncle Scar. If you hadn't hidden me, he likely would have killed me. Just like he did my father. All he wanted was the throne."

The murmuring died down at Simba's words. The crowd remained silence as the cub continued to speak.

"Citizens of Pride Rock, I realize that I am the rightful and true King. However, I am unfit. I ran. I abandoned you. I was unable to protect my father and I would have been unable to protect myself from my uncle. I would be unable to protect you. I relinquish my crown and give it to someone who I have seen to be a true protector. And someone who has shown she can unite lion and hyena alike - Shenzi. All that I ask is that you continue to protect me as you have today....my Queen," he said, bowing to the hyena before placing himself in a prone position on the large throne. The crowd was shocked, but bowed to Shenzi as well in acceptance of Simba's words.

Shenzi put on the acting performance of her life demonstrating shock and humility in accepting the crown. She smiled as she stood above the throne and Simba's small head. She casually caressed her large ass and smiled at Luna, still enjoying her seat on top of Scar.

"Don't worry Simba, I'll make sure you always stay safe," before plopping down hard and enjoying the feeling of his head sinking deep between her cheeks.

Shenzi would enjoy a long, prosperous reign as queen of the Pride lands. She maintained balance between the hyenas and lions and learned not to repeat the actions of the power hungry Scar. It helped that she could always call on her elephant friend Luna for backup as needed.

Simba remained obedient, but was never truly able to grow beyond the size of a cub. It's difficult for a body to mature and grow while living a life trapped between a larger creature's soft ass cheeks. He grew to, if not enjoy his place, to accept it.

It was said that the queen rarely moved from her seat on the throne, but was in constant motion, shifting and grinding in place and always had a smile on her face.

Miles away from Pride Rock, a meerkat and warthog happily munched away on bugs, rarely giving a second thought to the lion friend they met in passing. Hakuna Matata.
12332111232221111.title: Queen Shenzi

12332111232221113.content:
As the cheers subsided, the crowd of lions and hyenas looked on in awe at Luna, who still sat firmly planted on top of Scar, enjoying his weak squirms from deep between her sweaty ass cheeks. She smiled in silence for a few moments basking in her victory as Shenzi looked on in approval. Her job wasn't quite done though. There was one final piece of her agreement with the hyena that Luna had to honor before being granted her freedom.

The massive elephant clenched her cheeks and stood, leaving no sign of the thin, one time king trapped between her cheeks. With a smile, she slowly approached Shenzi. The crowd grew hushed in anticipation, unsure of her intention. Even Shenzi swallowed hard, hoping Luna would honor the terms of their truce.

After a long, pregnant pause, Luna dropped to her knees and bowed before Shenzi.

"For you my Queen," she said, loud enough for the crowd to hear.

There was a murmuring amongst the crowd, but eventually, they all followed suit. One by one, every lion and hyena bowed to Shenzi as well. The hyena stood tall, knowing that her plan had worked and that the throne was hers alone. She slowly walked over to the stone throne that Scar had recently been sprawled across and plopped down hard with a broad smile. She felt Simba get pushed deeper into her ass as she sat and her eyes fell on the remainder of the royal family, bowing along with the rest of the crowd. She couldn't help but to laugh to herself.

A smiling Shenzi handed a crumpled, roughly written document to Luna and called her former partners in crime – Banzai and Ed – over to her. They were the only two who could possibly know of Simba’s continued survival.

“I want you two to accompany Luna back home. Make sure no harm comes to her,” she commanded with a knowing smirk.

Ed smiled ignorantly while Banzai swallowed hard, looking up at the elephant who had made quick work of Scar. She needed their protection? But he wasn’t in much of a position to argue with the new queen. So the trio walked off.

Luna walked along at a slow pace, swinging her hips from side to side. The hyenas had to be constantly aware of her massive ass as she wasn’t taking much care to avoid smacking them with it as she walked. She was enjoying the sensation of Scar’s squashed body too much to care. Despite his defeat, every few steps he would squirm and try an escape, sending shivers of pleasure down her spine. Once, he dared to unsheathe his claws and slash at the elephant’s massive rump. It didn’t exactly draw his desired response. The sharp, sudden impact on her sensitive flesh rocked Luna, drawing out a moan of pleasure and forcing her to her knees for a few moments.

Finally, the group arrived at the makeshift wrestling ring.

“This is it?” a confused Banzai asked.

Luna simply nodded happily and strode confidently to the vulture referee, handing him the note from Shenzi.

“I hereby release Luna from my service and fully endorse her as a fulltime competitor in the Wildlife Wrestling Federation. I also submit the two hyenas accompanying her to act as her opponents in her inaugural match.

Signed,

Queen Shenzi, Pride Rock”

The vulture read the handwritten note in shock, but accepted the terms. Before they knew what was happening, Banzai and Ed found themselves thrust into the ring facing a very excited Luna.

“Remember the rules Luna, no full insertion!” the vulture stated sternly.

Luna clenched her cheeks over scar’s secure body and nodded with a smile. “No problem.”

The bell rang and Luna made very quick work of Scar’s former lackys. She tossed Banzai onto Ed with her trunk and brought her feet down with a roothless STOMP that had the crowd cheering. She repeated her stomping action several times, ensuring her hyena opponents were crushed flat. But she wasn’t done.

With her ass occupied, she moved her body into position over her opponents and let herself drop into a belly flop onto the overmatched hyenas. The ref waited a moment, but seeing that the elephant was comfortable and seemed relaxed, he called the match.

Luna finally stood and smiled, peeling the flattened hyenas off the mat, separating them with the slightest difficulty. She smiled to herself, remembering Shenzi’s words of advice. Once she was out of the ring, she pulled Scar’s battered body from deep between her cheeks. His eyes flinched at the sudden light on his face.

Luna maneuvered her defeated opponents quickly. Individually, they wouldn’t be near enough. But together, she smiled as she thought, it would be a tight fit, but would work.

She tied their legs and tails together, leaving just enough room for her legs to slip through where she needed them to. Finally, she grabbed Banzai with one hand and Ed with the other and pulled the trio up until they fit snugly around her waist, with Scar once again planted deep within her ass.

Luna caressed her full backside. With her new uniform, she could fight freely without having to worry about her opponent using her asshole, or any other hole, as a loophole ever again. It might seem strange to the other animals on the savannah to see an elephant walking around in a thong, but she never worried much about what others thought.

Luna’s dominating career as a wrestler was only getting started.

1321.title: Hippo Rush!

choices: Pumbaa shoves Timon into the ring
13211.content:
The cub flew straight into the crowd, vanishing into the masses. The rowdy supporters were quick to pile on the mockery, pushing him to the floor and shoving him back towards the ring, with Henriette calmly waiting for her opponent. Simba wanted to flee. He knew he was utterly outmatched and fighting the hippo would only see him humiliated further. He looked around to see Timon and Pumbaa, but the crowd was too thick to let him see them. They were trying to get the vulture to call off the fight or at least stop the audience from doing Henriette's work. Suddenly a strangely familiar voice was heard near the little lion.

"Stop, you're not to interfere with these fighters! Just because he was thrown out of the ring doesn't mean he's done. Not in this neck of the jungle. Now, let's see about you, cub."

A strong hand grabbed him by the scruff of his neck and pulled him into the air. Henriette's curiosity was also peaked. That voice was very familiar to her. Could it be? She walked to the side of the ring to see who was causing such a commotion. Her eyes widened when she saw the cub's rescuer. She too was a hippo and looked quite similar to Henriette. Her full belly and bright smile practically a mirror image. Her skin was a bit lighter and missed Henriette's earthen brown hue in favor of a more grey tone. She smiled at Henriette.

"How are ya sis? It's been a while, hasn't it? Has the ring run out of things for you to fight? Little lion cubs are hardly a worthy opponent."

"Oh, this one isn't about worthiness. Timon and Pumbaa told us this fierce lion would be their brave protector, and that he'd take on any of us. To prove it they signed him up for a few rounds of wrestling in here. And since I'm never one to skip out on having a little fun, he's been getting a taste of my big 'ol belly. So what brings you to these parts, Michelle?"

"I'm just popping by for a little family visit, but if you're busy I can come back in an hour..."

"Nonsense, just get in here." Henriette beckoned her sister. "I'm sure you all won't mind if our brave lion fights twó poor, fragile hippo's, right?!" The crowd thundered with excitement in response. Michelle blushed at the attention. The vulture saw this development as an opportunity. An old-fashioned two on two beatdown. He flew in to the ring and cleared his throat, causing silence to fall over the audience.

"Ladies aaaand gentlemen! Tonight's match just got twice as exciting! Two hippo's, facing off against the fierce king of the jungle, Simba!" The crowd laughed at the cub, who was still held by the scruff of his neck by Michelle. "But two versus one is hardly fair! Who will step up to fight alongside him?!"
13211.title: In the crowd!

choices: Slow Simba down in less conventional ways
132111.content:
The hushed crowd nervously looked at one another. Help the little cub, against those two? That sounded like a death warrant. Simba had no choice but to face the pair at once, nobody would willingly step into the ring. In a strange way the little lion felt good about this. He might be a punching bag, but at least he wasn't a coward like them. He looked around to see if Timon or Pumbaa were there, but he figured Timon would just get himself hurt and Pumbaa wasn't much for fighting. After a minute of uneasy silence the vulture spoke up.

"It seems your confidence in Simba is great. He will face Henriette and Michelle at the same time! Let us see what a mighty lion can do to two heavy hippo's."

Both of them glared at the vulture for a moment, making him quickly take to the skies and vacate the ring. Michelle dropped the cub on the floor and they went to their respective corners. Henriette whispered something in her ear, making her blush brightly. She seemed a little overwhelmed being in the center of attention, especially next to her much more confident sister. They looked at Simba, who was bolstered by his own courage. Whatever they would do to him, he wasn't going to run. He'd stand and take it, he was braver then all those weak-spined animals in the audience. He might soon regret that decision.

What do the hippos do?
132111.title: Simba fights alone

choices: They bounce him between their bellies
1321112.content:
As the vulture gives the start sign Michelle takes a few steps forward, then waits. Henriette on the other hand walks to the side, circling around the ring. Simba was careful to avoid her. He knew not to expect any mercy from Henriette, as she'd delighted in 'playing' with him already. At least Michelle was still sort of alright in his books, having saved him from the crowd. In the ring though, that could be a different story. He found himself in the center of the ring, a hippo directly behind and in front of him. They nodded at eachother and engaged the next stage of their plan.

PFFFRFFFRRT

A synchronized loud fart echoed from their rotund butts, slowly rolling along the floor of the ring as an expanding noxious cloud. Before it'd even reached Simba the hippo's reinforced it with several more farts, each only slightly weaker then the previous. The members in the audience closest to the ring grabbed their nostrils, some having visible difficulty holding their lunch. Simba was about to be introduced to this miasma, and it left an overwhelming impression.

The moment it reached him, his nose burned at the sulfurous stench. He was prepared for something bad, but this flew right beyond anything he'd ever smelled. Even Pumbaa's unwashed body couldn't get near the spectacular stink assaulting him right now. His eyes watered as he struggled to breathe the polluted air around him. Eventually it dissipated, but the smell causes his nose to feel like it was on fire from the inside. He stood firm, but he could barely see, his eyes watering so badly. The hippo's meanwhile were used to the smell of their own product. In relative calm they prepared to unleash their next move. What awaits Simba?
1321112.title: Slow Simba down in less conventional ways

13211121.content:
Simba heard their heavy footsteps, but the vile farts had made his eyes water. He could see them approach, but he had no idea what would hit him next. Henriette and Michelle readied their bellies and threw themselves towards the cub. In unison they rushed him belly-first, catching his head between their huge guts. Simba's head was completely pinned, tons of hippo fat pushing in from all sides. The roaring of the crowd had been effectively silenced by the insulating mass. The pressure all around him was intense and, though he though it impossible, growing. Henriette and Michelle leaned towards eachother, further squashing the little lion between them. Suddenly they stand back a little and Henriette reaches down between the two.

Simba's head hurt from the pressure. When they'd parted the sudden light blinded him. He was almost shell-shocked and barely registered a hippo hand grabbing him. The cub was lifted off his feet and held in front of the hippo's face. Henriette blew him a quick kiss before turning him to face Michelle, who did the same. Then they dropped him again, catching him between their big bellies. Once more they closed the gap, this time catching the lower half of the cub between them. He held on to Michelle's gut as the hippo's began slowly shuffling their bellies around. His hind legs were shoved, rolled and squashed before the hippo's revealed their next move.

Subtle movements gave the cub's body the opportunity to slide down ever so slightly. Simba could scarcely believe it. He was sinking inbetween the wobbling bellies, as if the gap between them was trying to eat him. The crowd went insane, watching the cub slowly sink deeper and deeper into the roiling sea of hippo fat. There was plenty of belly to go around and soon only his head and two thrashing paws were left visible. Henriette and Michelle laughed at the hapless lion before sealing the deal. Simba was now encased completely between their pudgy bodies, the rapid shifting and squashing rolling over him like inevitable waves of pain. Before long the hippo guts had slowed themselves, almost massaging the cub between them. If it weren't for the overwhelming pressure giving him the idea he'd come out flat as a pancake Simba might have enjoyed this.

His joy was short-lived however, as the hippo's stopped moving their bodies and leaned in for a hug. The trapped lion felt himself compress as they forced their bellies together in a great and powerful embrace. What little air could enter between their shaking guts had been cut off and Simba could only hope this hug wouldn't last too long. Fortunately they parted themselves after a few seconds, revealing him to the world once again. Simba was wrecked, his body aching all over from the pressure and more humiliatingly, stuck to Michelle's gut. With a giggle she peeled the cub off and dropped him on the floor. He'd been thoroughly squashed between them. Was he going to stand firm or throw in the towel.
13211121.title: A double Hippo Rush

132111211.content:
He was hurting, but Simba wasn't going to let himself go out easily. He was a lion, and he would show these animals that a lion's courage is no mere myth. Both hippo's raised their eyebrows in unison, surprised at the little cub's fortitude. Soon their smiles turned with glee. They got to do more to him. This time Michelle whispers and idea into Henriette's ear, who mostly nods at her sister's delightful suggestions. Simba knew their next move would probably flatten him again, but he was ready for them. Let them do their worst. Had he known what was still in store he might've been a bit less bold.

Henriette walked up to the cub, waving her big hips from side to side. She reached down to grab the little lion, but he wasn't going to make it thát easy. He ran between her legs, dashing so quickly that even the hippo's butt squash was too late. She stood up again, dusted herself off and grabbed her growling stomach. Simba looked at her with a puzzled stare. What was she doing over there? Was this another trick to get a hold of him. He glanced over to Michelle, who seemed entirely unconcerned by her sister appearing to be in distress. This confirmed it for Simba. She was luring him into a trap, and he would not fall for it.

The groaning hippo looked up to see where Simba was and closed her eyes. She stood tall, growling a little at the discomfort she was feeling. She then opened her maw wide and let forth the single most devastating belch ever witnessed by man or animal. The noise alone was deafening, a nearly orchestral burp, long and drawn out. But the following stench hit Simba in ways he could've never anticipated. The caustic smell set his nostrils ablaze, making the cub quickly put his paws in front of his nose.The unearthly smell was so potent, several people in the crowd behind Simba turned queasy with one even throwing up. The little lion wasn't too far from throwing up himself as a result of the infernal stench. Henriette seemed unconcerned though, casually walking towards the gassed lion as if nothing had happened. She picked him up with ease this time and took a front paw in each hand.

The hippo sat down, holding the cub against her belly whilst leaning back. Eventually Henriette was lying flat on her back with the cub positioned in the middle of her big belly. Any escape attempts were met with subtle but powerful squeezing of his paws. Simba was completely stuck in this position, at the mercy of the other hippo. Michelle slowly walked into his view and approached him with a sudden burst of speed with her big belly. She simply let herself fall onto Henriette, neatly sandwiching the cub in between them. Simba's scream was cut off by hippo fat as they once again hid him from sight. This time gravity helped to squish the cub even harder. He felt his whole body, trapped and utterly immobilized, glow with dull pain. He'd been here before, a little more weight wasn't going to make a difference.

After a solid few minutes of Michelle rocking back and forth, allowing the lion the slightest window to breathe, she leant back and got off her sister's belly. Simba was squashed again, pushed aside and landing on the ground like a little heap. The hippo's were getting ready for the vulture's conclusion, simply waiting for the cub to do the right thing. Timon and Pumbaa could be heard shouting over the crowd. "Don't give up Simba, you can do this!" Simba wondered what fight they were watching. So far he'd been slammed, thrown and squashed twice. What was he going to do to turn this around? Throwing in the towel certainly wasn't going to make a difference. Simba closed his eyes and growled to himself before gritting his teeth and making the hard decision.
132111211.title: Simba stands up

choices: Turning around and squashing Simba with her butt
Pushing Simba's head against Henriette's pucker
1321112111.content:
The hippo's leered almost hungrily at the little cub, waiting for him to either pass out or give up. Either would be fine. They'd claim him as their own and squish and crush him for days to come. He'd be kept between bellies, in armpits and under butts. They smiled at eachother, gleefully giggling in anticipation when Simba stood up. His legs were a little shaky, but he was on his feet. The hippo's were shocked. He'd been pressed between tons of hippo fat twice and still he stood. Either he was so concussed he'd gone mad or he sincerely believed he stood some kind of chance. It mattered little to Henriette and Michelle. They'd just play with him in here.

Both hippo's sauntered up to the cub, standing on either side of him. He looked up to see them exchange a steely glare before raising their right arms. The little lion got ready for a pummeling, but opened his eyes when he saw something entirely different taking place.

"One! Two! Three! Rock!" "Scissors!" "Haha, I win sis!" "Yeah yeah, let's get to the fun part." With those last words they both looked down at Simba. He froze, and after they threatened to both fart again he made sure not to move a muscle. Michelle plopped her big butt on the floor with a thud and leaned in to grab the cub. Simba was torn between fleeing and not getting gassed again. Had he known of their game he would've ran.

Pudgy hands grasp his sides and the hippo lifts him up. Henriette meanwhile turned around, showing her big bottom to the cub. She bent over, getting down on all fours and letting the whole crowd see it's beautiful rotund form. Simba panicked a little when he noticed the massive butt getting bigger. Henriette was backing up towards him. Soon her bottom was so close Simba's nose almost touched it. It stank of sweat, dirt and things far worse. A small toot from the hippo didn't do much to make the stench any worse.

Suddenly Michelle pushes him forward, jamming him between her sister's big asscheeks. The little lion is surrounded by flabby, stinky flesh as Michelle keeps on pushing him deeper. After a while she stopped, leaving Simba completely stuck in a hippo's butt. The crowd roared with enthusiasm. Another toot from Henriette flew straight into Simba's face. Michelle smiles widely before...
1321112111.title: Simba stands up again

choices: Freeing Simba with the mother of all farts
Briefly pushing Simba's head inside the Henriette's butt
13211121112.content:
Michelle let go of Simba, leaving him wedged in Henriette's ass all on his own. The foul odor, paired with the odd fart made breathing a real challenge.The cub persisted, but the hippo's had one more trick up their sleeve. He felt a pudgy hand grab the back of his head. Michelle giggled and pushed hard, pressing Simba's head deep into the recesses of her sister's crack. With little difficulty she reached the bottom, pushing the cub's head into the darkness. The little lion couldn't see anything, his head enveloped by hippo buttcheeks. But he could feel exactly where he was.

Henriette's pucker was so close his nose was touching it. It twitched a little and slowly moved on its own. It was the single most disgusting thing Simba had ever experienced, to feel another animal's asshole pressed against his nose. The blubbery hippo soon added to his torment, her bowels growling to announce a big fart. The burst of gas was enough to briefly part her hefty cheeks before sealing the cub back into darkness. The stench lingered, assailing the lion's nose and eyes. He had no way to cover them and was forced to endure the potent farts produced right in front of him. He knew they were planning on a KO by fart, but he wouldn't give them the satisfaction.

Outside, the hippo's grew annoyed. The little cub should've passed out by now. The crowd was simmering down a little after the intense applause they gave their brutal bit of buttplay. They take it a step further by...
13211121112.title: head first

choices: Simba is defeated, Henriette and Michelle win
Simba stands up again, drawing a gasp from the hippos
132111211122.content:
No more mercy, this lion was going down right now. Michelle pushed hard once more whilst Henriette did her best to relax her tight pucker. Simba screamed in abject terror, but the hippo's cheeks insulated the noise completely. He felt the edges of the slimy pucker slide past his muzzle and head. With just a few heavy pushes, Michelle had managed to stuff his entire head into her sister's body. The stench was unrelenting. Outside, her farts would dissipate, but in here they had nowhere to go. Especially with his head blocking the only exit. He found a new surge of strength and struggled as fiercely as possible. It didn't last though, as the lack of breathable air and overwhelming pressure quickly subdued him. Seeing his struggles fade, the hippo's decide to pull him free, confident that they'd sealed Simba's fate this time. There was no way he'd be left in fighting condition. And as soon as they would be allowed to claim him, they were going to have so much fun.

Michelle carefully pulled the cub's head back outside where he breathed a gasp of air. He didn't care that he was surrounded by ass and the air being accordingly foul. Anything was better then that miasma in her bowels. With some care he was pulled free from the hippo's rotund ass, but not before it blew a smelly parting gift into his face. He was carefully set on the ground, but the squashing between Henriette's buttcheeks had left him weakened. He collapsed, lying on the floor and barely responding to his surroundings.

The vulture flies in to inspect Simba. It doesn't look like he'll be able to keep fighting, indomitable spirit or not.
132111211122.title: push him to the limit

choices: A few minutes after the fight...
1321112111222.content:
"Unbelievable, ladies and gentlemen! He's still not done! Simba just keeps on going! Somebody stop him!" The Vulture yelled ecstatically. The cub, against all odds, stood back up again. Defiantly he smiled at the hippos. His whole body ached and smelled like ass, but he would not quit. Whilst they were a little mad that the cub still wasn't beaten, both Michelle and Henriette began to respect his tenacity. They would have to result to their most devastating team technique.

"Very well, cub. If you want to be buried so badly, allow us to provide your tomb!" The crowd collectively lost their minds. The Tomb was rarely ever used by Henriette, and nobody had ever withstood it. Simba grew a little worried at the audience's excitement, but stood his ground. Michelle walked towards him, ready to grab him for their next move. In the background Henriette was digging a hole. It didn't look very deep, only just big enough to hold something like a small hyena, maybe a lion cub... Simba began to wonder just what they had planned. It seemed clear he was to be put in the hole, but he dreaded to think of the follow up on that. He was so distracted that he noticed Michelle reaching down for him at the last moment. Once again he'd dash between the hippo legs, but this time they were ready.

A heavy thud was heard when Michelle quickly sat down on the cub. He was fast enough to keep most of him safe, but his lower back and tail were caught. The hippo shuffled her cheeks a little, wedging Simba a little deeper between them. She looked up to Henriette, who had finished digging. Quickly she grabbed the pinned lion and pulled him free. The cub struggled and fought her grip, but she had both her hands wrapped around his torso. He was going nowhere.

When she reached the hole, Michelle gently placed Simba in it, laying him on his back. She held his upper body down whilst Henriette turned around, showing him the familiar sight of her butt. She sat down, covering Simba's lower body and pinning him down. Michelle let go of his body and turned around herself. The little lion could only watch as her round bottom lowered itself onto him. The two hippo's were sitting back to back, a little lion buried beneath their butts. A little rumble from one of their guts preceded the unholy domination that followed.

Simba couldn't move at all. The hole he was in provided a lot of relief from the hippos' crushing weight, but it did little to stop him from being pinned into position by their hefty posterior. He too heard the rumbles passing through the big guts above him. He braced himself for what was to come as best he could, but he knew that this might be the one that'll knock him out. The crowd waited with baited breath, ready for the hippos to unleash the storm on the entombed lion. And they delivered far beyond all expectations.

The sheer volume alone would be enough to let bystanders believe a hippo's gut is just a big gas balloon. Simba could feel the rancid wind surging along his body as the hippos had opened the floodgates to a seemingly never ending volley of farts. Each more loud and thunderous then the last. The crowd cheered at first, but soon even they were covering their noses at the pestilent miasma emanating from the two. After three minutes Michelle and Henriette began to run dry. A few more little extra smelly farts escaped them before they got up. The entombed lion was breathing, but not much more. His gaze was distant and his body still twitching from the horrors he'd experienced. He was in no way prepared for the relentless rancid assault he endured. Michelle felt a touch of pity as she lifted the cub out of the fart-blasted hole. He sputtered a little, but it was clear to everyone. He had lost this fight, and he was down for the count. The Tomb had claimed another victim, and Henriette was confidently beaming with pride.

The vulture entered the arena to conclude tonight's event. He quickly looked over the lion to confirm everyone's suspicion.

"We haaaave a winner! Give it up for Michelle and Henriette, the brave hippo duo who stood their ground against this ferocious lion!" The crowd laughed loudly at the vulture, cheering for the winners. "Now, as is our ancient tradition, they are allowed to claim him for themselves! Ladies, what will you decide? Can Simba go to let his ego recover? Or will he be coming with you?!" Henriette and Michelle smiled and looked at eachother.

"We'll take him, thank you very much." The crowd against burst into laughter and cheering.

Michelle looked around and quickly added. "A pity none of you had the stones to join him, we could've had some real fun." Most of the audience shuffled a little on their feet, quietly embarrassed by themselves. Though having seen what Simba had been put through and was possibly going to be enduring in the near future did make them feel a bit better about their decision.
1321112111222.title: Simba stands up one more time

choices: "Alright, just give us one more hour"
"Sorry, he's ours now. Maybe in a week when we get bored?"
13211121112221.content:
Most of the audience had left, and Michelle and Henriette waited outside the ring to tell Simba the good news. He had lost the fight in awe-inspiring fashion and they had laid claim on him as was their right. The little lion was still recovering from the merciless assault he'd faced during the match. His body had been squashed repeatedly and stunk heavily of hippo farts. It took a few more minutes before he regained much of his senses, finding himself held in Michelle's arms like a baby. He tries to get away, but she quickly wraps him into a soft hug. For once she was not trying to squeeze or crush him, which caught the cub off guard.

"Welcome back Simba. I'm afraid that you went a little KO during the fight, so you sort of lost that. But the good news is we get to make sure you'll be all better again." Henriette giggled at her sister. "By which she means we claimed you. You're ours now." His eyes grew wider. Was that part of the fight, or was she just messing with him. She noticed his confusion. "Didn't Timon and Pumbaa tell you about that? The winner can claim the loser as their own after a fight." Simba was overcome with fear. He'd only been around them for ten minutes and his body was wracked with pain and practically infused with hippo stink. He struggled in Michelle's grip, but she responded only by hugging him a little tighter. He wisely surrendered, too exhausted and bruised to do much about his current situation.

"Oh don't worry, we're not going to hurt you. First we should share a little something with you." Henriette smiled at her sister. "It's been so long since we stood in the ring together. So we'd like to reward you a little for allowing this reunion to happen." "And to make it so much fun." Her sister added. The hippo's stood across from one another and Michelle raised Simba to eye level. Both leaned in and planted a gentle kiss on each side of his head. "Thank you for not bowing out or running away. Most fighters wouldn't have had your courage." Simba stays quiet, knowing he's not got much he can do anyway. He's already happy to be treated nice for a change.

Michelle and Henriette exchanged looks again, this time a lot more sultry. They leaned together again, pursing their lips. This time however they held them pressed against Simba's head before slowly suckling on more and more of it. In little time they reached eachother and began kissing. Simba's head was stuck between the two smooching hippos. Before long their tongues got a hold of him and began playing with him and with eachother. The large muscles slathered him in sticky saliva as he could hear both of them moaning in pleasure. One of the tongues even briefly tried to probe its way into his mouth, but gave up when he kept it firmly shut. After what felt to Simba like an eternity they released him. His head was dripping with slimy saliva and he took a few deep breaths before shuddering so hard Michelle nearly dropped him.

The two cuddled with the little lion for a little while before some familiar faces approached them. Timon and Pumbaa sheepishly stepped forward. They asked the pair of hippos if they would please give Simba to them. The cub had suffered enough for one day and could use a little help. Michelle and Henriette looked at eachother and replied.
13211121112221.title: A few minutes after the fight...

132111211122211.content:
The two hippos agreed to return Simba to Timon and Pumbaa in an hour. They also requested a little privacy with him until then. The meerkat and warthog weren't exactly in a position to complain, so they left the cub with Michelle and Henriette. He dreaded to think what they'd do to him, still sore from spending just ten minutes in a ring with them. Though he did note that their attitudes had grown a lot more friendly towards him. Admittedly their friendliness did result in his head being soaked with drool. But he'd take that over being intimately introduced to their ass any day. He groaned a little as the Michelle held him aloft again, giggling with glee.

"You should visit Henriette some day. The mud pools near her place do wonders for sore muscles like yours." Simba produced a strained smile, trying not to think too much on what'd happen if he took her advice. He doubted Henriette would just let him use those pools without toying with him first. She interrupted his train of thought with a reply. "And it does wonders for your skin. I mean, have you felt mine?" Michelle smiled and pushed the cub against her sister's belly. Now that he didn't have to worry about crushing weight he had a chance to feel her skin. The rubbery hide was almost completely smooth, a hearty earthen scent filling the little lion's nose. In some ways it kinda smelled nice, but the pervasive hint of her salty sweat ruined it. And if the cub was entirely honest with himself, it smelled like a field of roses compared to her farts.

"Hey sis, since he was so nice to let us squash him, how about we give him a belly massage?" Simba gulped.

"Y'know, I think he'd love that."

He was placed between the hippo bellies, silently hoping this wouldn't be a repeat of the double hippo rush he'd endured earlier. Michelle and Henriette leaned forward, gently engulfing Simba up to his neck between their soft guts. They used their hands to make the large mass jiggle and wobble, waves of fat coursing along their bellies. The experience was almost surreal for Simba. He felt the hippo guts jiggle all around him, pressing and releasing in a way that felt remarkably pleasant. He relaxed a little, letting the flabby bellies do their thing. Unfortunately, the hippos didn't quite leave all of their mischief in the ring. With a subtle step they split up a fraction of a centimeter at a time, until the cub began sliding a bit lower. Before long his head was lost between their bellies. They nodded and stopped jiggling their guts, reaching in for a hug instead. The gentle massage became an overwhelming reminder of the fight and Simba was squeezed flat between them for a few seconds.

"Oops, so sorry Simba, we forgot you were there." They sheepishly giggled. "Don't worry, I'll make it up to you." Michelle added, lifting him back up by the scruff of his fur. She dropped him between her boobs, the soft flesh yielding around him. Each orb was half the size of the cub, and Michelle quickly pinned him between them. She rolled them back and forth over his body, making the cub coo in surprised delight. Henriette, slightly jealous, retrieved him from her sister's rack and promptly pushed the little lion into her own cleavage. She too massaged him with her breasts, but Henriette was decidedly rougher in her approach. Simba didn't care though. For once he wasn't being squashed, even if he had zero say in what was happening to him.

After the soft hugs followed more kisses. Both hippos wanted some and Michelle got to go first. Not content with just a kiss, she quickly sucked the cub's whole head into her maw and began to lick it. Henriette repeated this one-sided French kiss as well, but was a little more persistent. Cunningly she placed her tongue on the cub's nose, waiting for him to take a desperate breath. The moment that happened she plunged her tongue in to his mouth. Michelle giggled when Simba's body suddenly twitched and shuddered at her sister's loving kiss.

"Oh, I just can't resist. Can I sis, please?" "Oh fine Henriette, go for it, he's almost done anyway." Simba barely caught most of those words, still working through the fact he'd French kissed a hippo. Suddenly she began to suckle on him again, slurping in an attempt to pull the rest of him into her maw. His struggles were meaningless against the large hippo maw, but he tried all the same. Like a furry, struggling string of pasta the cub slowly vanished between Henriette's lips. She murrs loudly, relishing the little lion's delightful taste.

Timon and Pumbaa just came around the corner when they saw the two hippo's sitting next to eachother, one with a mouthful of cub. They looked at the two as if they'd been caught doing something naughty and Henriette quickly leant forward to deliver Simba back to freedom. He was just a drool-soaked floppy ragdoll of a lion, his expression horrified by what he just experienced. Timon and Pumbaa approached him whilst the hippos stood up and walked away, thanking Simba for an unforgettable evening and laughing.

Simba would recover, but he was just a little more fearful of hippos from that day. Timon and Pumbaa decided to lay low for a while, their stalwart protector not quite the ferocious force of nature they'd hoped for yet. Perhaps one day he could get a rematch, and hopefully it won't be quite so onesided next time.
132111211122211.title: "Alright, just give us one more hour"

132111211122212.content:
The hippos were adamant in their claim. They would hold on to the little lion for a few days longer. Timon and Pumbaa could pick him up near the ring when they were bored of him. Simba didn't speak up, still dumbfounded that his friends neglected to tell him about this. The pair of blubbery beasts turned their attention on eachother and their little captive.

"...Belly Flop!"

The crowd erupted in cheering upon hearing those words. Simba's mind was filled with dread. This hippo was going to do whát to him? With that gut? That'd be the death of him. He tried getting up, but his body wouldn't cooperate. Be it because of paralyzing fear, sheer stubbornness or perhaps a tinge of curiosity, he would not move. The impact felt almost surreal for Simba. At first her belly simply rested on him, pressing him downwards almost gently. As he was pushed to the floor the belly simply began to yield, folding around him. This didn't last long as eventually the belly simply enveloped him entirely, cutting off all light, but still feeling weirdly ethereal, almost weightless. Then, after what seemed like an eternity the weight settled in. First pressing along his spine before quickly pushing his whole body in on itself. He felt himself compress a little under the vast ocean of her mass, but the belly proved remarkably soft. The experience wasn't nearly as torturous as he'd feared. Then reality caught up with him.

He wasn't just pinned underneath a vast hippo gut, he had absolutely no movement at all. Not a millimeter could be found. What's worse is his lungs were thirsting for air, but the massive weight had pushed it all out and made finding a fresh breath nigh on impossible. He sucked what minute amounts of air there were left into his burning lungs and hoped the giant gut would allow him to breathe before he passes out. Worst of all was the cheering. Even buried underneath her massive belly, Simba could hear the crowd losing their minds. He never stood a chance and now he was squashed underneath some hippo for their entertainment.

He could only hope Henriette would release him before he passed out. It wouldn't be much of a show if he'd be knocked out in under a minute after all. A horrid question snuck into his mind though. Was passing out and giving a bad show really worse then being awake to experience the things this hippo still had in store for him?

The huge hippo jaws closed again, trapping Simba once again in darkness. The tongue below him stirred into motion, licking his legs and curling over his back in a gentle fashion. With surprising dexterity and a soothing touch the tongue slithered all over the little lion, leaving a thick blanket of saliva on him. Henriette even briefly considered pushing the tongue in Simba's mouth, but that'd be a bit too much. He was only a cub after all. And since cubs like to play, she knew the perfect game. The little lion wasn't quite as much of a fan of tongue wrestling as Henriette thought. Her thick tongue brought it's immense strength to bear as it coiled around Simba's torso and dragged him around the inside of her maw. Occasionally he'd be flung to the side, only to be pressed forcefully into the side of the hippo's mouth, past the few teeth present.

The spectators could actually witness these moments, as a distinctly lion-shaped bulge would appear in Henriette's cheek. Sometimes a paw pushed out between her lips, but she playfully slurped those right back in. The crowd could only guess what kind of saliva-drenched rollercoaster Simba was on. Had they known how roughly he was getting thrown around in there, they may've felt some pity. There wasn't a corner of her mouth the cub wasn't pushed into. After a solid ten minutes the crowd got a little bored of watching the hippo smack and slurp on the little lion in her mouth. Henriette didn't care though. This kind of taste was a once in a lifetime experience and she was going to take full advantage of her little playmate.

When she opened her mouth again Simba didn't have the fight left in him to move at all. He was still there, bruised but awake. He was however covered from head to toe in a large volume of hippo drool. It clung to his fur and oozed down his sides. It was a good thing there was some space between the hippo and the crowd as the foul breath could knock out a zebra. She pushed him up with her tongue, mocking his inability to even stand up anymore. Slowly she pushed him forward a little as well, under the cub found purchase on the soft lower lip. He found his vigor renewed and pulled his slickened body towards the edge. Must escape the mouth. No matter what, I must escape the mouth!

Just as he reached the tipping point and was about to slide down on to her belly the hippo closed her mouth once again. Her smile curled up with a cruel twist. "reawy fo' roun' two?" She cooed as she effortlessly slurped Simba back inside her mouth. The cub yelled in surprise before being sealed inside again. The game Henriette played with him had changed. This appeared to be some kind of slimy parody of hide and seek. Simba tried his hardest to avoid the probing tongue, slowly moving around the hippo's mouth. If it touched him, she would coil her touch around the helpless cub and drag him back to the middle before squeezing him and slamming him face-first in the puddle of drool that amassed under the tongue.

She also loosened up her lips a little, making it much easier for Simba to poke his head through. Though whenever he did, she immediately counted it as having found the little cub. As a result Simba's messages were little more then one-word please before he'd be yanked back out of sight again. "Help!" "Please!' was the most that could be mustered. None in the crowd were too eager to help, as Simba got punished for these interruptions to Henriette's joy. The punishment often entailed more roughhousing from her tongue. Coiling, squeezing and flinging Simba all over her maw.

It had been 30 minutes since the cub had been left at the mercy of Henriette's big tongue. She could see the audience's boredom reach a critical level. Enough is enough. Maybe if she plays her cards right with Timon and Pumbaa she can experience this again. But for now the show must go on. She gently pushes him forward, letting his head pop through her lips. His expression is broken, his gaze distant. She could feel his heartbeat and breathing, but he wasn't able to do much else. Simba had spent the last half hour being squeezed, shoved, coiled, dragged and flung around by her thick tongue. His coat of saliva seemed to have a coat of it's own, that's how thick it was slathered onto his weary body.

Henriette leaned backward, slowly pushing Simba out of her mouth through pursed lips to control his descent. The saliva-drenched cub barely moves as he lies on the hippo's belly. At this point the vulture flies in to see if the fight can be continued.
1322111.title: Henriette plays with Simba in her mouth

13221111.content:
The vulture checks the little lion. Simba is moving, but barely. He doesn't appear wounded in any way, just exhausted. The vulture holds up a paw, but the cub's body is like jelly in his hands. The cub couldn't even stand and barely responded to the vulture checking him up at all. Henriette just sat on her rear, watching the slimy lion try to make sense of what he'd been through over the last half an hour. She knew this fight was pretty much over. With the cub in this condition, there was nothing more she could do to him. There were some things she wánted to do to him, but those were either forbidden or just a repeat of the last half hour and the crowd would probably boo her out at that time. So she remained patient, confident in how this situation would unfold.

"Simba is no longer able to fight! Your winner for this match is... Henriette!"

Her smile widened as she knew what'd happen next.

"As is our tradition, the victor may lay claim to the loser or let him leave to lick his wounds. Henriette, what will you decide?!"

Timon and Pumbaa were in the sidelines, quietly devastated at the results. The champion they've been propping up around here had been utterly humiliated. Henriette never even broke a sweat as she flattened him and toyed with his body like Simba was nothing more then a plaything to her. And the way she just kept on suckling and slurping on his body was downright unsettling. The two of them wanted to go in and get the little lion out of there, to clean him up and mend his bruised body and spirit. But they knew Henriette. She wasn't one to leave her playthings behind.

"As you've probably all already guessed, I lay claim to this lion."

She grabs the lion and carries him off to her home. Simba just groans, his bruised body in no state to object to the verdict. The hippo is too occupied just relishing the thought at all the things they can do together. Outside the arena, there were no pesky rules. So many great games to play with her new lion, and only so much time left in the day. After a good hour's walk she arrived at her home, having carried Simba...
13221111.title: Simba is defeated, Henriette wins

132211111.content:
The helpless little lion enjoyed the walk from the hippo's maw. Along the way she'd occasionally play tricks on him with her tongue, but for the most part she was content to just let him sit on it. His little head stuck out between her lips as they gently held him in place. With the exception of the moments she suddenly dragged him back into her maw the ride was surprisingly relaxing. It was a welcome reprieve from the rough treatment he got earlier. Though he was still sore all over, he at least felt like things might not go quite as spectacularly bad as they had for the last hour. Henriette had been humming assorted tunes, enjoying the little cub in her mouth. His heavenly taste was a powerful as ever, and she was going to get everything she could out of it.

At last they arrived at Henriette's home. A shady little corner of the savannah with some pleasant features for the both of them. A grassy patch that had clearly been used to sleep in for some time now provided the hippo a place to gently spit out her passenger. Close by was a little pool of water. Large enough for her to bathe in, but too small to draw in lots of other animals. Lastly and most prominently were the mud pits. Each at least as big as the body of water and alltogether around a dozen of them. Simba was unsure on what to do. He knew Henriette had 'claimed' him, but he was unsure on the meaning of this. Timon and Pumbaa never told him about this part of the fighting.

The hippo seemed to notice his confusion and laid down the rules in a commanding tone. "Listen up cub, you're mine now. That means you stay by me at all times. If you run, I will hunt you, I will find you and I wíll eat you! Are we clear?" Simba nodded meekly, and her harsh glare immediately faded. "Excellent, now that we've got that out of the way, where to you want to start? A bath? or maybe some rest? You've been through a lot." Her tone was friendly, almost suspiciously so.
132211111.title: In her mouth

choices: Play a little with the cub
throw Simba into the water pool
1322111111.content:
Simba looked at his saliva-drenched body and quietly murmured. "A bath would be nice, but no tongue-bath please." Henriette's tongue was already pushing past her lips as he said it. "Heh, you know me well, whelp. Very well, a bath it is." Simba was relieved to hear her treat him with some semblance of kindness for the first time since they met.

"A mud bath!"

"Wait, what?" Simba stammered as the hippo grabbed him by the tail and lifted him into the air. Without a word, Henriette flung the cub towards the mud pits. He sailed through the air in a graceful arc before landing face first in the thick mud. It was surprisingly warm and comfortable, even if the earthy smell gave him flashbacks to being pinned underneath the hippo's gut. It took considerable effort to right himself and get his head out of the warm mass. Once he'd freed himself he noticed he barely had to swim at all to stay afloat in the thick muck. It appeared to be so dense he'd float no matter what. Suddenly his attention was drawn to the increasingly rapid heavy footsteps thundering towards him.

Henriette got a racing start before leaping into the same pool as Simba. Her body soared over the little lion, giving him even worse flashbacks about her gut. She flew straight past the cub and landed in the mud with a huge splash. The lion looked away to avoid getting a face full of sloppy muck. "Aaaaaaah, this stuff's simply the best, whelp. You just lie back and relax, let the heat draw the pain of sore muscles and bruises right out of you." Skeptical at first, Simba tried her advice and relaxed his body. He sank up to his shoulders into the mud and tilted himself a little backward, shoving his front paws into the warm mud too. He closed his eyes and felt himself calm down entirely. Almost exactly as she said, the warmth of the muck around him began to coax the pain out of his little body. The crushing from her gut and squeezing from her tongue all felt like they'd happened years, not hours ago.

"Years ago I discovered these pools. Heat from an underground thermal vent keeps everything nice and warm. And the mud works wonders for my skin too, as I'm sure you've felt." She grinned at the cub, who couldn't care less about her words. He was in his own little section of heaven, his wracked body finally getting the rest it so sorely needed. "Of course you gotta add a little heat yourself too sometimes." She chuckled, before some extra bubbles appeared in the muck near her butt. The miasma of stench crawling towards the cub finally broke his relaxation, as he looked at Henriette with a small glare. She put on her most innocent smile. The both of them spent an hour soaking in the mud in almost complete silence, letting all their worries float away to the soothing music of the bubbles in the mud pool.

At this point, Henriette decides to...
1322111111.title: a bath

choices: Dove into the mud, submerging herself
13221111111.content: After a while of soaking up the warm mud bath, Henriette looked over to Simba. He seemed very content and comfortable with his given position. Maybe a little too comfortable. Henriette grinned to herself as she imagined what she could do to him. He showed he could barely move about as he was, while she could move about freely through the mud. She then...
13221111111.title: Play a little with the cub

choices: Henriette teases Simba using her maw
Smelly gas bubbles form around and under Simba
132211111111.content:
Simba was enjoying the warmth of the mud, enjoying the soothing noises of the pond. He didn't even notice that Henriette was sinking into the mud, a cruel grin on her face all the while. After a few more minutes of letting the mud take away his worries, he finally looks over to his captor, only to realize she disappeared. His pleasure was quickly replaced by fear. She may've been treating him... relatively well all things considered, but she did mash him up earlier today. He cursed himself for taking his eyes off of her. He heard some of the mud shift, as if a predator was slinking through the mud, brushing above the surface, making sure he didn't spot her.

She moved deliberately to spark fear into him, making sure he heard her, but couldn't see her. Meanwhile, he tried to pull himself out of the muck, but the mud seemed to cling to him as hard as possible. He sank in too far! He frantically tried to pull himself free, but Henriette decided to close in on her prey. Finally...
132211111111.title: Dove into the mud, submerging herself

1322111111112.content:
The mud shifted around the struggling cub, who was swimming as best he could. The dense mud made any movement ten times harder, but also gave the cub a lot of natural buoyancy. When all was said and done he could keep his head above the surface and slowly tread around. He tried to pull himself free, but it was to no avail. Only on the side of the pool would he have the grip to free himself. Or he would need a helping hand from Henriette. She was around, he saw the mud shift and churn, failing to hide her round body as it circled him. But now she had sank down even deeper, hidden from the cub but still present somewhere in this mud pit.

A clue to her position was given when Simba felt bubbles rush past him. She must be directly below him, trying to scare him. 'It'll take more then some hippo breath to scare this mighty lion' Simba thought to himself. The moment the first bubble surfaced and popped it was clear Henriette agreed with his suggestion. The air was quickly given the familiar stink of hippo farts that he had experienced earlier. As more bubbles popped around him the stench intensified, making his already tired body cough and strain to breathe the foul air. The little lion began to move as fast as he could away from this bubbling cauldron of hippo gas.

But then he felt precisely what Henriette had in store for him. A strong hand grabbed his submerged tail. The hippo pulled a little on the lion's tail, dragging his head perilously close to the surface of the mud. She'd ease off on him as long as he didn't try to swim away. She wanted him to stay put right at the epicenter of her flatulent eruptions. His eyes watered and his nostrils felt like they were on fire. The potent stink of hippo gas was enough to strip the bark from trees. There was no way around it, the cub was stuck right in the middle of it. 'She can't have much more in her then that' Simba thought to himself. But Henriette gradually released her horrifying gas attack, producing an almost unreal amount of farts. The torment lasted minutes, but to Simba it may as well have been days. The slightest hint of him trying to escape the bubbling mud was punished by the hippo dragging him down into the muck. Her grip on his tail was unwavering.

She feels herself drain of her precious farts and holds on to the last reserves. Underneath the little lion Henriette concentrates and releases one last thundering volley. It felt pleasantly warm escaping her, and she was sure Simba would appreciate this gesture. He felt the sudden rush of bubbles rise up all around him. The mud pool's surface bubbled briefly but intensely, dramatically increasing the stench in the air. The struggling cub had to put all his effort in just staying conscious. Thoughts of futile escape were gone, replaced by thoughts of mere survival. Deep beneath him the hippo silently smiled, proud of this latest game she had conjured. She finally released her prey and resurfaced near him. The hippo quickly rose up and grabbed the almost submerged lion in the process.

What will Henriette do next?
1322111111112.title: The mud stirs ominously

1322111112.content:
Simba yawned loudly, causing the hippo to yawn in turn. The cub got another good look at the massive jaws he'd spent the last hour in before Henriette bumbled over to her bed. It was getting late and the games would be just as fun tomorrow, possibly moreso with the little lion in a less worn out state. The flattened grass that was her bed was not the most comfortable thing, but it beat sleeping on the ground. She looked up to Simba and spoke with a stern voice.

"Whelp, get over here." Simba obeyed, recognizing that a tired hippo makes for a cranky hippo. "Give me a good night kiss!" The cub recoiled. He had to kiss... that? With great hesitation he pushed himself towards the hippo's pursed lips and pressed his nose against them. The hippo's powerful smooch pulled his head further between her lips. His muzzle was already held shut, and she didn't seem to relent. Only after sucking his entire head into her mouth and licking if from all angles was she pleased. Simba didn't care, he'd been given so many coats of saliva today another one barely even mattered. Her next order on the other had was a new one.

"Put your tail under there." She commanded, pointing at her gut. Simba was shocked. Even after all of today's events, she hadn't squashed him enough? "What? Why?" he stammered. "Because otherwise you'd run off the moment I fall asleep, and I cannot be bothered chasing you across half the damn Savannah! Now put your tail under there or I'm going to put all of you under there!" Simba's back still hurt from the last time that happened, so he meekly obeyed, allowing the hippo to lie down on his tail.

"But what if you roll over me during your sleep?"

"I don't roll in my sleep, too fat for it. Don't worry, I won't steamroller you until tomorrow."

"Wait, what?" Simba gasped but there was no answer.

The next day...
1322111112.title: some rest

choices: Into the belly for fifteen minutes
13221111121.content:
The lion cub awoke feeling revitalized. A good night's sleep helped him wear off all of the muscle ache and other assorted pains from yesterday's match. The first thing he noticed on waking up was Henriette's bulk no longer resting on his tail. He gave it a happy wag just o make sure it still worked. Remarkably it felt as good as the rest of him, in spite of having been flattened by a fat hippo gut all night long. Then a very familiar feeling washes over him.

Simba feels the hippo's big lips suckling the small of his back again. 'Oh no, not again, not right away!' he thought. Thankfully his reactions weren't dulled by a belly flop this time and he jumped out of harm's way. He thanked his lucky stars he had avoided another god knows how long mouthplay session, but the hippo wasn't so easily amused.

"Alright whelp, listen closely. Today's game is Predator. You'll be the helpless fleeing prey and I'll be the hungry predator. If you can avoid me long enough for me to throw in the towel I'll keep you out of my mouth for the rest of the day. Hippo's honor!"

"And what if you win?"

"Then you're going in here." Henriette calmly stated, patting her big belly

"Are you insane, that'd kill me?!" Simba shouted, shocked to hear the hippo's insane game.

"That's a myth. If you go into there in one piece you can last hours, maybe even days. Trust me, I kept track of it for a while."

"How long will you keep me inside?"

"Depends on how well you do at avoiding me."

With the rules agreed upon and the stakes raised, the hippo began a countdown. Simba only had six seconds to get a head start before the ravenous hippo would give chase. He ran as fast as his little legs would take him. Soon he heard the familiar rumble of heavy footsteps. the sound got louder, she was gaining on him! Simba darted into the undergrowth, hoping the thick shrubs would block her wide girth. He hadn't counted on just how much she wanted to feel a tasty lion cub go down her throat. Henriette barreled right through the bushes, making Simba yelp in fear as he has to find another strategy to outmaneuver the hungry hippo. In spite of her reassurances, the cub ran like he was chased by death itself. He knew what kind of slimy hell was located in her mouth. He dreaded to think what her stomach would be like.

The little lion tried every trick in the book to avoid the hippo's maw, but every time he thought he was gaining some precious distance she would surprise him by simply bulldozing the obstacles he'd carefully sidestepped. After almost fifteen minutes of solid high-speed pursuit the hippo finally caught a lucky break. As Simba was trying to run around her and slip away she managed to intercept him. Her huge maw immediately grabbed hold of him and lifted him into the air. This game was over.

Though she'd never tell him, Henriette was impressed by the quick little cub's dexterity and tenacity. Now though, it was her time to determine what to do with the captured lion.
13221111121.title: Simba feels a familiar sensation

choices: He wasn't waiting around to find out.
Henriette gave him some time to bathe and calm down.
132211111211.content:
She grabbed the cub by the scruff of his neck and hoisted him out of her jaws so she could speak to him. Simba shuddered with overpowering fear. She was about to send him into her belly, where she normally puts her food. He couldn't believe he was reduced to this, a hippo's little victory snack. She interrupted his ceaseless worrying with a little shake and spoke to him.

"You did well, cub. Not many can keep out of my maw for fifteen minutes. As a reward, you'll only have to spend that time in my belly." She said with a smile. Henriette had enjoyed the chase immensely. Normally only predators would show this sort of hunting behaviour. She had stumbled upon it by accident one day, warding off her territory from a lone marauding hyena. At some point she'd scared him off far enough, but the urge to run after it never left. She wanted that hyena. that... morsel. She kept on chasing it, and eventually caught her target. She didn't really know what to do with a struggling hyena in her jaws, so she let the terrified scavenger out. Ever since that moment she kept her predatory instincts to herself. The thrill of the chase excited her, and she was sincerely grateful the cub did so well. But that wasn't going to save him from what was coming next.

Simba quivered like a reed as Henriette brought him back close to her mouth. She planted a big kiss on his chest and gave him a large, playful lick. She opened wide, showing the shaking lion the black void down her gullet. Simba began to actively struggle against her. It did little to slow her, but she loved it all the same.

"Yes, perfect! I love it when they struggle going down."

The helpless cub was deposited on her tongue once more and shrouded in darkness as she closed her maw. Henriette almost moaned in pleasure as she played around with the little lion in her mouth. She shoved him, grabbed him, squeezed him and released him over and over again. A few minutes of fun, who could object to that? Perhaps Simba, but his opinion wasn't really relevant to her right now. All that mattered was his taste, and on that front he delivered in spades. She simply couldn't keep herself waiting any longer.

The large, strong tongue grabbed hold of Simba and began to drag him backwards, towards the gullet. He felt the edge of the muscles lining her throat and doubled his efforts. The large tongue held him down easily as it continued to push the cub towards the inevitable. Finally the hippo's gullet got hold of his hind legs, squeezing them together and pulling on the rest of his body. Henriette swallowed again and again, drawing more and more of the little lion down her throat.

gulp

Both his hind legs were now completely trapped, his fate was sealed as he felt them brush against the slick tunnel of her esophagus. The powerful muscles lining her throat squeezed and undulated, preparing for the next...

gulp

Simba's torso offered little resistance as it was sucked down the hippo's throat. Everything up to his shoulders was now slowly slipping further towards her stomach. He tried to grab hold of her tongue, but it kept itself unavailable, leaving the little lion to his own devices whilst being pullet down Henriette's gullet.

GULP

One last powerful squeeze sealed his fate. He slid down the smooth tunnel of her throat to meet his inevitable demise in the stomach. With loud gurgling and dripping he was introduced into this innermost part of Henriette. The cub landed in a sticky pool of goop, quickly determining this to be the dreaded stomach acids. He leapt aside, but the walls were too smooth for him to get a grip. He fell back in the pool, thrashing around and screaming bloody murder. It takes him almost a full minute before things begin to fall into place for him. First and foremost, this fearsome acid seemed to do almost nothing at all. No painful stinging or even much of a vague tickling sensation at all. With time and the inescapable nature of his prison that could've been a problem, but for fifteen minutes he hardly had to worry. Secondly the air was, though foul-smelling, quite breathable. Slowly he came to realize the hippo might have spoken the truth, strange as it may have sounded.

Henriette enjoyed the wild flailing inside her belly immensely. She pats its huge mass, inadvertently sounding like a heavy drum inside of there. The cub was fighting to survive, and as a result had been outright delightful squirming down her throat and into her belly. It was everything she had hoped for and more. Her stomach joyfully bounced the little cub around inside of her.

From Simba's perspective things were a bit less happy. The slick walls had come alive and were slamming him across the room. His fur became soaked with the stinking goop inside of Henriette. It was nearly impossible to maintain his balance. He fell over frequently and landed in the puddle of slime. The hot, foul air was irritating his nostrils. As the minutes crawled by his struggles diminished. He knew none of it was going to do anything. For now he'd be stuck in this sweltering, squishy chamber. Suddenly Henriette's voice rumbles all around him.

"Your fifteen minutes are up. That's enough of you squirming in there. Time to come back up."

That was all the warning he got as the walls closed in on him. He was pushed back up through the esophagus and into the mouth once again. Henriette wasn't quite ready to let this be the end of it. So before he could react her thick tongue wrapped itself around him. She licked the cub clean of her stomach juices, replacing them with a heavy coat of saliva. Simba was almost growing accustomed to it. After a few minutes of this tongue bath Henriette pursed her lips and pushed the little lion's head through.

The bright sunlight stung Simba's eyes, but he quickly adjusted to it. His head was thoroughly slathered in drool and held firmly in place by her big lips. He was able to look around only by virtue of Henriette turning her head. She pointed him at the pool of clear water nearby and looked up a little. With careful aim she then spat the cub towards the pool. His drool-soaked body sailed through the air screaming before landing right in the middle of the pool with a big splash. Simba thrashed around a moment before righting himself and swimming back to the surface. The cold water was really pleasant to him, having spent the last half an hour inside the hippo's hot mouth and stomach.

Simba swam around, washing the drool out of his fur. When he was done, he felt refreshed. He knew today had only just started though. What other games did Henriette have in store for him?
132211111211.title: Into the belly for fifteen minutes

choices: collapses, exhausted. They both just lie there for a bit.
1322111112111.content:
Henriette was on cloud nine after this experience, and wasn't paying attention to the little cub. Simba feared future games were going to only get worse. After all, she'd only used her mouth so far. There were plenty of other parts she could use to play with. He remembered getting flattened under her belly and shuddered at what she might do to him with her butt. He had no intention on finding out. He knew she'd eat him if he ran off. But she'd proven she'd eat him if he didn't too.

Calmly he swam to the side of the pool. He got out as quietly as possible, keeping an eye on the hippo. She was still lost in her own world, relishing his taste. Seeing Henriette this happy about the way he tasted further cemented the idea he had to get away from her. Stealthily he snuck into the undergrowth, wandering around to see if the hippo wasn't tricking him somehow. When he finally felt safe enough, he made a break for it. Running towards the open plains of the Savannah he'd use his speed and cunning to build a big head start before making his trail disappear with some clever tricks. The plan sounded good, right up until he heard a terrifying sound.

The heavy thunder of hippo footsteps got closer behind him, with Henriette's voice booming loudly. "Another round of Predator? Oh, you spoil me, Simba!" The cub's bravado broke, his cunning escape now another frantic sprint for survival. He couldn't tell from her voice if she caught on to him trying to escape or just wanted to play. She got closer and closer to him, but he'd learned from the last time. Simba didn't bother with ducking and weaving past shrubs. Nothing short of a tree or large boulder would knock this hippo off course. His strategy worked well, but Henriette was unrelenting. He could hear her panting loudly. She was just as out of breath as him, but neither wanted to be the first one to fold.

Eventually something just had to go wrong, and a missed low branch sent Simba tumbling into the undergrowth. The hippo was onto him, relishing her victory. The cub's leg hurt and he was frankly too tired to get away again. Henriette...
1322111112111.title: He wasn't waiting around to find out.

choices: Simba has to choose his punishment for the night
13221111121111.content:
The hippo was completely exhausted, but she'd rest once she'd claimed her prize. The little cub wouldn't be able to get away from her now. Though Henriette wouldn't tell the lion this in a thousand years, she was quietly proud of Simba. The plucky little cub proved to be a great prey to play around with. He was fast and agile, but still catchable. Not to mention that tenacity. She was out of breath and then some, but he was too. He'd run from her until his legs couldn't take him any further. Few of her past play-mates had ever achieved that.

Simba for his part was simply done. He'd twisted his leg and running was entirely out of the picture for a while. By now he had a surprisingly large amount of experience with the inside of the hippo's mouth, and he hoped his performance would grant him some form of mercy. But as hot breath washed over him the inevitable didn't take place. He didn't feel her slimy tongue drag across his body nor her lips suckling him. Instead the warm flow of hippo breath receded as she closed her mouth. Simba looked over his shoulder to see what she was up to, only to find her staring at him. She was lost in thought for a moment before refocusing her attention to him, a large frown adorning her face.

"Did you just try to escape from me?" She asked calmly, her tone failing to contain a sinister combination of anger and malice.

She knew. Henriette was aware of his escape attempt and she was none too pleased about it. Simba could only respond with shocked silence, all the hippo needed to confirm her suspicions.

"I warned you what would happen, but I guess a little demonstration is in order. No more playing around, I have to teach my little cub a lesson." She spoke harshly, before opening her maw again, approaching Simba.

She wastes no time scooping half the lion off the floor and closing her jaws, lifting the rest of him up in the air before quickly slurping it in with the rest. Simba was familiar with the insides of her mouth, but this time around everything was decidedly less playful. Her tongue pressed him against the ceiling with remarkable strength. He felt the air being pushed out of his lungs and the slick surface of the tongue slowly flattening him. As sudden as he was squashed up against the roof of her mouth Simba was dropped back down, only for the tongue to slam into him again and pin him to the side of her jaws. He used to think she was playing rough, but this was something else.

Concern switched to outright panic however when he was shoved onto a row of molars. Henriette's little lesson in obedience wasn't going to half-ass anything and Simba quickly found himself pinned between her teeth. He squealed in terror and closed his eyes. Then he opened them again. He was held firmly between the two rows of flat teeth. They pressed down a bit from time to time, but this was nothing like what he'd expected. He knew how strong a hippo's bite was. There was no way he should have survived this, and at that point things began to sink in. Most notably her teeth, which started slowly grinding a little back and forth, roughly squeezing the cub between them. Simba groaned in pain and discomfort as Henriette gently pressed her jaws together a little harder. She took utmost care not to break him, but she'd be damned if that sneaky cub wasn't going to suffer. Simba could barely believe what he was feeling. The overwhelming strength of the jaws crushed and squeezed him, compressing his body until his bones creaked, but never any further. Even now the hippo was making sure not to kill him, to preserve her toy.

Henriette walked back to her home, chewing on the cub along the way. Once they'd arrived she spat him out into her bed. Darkness had set in and she was getting ready to sleep. Simba was barely able to stand, coated in sticky saliva and utterly wracked with pain. He was miraculously without injury barring the leg, and that would probably be gone by tomorrow. The hippo quite literally chewing him out for trying to flee was another story. Said hippo didn't quite appear to be done with him just yet.

"Okay runt, this is what's gonna happen now..."
13221111121111.title: opens her maw wide.

"You get to pick where you sleep, but bad cubs like you only get two options. Either inside my belly or underneath it! You've got 30 seconds to make up your mind or I'm choosing for you."

Simba's mind was racing. The pain fell to the background as he focused on the hippo's harsh words. He had experienced being under as well as being in her belly. His mind flashed back to the overwhelming mass of her gut resting on top of him during their match. The uniquely terrifying experience of sliding down a hippo's throat and spending some time in her stomach was still freshly seared into his memory as well. Neither were a journey he wanted to make again soon. And for a whole night no less. Simba weighed his choices carefully and told Henriette:

"I want to sleep... "
