And as much as Simba wanted to do just that...Sarabi's words echoed back into his mind, and he sighed with a slight air of disappointment. "Ah, well...since you said the magic word." With that, the hippo dropped the father down onto his expansive stomach, the children who had wiggled away from their mother's shield laughing from the humorous sight of him drowning into all that pachyderm fat. "Now, here's the plan; I'm sure those hyenas I ate weren't the only ones who have been harassing you all, right? I'm going to hide behind that boulder, and you're going to go out and make yourself look like easy prey to some desperate predators. Then you bring that back here, and everyone's happy!" The father, more than a little flustered after almost meeting his end twice in under ten minutes, felt obliged to agree to Simba's plan.

"Alright, I could stand to do with less of those brutes trying to eat me every day..." The father of the antelope family tried to slide off hippo's soft belly, not able to feel the struggles of the two digesting hyenas deep inside. "But what's stopping us from just taking off the moment we're out of sight?" The moment he said that he regretted it. It was never a good idea to give someone that could eat you and your family with ease ideas.

"Oh, thanks, I can't believe I didn't think of that!" Simba slapped the side of his new hippo head, eternally grateful that the gazelle pointed out the flaw in his plan. His eyes landed on the two children nearby the horrified looking mother, appearing less scared of the great big hippo that saved them and more fascinated if anything else. "I know, you can just leave those two here with me while you're getting me a proper meal. Don't worry; I'll take excellent care of them...you know until you come back. Which you will, right?" The two adults looked like they couldn't believe what he just suggested, but before they could oppose the notion, the two kids, blissfully unaware as to how much danger they were in, paced up to the big fat goliath with big smiles. They seemed rather excited to spend some time with this big guy!

"A-alright...come on, dear, let's do it for them." The father antelope, having managed to get off from Simba's stomach, galloped away with his mate away from the boulder in search of attracting some opportunistic hyenas, leaving the hippo with their two kids. They seemed transfixed by him; they've probably never seen anyone so big before in their lives.

"So, let's get to know each other. My name's Simba, what's yours?" Simba smirked as he quickly, yet carefully, grabbed the two premature gazelles by surprise and hoisted them onto his expansive dome of a stomach with room to spare. The two were a bit scared at first, but their fears quickly dissipated as they giggled from how soft and warm their new seating was. "You guys gonna talk or just ogle my tummy all day?" He asked playfully, earning a blush from the more feminine looking gazelle.

"I'm Akinyi, and my brother's name is Okello." The brother, obviously less shy than his sister, dropped down to start hugging the tough yet yielding flesh of Simba's belly fat, earning a sudden yelp followed by a relaxed coo from the hippo in question. "Wait...your name can't be Simba. That was the name of the old king's son, and then he left."

“I am Simba!” The lion cub turned hippo pouted childishly. “I came back to get rid of Scar with the help of the other hippos and...uh, than they turned me into one.” SImba rubbed the back of his head as he oversimplified a very complicated and fantastical story about how he accidentally installed a new regime over the Pride Lands. Thankfully, the two kids had no reason to disbelieve such a claim.

“Woah, you mean you used to be smaller? Smaller than me?!” Okello’s eyes brightened up with curiosity. “That’s so cool! I wanna be a hippo! Please?” The boyish antelope tried to make himself look cute by making his eyes wide and tilting his head, which, in all fairness, was rather adorable. But even if Simba had any intention of fulfilling such a request, he just sent the only person that knew how to do it away with his mother.

“Uh...maybe later. For now, since I’m part of the family that rules the pride lands...I’m in charge.” The hippo smiled a little more mischievously, the oblivious kids innocently failing to notice the change. “And since I’m in charge, one of my duties is to look after and get to know my subjects. And I know the best way to do just that~”
13424122211211213214351321221.title: Protection At A Price

choices: He eats the hyena and hungers for dessert
He wonders what it feels like to shove the hyena up his butt like Michelle does
He keeps the hyena around to toy with
134241222112112132143513212212.content:
The cub turned hippo hovered his hands over the two little ones before suddenly bringing them down. Their legs were unsteady already on the flabby gut and the heavy hit made them buckle instantly. He pressed the two down into the soft mass.

"By hugging them!" The hippo announced with a cheery voice. The two gazelles cheered too now that the shock of the surprise had worn off. The squishy belly they were pushed into was endlessly soft, the smooth hide pleasant to the touch. They squirmed a little against the overbearing pressure but it was all fine for them.

Simba on the other hand felt things he'd not felt before. The sense of power he had was... intoxicating. Feeling those pathetic little things squirming against his strength. He could so easily crush... no, none of that. The hippo shook his head. He would ignore his instincts. But at the same time it gained him a new understanding to why Henriette and Michelle were so eager to throw their weight into him. He couldn't deny how much fun it was, and judging by the cheers from the little gazelles he wasn't the only one enjoying his new appearance.

He rubbed their little bodies against his belly, massaging his stomach as it worked through what was left of those hyenas. Hopefully the parents would bring more soon. He had leverage on them, yes, but if they cut their losses and ran the cub turned hippo would be left with a very paltry offering. The two kids didn't exactly have a lot of meat on their bones. Maybe one mouthful combined. After a while he released the little ones, letting them scramble back onto their hooves.

"Whee! That was fun, mister Simba. You must like being a hippo."

"I'm warming up to it." The pachyderm replied. He was mostly telling the truth too. In spite of his added chunkiness the cub felt remarkably powerful. Before he'd have to fear the hyenas, now they were the ones terrified of him. It felt good to be on the other side of that equation. But the ceaseless hunger that came with it was less pleasant. Even now he couldn't help but stare at those little morsels and wonder what it would feel like to add them to his big belly. Those parents better return soon.

"Will you be our big friend?" Okello asked with the gazelle equivalent of puppy eyes. How could the cub turned hippo possibly say no to something so cute?

"Of course!" He wrapped the two in his arms, pressing them against his flabby chest in a tight hug. They squirmed and cheered in his embrace, the hippo smiling down on the two. It would be so easy now. One little bite and... Again Simba shuddered, pushing back against his instincts. His mind was soon brought back to the gazelles as they had another request. "Play with us!"

The hippo quickly hatched a plan. He dissolved the hug just enough to grab hold of them, his large hands enveloping most of their little torsos. He raised his arms and brought each gazelle to an armpit, a weird sweaty stench wafting out from them. Before either could complain he brought his flabby arms down, smothering them in fatty mass. Their squirms and struggles were expected and as fun as ever. He made sure not to squeeze them too harshly, even if the desires in the back of his head tried to coerce him into killing them.

Playtime is quickly interrupted though when the parents can be heard screaming for their lives. "Help! Help! Somebody help!" Their voices rang out. They were closing in fast and turned the corner before Simba could react. They saw the flabby beast perched against the boulder, their kids' hind legs twitching as they were being smothered by the fat beast's foul armpits. It took every ounce of restraint for the father not to launch into a futile attack. But they needn't worry. The moment they came into view the hippo released the kids from their damp prisons and got up. He'd lost all interest in them as he hoped there'd be a fleet of hyenas ready for him. Akinya and Okello were stumbling around, nearly falling unconscious from the overwhelming... whatever it was the hippo had put them through.

Simba was not disappointed when he pushed past the two gazelles to inspect their pursuers. No less than seven hyenas were on their tail, all of them screeching to a halt and crashing into the hippo's big belly. The cub turned hippo acted fast, heaving his belly up high and bringing it down on the scrambling heap of hyena. A loud thump echoed across the plains as five of the predators were caught under the endless volume of fat. Before the remaining ones could turn tail and run the cub turned hippo grabbed them by their hind legs, dragging them into a crushing bear hug. He squeezed them as hard as he could, unleashing all those pent up urges he'd felt while hugging the little gazelles. With their bodies squished and the air forcefully removed from their lungs they didn't offer any more resistance as the hippo opened his maw wide and shoved one of them down his gullet. The other followed soon after.

The gazelle family waited behind the boulder, not wanting to watch what the cub might be doing to the hyenas. Each of those damn mutts deserved what was happening to them, but they couldn't shake the feeling that even seven of them wouldn't sate the hungry hippo. The speed with which they heard him gulp down his prey was terrifying.

The hippo started to fish the flattened hyenas out from under his dominant belly one by one. The ones that didn't struggle were sent down his throat. More feisty morsels were crushed into submission first. Either with more monstrous bear hugs or by wedging their heads in his smelly pits and letting them stew for a moment as he tried to squeeze their skulls under his arm. Each new meal made the rotund mass of his gut grow, but only after five of them had been down was there much of a noticeable difference. More miraculously, the cub began to feel a little full. There was still plenty of room for more, but at least it was heartening to know that big gut of him wasn't endless. With a squirming hyena in each hand he paused for a moment.

Simba let one of his victims fall to the ground before raising a large hippo foot over it. He stomped down with unrestrained glee, flattening the predator's torso and giggling as he felt the flailing limbs brush against his leg. The dry ground had cracked from the impact, a star pattern radiating out from his foot. The hippo felt so immensely strong. One step to reduce a fierce Savannah beast into a defenseless morsel, ready to eat. The cub turned hippo quickly acted, gobbling up the squished hyena and giving the last one a devious leer.
134241222112112132143513212212.title: Simba playfully squishes the two gazelles

choices: Simba tells the truth; he got hungry
Simba lies; they just up and left
1342412221121121321435132122121.content:
Simba, ignoring the desperate pleas for mercy and release from the last hyena in his grip, took the time to sit his fat ass down on the floor of the savannah and get himself comfortable for his meal's finishing. He gave his bloated stomach, filled with struggling and wriggling prey, a hearty slap, making the blubbery hide bounce like a bowl of gelatin. Despite the six mammals stewing away, his belly felt nowhere near full, sedated, but not content. "Please! Oh, God, just let me go! We never did anything to you; what did we do to deserve this!?" The last hyena sobbed, the adult gazelles covering their children's ears from the pitiful screams. The cub turned hippo, now in a playfully horny mood, decided to tease the prey just a bit more before sealing him away for good.

Simba let the hyena fall to the ground, but before he had a chance to get to his feet and escape, the hippo sat the poor thing up and pushed his fat belly into his face and body, forcing him to try and shove it off him or suffocate from its crushing weight. "P-p-p-please!" That was the only word he could get out before Simba interrupted him.

"Please, what?! Speak up, mutt!" All the air was drained out of the last hyena as he crushed him further with his colossal belly mass. Simba just kept relentless taunting the weak prey. "What's the matter, too much for you? Yeah, your brothers are fucking heavy!" Wordless gasps of breath came from the last hyena as the hippo watched with sadistic intent.

"Wow, I bet that hurts on a sore chest, huh? Can you even feel your brothers moving around in there? Probably not, they're as good as junk food now. They can wriggle all they want, but it isn't going to do anything. You can barely tell I ate them; I've got such a big fat gut that I bet someone your size wouldn't even make a dent in all this." Simba accented his last remark with jiggling his enormous belly. After that, the hippo finally got off of him, letting the hyena breathe in long, painful gulps of air. The predator took this time to grab his food's legs and pull them up onto the top of his stomach, his feet squishing daintily into his chubby moobs. He was getting too hungry to let this go on any further. "Should have stayed home...but I guess it's too late now...ahhhhh~."

Simba lifted the hyena's foot-paws into his mouth and clamped his lips down on his ankles. He swallows up to his bony calves as the soon to be hippo-food weaky beats at his snout, making the hippo, in turn, pin his body to his soft chest. He swallowed past his thighs and crotch, and all the hyena could do was whine, watching as he sank further and further into Simba's maw. The gulps of the hippo's power throat dragged the hyena in and bulging into a vast, almost comical lump as his body passed down his gullet. Then his chest disappeared and began to panic as his head reached the hippo's maw, crying and whining but forming no words.

And then...no more hyena. Simba fell onto his back with a satisfied groan, his stomach swelling only subtly and letting out a shameless belch while he rubbed his full tummy in bliss. "Mister Simba?" The hippo that was once a lion lazily opened one of his eyes as the silence was broken, Okello with his sister Akinya standing by his side while his parents watched from afar in fear. "You seem tired? Those mean hyenas didn't hurt you, did they?" A wide smile spread across the hippo's face to Okello's question, while his stomach let out a low gurgle at the prospect of even more food. He rolled over onto his side and placed his arm around the two gazelles, playfully trapping them while they did not attempt to escape.

"Naw, I'm not tired, just relaxed. It takes a lot of food for this big ol' gut to stop shouting at me, and those hyenas hit the spot! But thanks for making sure I was okay." Simba, no longer feeling very predatorial after his need for food, was abated, leaned in, and gave each of the gazelle children a gentle nuzzle on the head, making them chirp and giggle. Though before long, the hippo noticed that they both had distinctive red blushed coming up from their cheek fur. "Hey, do you both have something on your mind? You look like you're going to pass out with all that blood in your face." He playfully poked at Akinya's blush, only making it more pronounced.

"That thing you did with us before mom and dad came...it was bizarre…" The female antelope tried burying her face into Simba's semi-taut stomach to keep him from looking at her, but it did nothing to stop the hippo from noticing her mouth twist into an involuntary smile. Okello, equally as embarrassed but less timid, inched further along towards Simba's armpit, where the hippo had him trapped not too long ago. "Mhmm...but kinda fun, too. You must think we're a couple of nutcases..."

"Oh, you better believe I think you two are nutcases. That wasn't supposed to be kinda fun; it was supposed to be loads of fun!" As soon as Simba says this, he gives out a mischievous smirk as he swings Akinya over past the high dome of a stomach that she was nuzzling. At the same time, Okello was forcibly shoved further along his arm's fatty mass until he was smothered against the sweaty flesh. He squirmed and wiggled and whined, but Simba knew he wasn't trying to break free. "Nawww, see? Your brother seems to be having fun. Do you want to join him?" He teased, the parents in the background, getting more and more agitated at what was happening to their kids.

"N-no...but, uhm...there is s-something we were thinking of doing with you." Akinya shuffled her hooved atop Simba's grey stomach, her blush looking as red as a tomato. "If you're okay with it...but I can't say it out loud, can I whisper it to you?" Simba's curiosity was piqued, and there was something so endearing about how shy the little gazelle was around him, so he bent his head down to lend an ear and fulfill her request. Mustering up her courage, the girlish antelope whispered what she and Okello wanted Simba to do with them.

Simba blinked, unsure if he heard the little girl right, but he wasn't against it, not at all. With a big smile, the hippo petted Akinya's head before gripping her by her torso, followed shortly by Okello from his sweaty prison. He had a wicked, dopey smile on his face as he recovered from what the hippo put him through, and had to lean against his sister as he set the two gazelles on the ground. The hippo, a little excited for what was to come, gave the still lucid of the siblings a final nod before turning around and falling backward ass-first onto the two kids.

"What are you doing?!" The father, not able to hide his anger any longer, came charging up to the hippo as his children disappeared from view, buried under hundreds of pounds of thick fat. "Get off of our kids, now!" Simba, amused, gave the two adults a lazy grin while letting out another shameless belch.

"What's with all the hostility? I'm just doing as they asked me to do with them, you should be happy for your kids speaking up for themselves." Simba cooed as he felt the two childish antelopes underneath him squirm and writhe, making sure that he bent most of his weight on his belly, so they weren't crushed. "They're pretty comfy, too, I gotta say. Like two cute little cushions~."

"What the hell is wrong with you, monster?!" The mother finally spoke up, lunging past her husband to sink her teeth into Simba's belly flesh. She wasn't a carnivore; her teeth weren't built for eating meat, and even if they were, the hippo's flesh as too tough to pierce, but she felt like she had to try. Simba giggled at the tickling sensation the angry mother made on his stomach before the sudden movement from the outside prompted another gurgle. It looks like those hyenas weren't enough...but two gazelles might.

There was no ceremony, no chance for them even to realize what was happening before it was too late, that's how much they meant to the hippo at the end of the day. The mother was the first to go, Simba hoisting her up from her mouth's hold on his belly before she was tossed into his maw like a piece of celery. Without having to bend down that much, he reached for the father of the two kids he was squishing with his titanic rear end, only having enough time to let out a second long scream before he joined his wife. They entered the rest of the hyenas in his stomach, finally leaving the cub turned pachyderm stuffed, dooming them to be just another layer of fat on his frame. Soon, all that would be left of them would be their children, Okello and Akinya.

Speaking of the two kids that Simba had just orphaned, around this time, they began to slow their movements, signaling to the hippo that they needed air fast. Quickly he lifted his fat ass from the ground of the grasslands, two little antelopes gasping with smiles on their faces in an indent in the field. "You're so heavy, Mister Simba...!" Okello groaned, stretching his back. "But so sooooft!"

"Hey...where did mom and dad go?" Akinya blinked and noticed that their parents were no longer in sight. "Mister Simba, did you see where they went?"
1342412221121121321435132122121.title: He eats the hyena and hungers for dessert

choices: They believe Simba and stand down
They don't believe Simba and manage to subdue him
They don't believe Simba and attack the hippo. It doesn't end well for them
13424122211211213214351321221211.content:
"Right here, kiddo." Simba patted his belly, explaining in an almost disturbingly casual tone to the two kids that their parents were gone forever. The huge hippo gut sagged and moved a little from all the squirming prey inside. It even gave the cub turned hippo a moment's pause as he realized how easily he talked about ending lives. More than ten animals had already met their demise just to sate his hunger and these little morsels in front of him looked tastier by the second. Maybe he could slowly crush them under his ass first, feel their squirms halt completely and~.

The hippo's thoughts were cut short when Akinya replied with excitement. "Wow, that's so cool! You just swallowed them whole!"

Of all the reactions, that was just about the last one Simba expected. He was ready for tears, anger, begging and crying. Okello too remarked with awe. "That's them squirming in there, isn't it?" Then he said something the hippo hadn't expected to hear in a thousand years.

"Can we go in too? I bet you're super soft on the inside, I wanna see."

Both of them seemed completely oblivious to the permanent nature of things going down his gullet, but Simba didn't feel like leaving these two little scraps on the table. He motioned for them to get closer. With big, happy smiles the gazelles approached the fat beast. They let the hippo grab them, large hands wrapping around their little bodies. The cub turned hippo gave them a broad smile before asking the important question.

"So, who wants to go first?"

"Me! Me! Me!" They both shouted. The noise startled the blubbery beast for a moment, but seemingly at random he picked Okello, bringing the little gazelle close to his maw. The broad lips barely parted, giving the confused orphan a small kiss before slurping him inside like a noodle. Akinya giggled as she saw her brother get slurped up, the hippo gulping exaggeratedly to make it even more of a show. He let her watch as the bulge that was Okello sank down his neck and disappeared into his belly to join the squirming mass.

The starry-eyed gazelle joined him in a record-breaking time. Simba opened wide and threw her down his gullet, swallowing Akinya whole and sending her rocketing into his stomach in seconds. He gave his big belly a satisfied rub before lying back against a large boulder. He'd promised Michelle not to be out for too long, but his eyes felt heavy and his belly heavier. Surely a little nap wouldn't hurt, right?

A few hours had passed and the sun was starting to set. The cub turned hippo yawned loudly, opening his voracious maw wide. A dozen prey, all turned into jiggly mass on his body. Simba was surprised to see how much mass he'd gained. Everything looked a little weird before he realized he'd gotten almost a foot taller. Hippo metabolism was something else. Unfortunately it also meant the familiar rumbling in his belly was back. With a weary sigh the cub turned hippo weighed his options. He should probably go home before Michelle gets concerned. But out here he might find some more to eat. In the end the hippo decides to head for Pride Rock. Hopefully a little snack would be in his way.

As he walked Simba began to wonder how the other hippos dealt with this constant, nagging hunger. They seemed so well-adjusted to it. It also made him wonder how quickly they could strip the Savannah of all life if they let their bellies guide them. He alone had eaten so much already and mere hours later he felt like he could stomach even more. Next his thoughts wandered to his newly gained size. If he kept growing like this he could soon add larger animals to the menu. Was there even a limit on this? How much bigger until he could put the other hippos in his belly? The fat beast chuckled. It'd take a lot of work before he'd be able to fit that chunky family in his gut. He was so distracted with thoughts about food and girth that he didn't notice the twig snapping nearby. Something was stalking him.

"Aaah!" The cub turned hippo let out a surprised yelp as a lion suddenly jumped out in front of him. He didn't recognize him immediately, but Simba was certain he'd seen this guy before. The bushes around him rustled and from them sprang more lions. There were eight in total, surrounding the cub and growling menacingly. They must've left Pride Rock when the hippos took over, preferring life in the Savannah over enduring what the new owners had in mind for them. After seeing and hearing how Michelle manhandled the lions that resisted their rule he couldn't help but think they made the smart choice. But unfortunately, they weren't too fond of hippos as a result.

"Well well well, looks like we got ourselves a lonely little straggler. We all know what happens to those that fall behind, don't we? The predators get them." The lead lion growled. "This is for Pride Rock, you monster."

"Wait! It's me, Simba! The hippos forced Rafiki to turn me into one of them. I want to kick them out of Pride Rock too!"

The lions all look at eachother. There was something familiar about that hippo's voice, but that story sounded unlikely at best. It certainly wasn't the response they expected out of their little ambush. Simba tried to steady himself. He didn't want to fight lions, especially eight of them. But at the same time they would prove a decent meal... No, these were his friends. His tasty-looking friends.
13424122211211213214351321221211.title: Simba tells the truth; he got hungry

choices: Finish him off, with a powerful blast.
Keep farting on him, humiliating Simba.
Smother Simba with his ass, until he passes out.
Stand up and crush him with his stomach.
Change his method, making Simba smell his groin.
14.content:
"Thunder! The elephant!" For Simba's surprise, he was facing a really big elephant. By the elephant's look Simba could guess that he wrestled for a while now, and that he was older than Simba was. He realized lately that Thunder was getting closer, ready to start wrestling, Simba backed away in fear as Thunder watched the young lion's pathetic reaction. "Ha ha! I almost feel sorry for you kiddo" Thunder said as he turned around to show Simba his incredibly big butt, even for an elephant. Among the panic and fear, Simba wasn't able to dodge in time, he was slammed by thunder's butt, stuck between his cheeks. The crow started to cheer for the easy victory Thunder accomplished, but, in fact, that was only the beginning.

Simba was crushed under Thunder's rear, and the weight of the fat elephant didn't let him slip out to safety, that, combined with the smell of Thunder's rear were making the lion struggle harder and harder, but it was useless. "Is that all you got? I'm not even using my full weight!" and Thunder wasn't lying, and he proved that by sitting harder in Simba's face, making him squirm and cry for help as he felt his face sinking into Thunder's butt, but that wasn't what Thunder had in mind to the wrestling match.

"So, should I start 'warming him up'? Thunder asked to the audience as they all cheered and yell at Thunder to finish him off, however, the elephant wanted to have some fun before winning the match. As Simba squirmed under the heavy beast butt, Thunder got ready to make this match, one that Simba would never forget. His stomach started grumbling, before Simba could even wonder what was happening a hot tiny, yet powerful fart came out right on Simba's face. The evil fumes coming out of Thunder's rear made Simba cry for help once again. "Look kiddo, if you can't even bear one of my 'tiny farts' then you will be dead when we get to the real action" Thunder mocked at the poor lion's situation as he rubbed his ass to make sure Simba could get the full experience. At that moment, Thunder's next move were about to begin, he was going to...
14.title: Thunder the elephant

141.content:
"Warmup's over kiddo, time to bring the heat!" Thunder snorted, pleased with his antics.

Simba was hopelessly outmatched on every front. This elephant was so much bigger and stronger than him it wasn't even funny. Well, the crowd was getting a good laugh in, seeing the cub get flattened underneath Thunder's massive rear. And their laughter didn't abate when he stood up again, revealing Simba to the world once more. The cub was wedged firmly between his buttcheeks, their flabby mass easily pinning him in place. With each movement the elephant made his round bottom jiggled a little, inadvertently crushing and smothering the cub with his rank stench. Somewhere much deeper lay his shuddering pucker, which he held firmly shut. The next fart would blow his opponent away in one foul blast.

Thunder grit his teeth and clenched his buttocks together, pressing down on Simba in the process. But squashing the cub wasn't his main goal, as louder and louder gurgles emanated from his huge gut. The little lion knew precisely what he was in for, but he was powerless to do anything about it. For a good minute he kept thinking the elephant had reached his peak volume, but the gurgling just kept on building. Eventually Thunder bent forward a little, ready to destroy his opponent in one filthy blow. Simba could hear the gas travelling through the elephantine guts, racing towards him. At the last moment he closed his eyes and prayed for a miracle.

The sound erupting from Thunder's rear was loud enough to start earthquakes and the amount of gas passed was enough to launch the little cub across the arena. Because of the slightly bent posture of the elephant Simba was propelled towards the ground, which he hit with a loud smack before sliding through the dirt towards one of the trees marking the edge of the ring. More horrifying then the noise or the force behind this butt blast was the smell. It had dissipated quickly into the air, but the little cub had received a shot at almost point blank range. Words couldn't describe the potency of the elephant's concentrated gas and the painful stinging Simba experienced in his nose. It made the crushing pressure of an elephant sitting on him feel like a walk in the park by comparison.

Thunder was very pleased with himself. He built up the suspense with the crowd beautifully and unleashed the best fart he'd ever had right in Simba's face. He couldn't be happier with himself right now, and to top it all of he would get to take the little cub home with him as a prize. Oh the things he'd do to that poor little thing. Only for a few days though, Thunder wasn't completely horrible. He was so busy thinking up things to do with the little lion he didn't notice him struggling to stand up again. Miraculously the cub wasn't out of the count just yet. Either his brains had been farted out or he was just amazingly stubborn, nobody knew. Thunder looked down at the defiant little cub, his brow nearly tearing itself off his face in sheer bewilderment.

"How in the hell..."

Simba didn't say anything back, he just grinned. Thunder didn't know what to think. This little twerp had defied his mighty farts which was unheard of. On the other hand, this meant he could have another bit of fun with him. The elephant figured that was enough to look past the dopey grinning of the little lion.

"I'm impressed... bigger wrestlers have been floored by that sort of firepower." The elephant's upbeat smile then turned into a smile filled with spite and malice. "How's about as a reward you get to play with my..."
141.title: Finish him off, with a powerful blast.

choices: Put Simba back on the ground
Keep Simba in his trunk for more torment
1411.content:
"My trunk would love to meet you." Thunder laughed. It was an open secret around the Savannah that the elephant loved the smell of his own product. He stomped towards the little cub, making him shake on his unsteady legs with every heavy step. His trunk impatiently reached for the cub, sniffing the air loudly. Simba reeked of elephant gas and soon the large trunk hovered in front of him. Simba stood his ground, but was terrified. His fight so far had consisted of the elephant simply sitting down on him. What was he going to do to turn this around?

Suddenly, with the speed of a striking cobra, the trunk shot forward, quickly coiling itself around the cub once and lifting him up. Subtlety wasn't Thunder's strong suit as he snorted loudly all over the little lion, relishing the scent. His trunk was adamant about not letting Simba go and he could feel it. The muscular mass around him squeezed tightly, making it difficult to breathe. He hacked and coughed but this only seemed to inspire even more fiercely possessive tendencies from the elephant. Another coil joined the first and he kept on crushing the cub with his trunk, seemingly oblivious to just how effectively he was wrestling with him.

When Thunder finally took notice Simba was almost blue in the face. The trunk quickly loosened itself and dropped the lion on the ground. "Ya holdin out there squirt? Ah couldn't help myself, you smell so nice now. One more little sample, alright?" Simba didn't need to say anything. He just needed to put as much distance as possible between him and the elephant. He didn't care if all the Savannah branded him a coward. He was not staying in the ring with Thunder for another second. To even begin this fight was madness and he wouldn't suffer another second of torment by the elephant's hand. He ran as fast as his little legs would take him, fueled by adrenaline and sheer uncut terror. It took him a few moments before he realized he was running in place, with a familiar sensation curled around his tail.

The elephant laughed, releasing Simba's tail and letting him suddenly sprint off only to stumble over his own legs and fall down. The muscular organ followed the cub to his little crash site and continued to smell him, sucking in air loudly. The loud snorting was violently interrupted when Simba felt a most singularly foul sensation. A creeping slimy feeling ran down his tail as he slowly looked backward to find it lodged right up Thunder's trunk. He expected the elephant to be just as surprised, but the grey monster just smiled at him. Suddenly he snorted, and the rest of Simba's tail was pulled up his nose. Not satisfied with just a tail the trunk kept snorting, sucking it's way towards Simba's butt before beginning to stretch. Simba knew elephant trunks to be quite flexible, but this was something he'd never conceived. It looked like Thunder wanted to suck the little cub right up his trunk. And given how small Simba was compared to the large elephant, he might just be able to pull it off too. Panic gripped the little lion. He couldn't think of a place he wanted to be less then an elephants snotty trunk. Already slime clung to his tail and Thunder showed no signs of slowing down.

SNNNRRRFFFTT

Simba couldn't believe what he felt. Half his body had been pulled into the large trunk and with only his forepaws free he was hopelessly outmatched. Thunder simply lifted him a little bit off the ground and continued to suck the cub into his trunk. Inch by slimy inch the lion's body vanished into the strong elephant trunk. Soon Simba's forepaws too were rendered moot as only his head remained. With a final loud snort the little cub was pulled completely up Thunder's trunk, who was enjoying every second of the experience. He cooed with unfettered joy, both at the pleasing stench in his trunk and the meekly squirming lion trapped inside of it.

What does he do next?
1411.title: trunk

14111.content:
Simba was certain he was in a bind no other lion had ever experienced. Thick slime clung to his fur as the muscular surroundings of Thunder's trunk twisted and pulsed around him. They held him pinned inside with ease, producing a clearly visible squirming bulge for all to see. The elephant himself was pleased to see the cub struggle against him, knowing the crowd would appreciate it. They were for the most part utterly shocked at the spectacle before them. They'd seen Thunder fight smaller opponents before, but Simba was the puniest he'd faced in a very long time. The crowd burst into cheering seeing the elephant bring his power to bear in such a unique way. The trapped cub could hear the muffled cheers as well.

Simba groaned bitterly, knowing his fate was in the hands, or more accurately trunk, of Thunder. He was tempted to pull out his claws and tear into his captor, but he knew the rules. If he drew so much as a drop of blood the elephant would probably release him instantly, but he'd face punishment. Timon and Pumbaa were never entirely clear on what sort of punishment this was, but the cub can only imagine what an angry elephant could do to him. For now he would have to accept that he was stuck in this slimy prison. elephant snot matted down his fur and eased his movements in the strong trunk. It was at that point Simba began to realize he wasn't just kept in the trunk, he was moving along its length.

Thunder was in no rush to continue his plan, loving the cheering crowd and showing them the squirming bulge in his trunk up close. With every snort he got another deep whiff of the cub's scent. The little lion stunk of his farts and Thunder loved it. He also felt every snort pulling the cub a little bit further up the flexible trunk. Snot would keep everything running smoothly and he was sucking in lots of air with every snort. Thunder considered trying to pull Simba back down and stretch out his enjoyment, but a devious idea was conjured. So what if that pesky lion ends up outside my trunk? I'll just suck him in again and start all over. It was time to show that lion a bit of elephant anatomy.

Simba felt himself creep through the elephant's trunk at a snail's pace. He grew tired of trying to fight back, seeing as all of his struggles had accomplished a sum total of nothing. He weakly continued, fearing retaliation from the elephant if he fell still, but he wasn't sure how much longer he'd last before throwing in the towel. The further he went, the more disgusting slime he carried with him. It stuck to his fur like glue and bit by bit coated his entire fluffy coat. As he was sucked in deeper he felt more and more like an elephant booger. Simba began to wonder what would happen next. He'd seen elephants suck things up their trunk and shoot them out again. He'd be a snotty projectile for Thunder, who would probably point him somewhere humiliating. Suddenly he realized he could hear the elephant's delighted groaning quite close. He must be right at the end, the cramped tunnel finally widening. He was greeted with more darkness and slime and the cub braced himself for launch. What he faced instead would haunt him for some time.

With a drawn-out snort Simba was pulled through the elephant's sinuses and right down the back of its throat. A large tongue blocked the way, preventing the slimy lion from slipping down into Thunder's stomach. Consumption of foes was strictly forbidden and even a huge contestant like Thunder was not above reproach. The penalty was severe and he frankly didn't even want to end things that quickly. If a quick win was all he was after he'd have grabbed the little tyke with his trunk and just squeezed him until he'd lose consciousness. But where's the fun in that? The people wanted a show and he would give them one they would not soon forget. He already had them floored with this feat of bodily control, sucking a lion cub up his trunk and into his mouth.

Simba's trek through the elephant's body was halted the large tongue. It carried Simba away from the dark tunnel of Thunder's gullet and left him in the middle of a wide open mouth. The elephant happily showed off his prize, the snot-coated lion cub, to all around. The crowd went completely ballistic, not only at the utter humiliation put upon the cub, but also Thunder's great creativity. He'd turned the most one-sided match in history into something unique and spectacular. What does he do next with the little slime-covered lion in his mouth?
14111.title: Pull Simba into his mouth

choices: grabbed Simba out of his mouth with his trunk.
141111.content:
Simba barely got a moment to regain his bearings before Thunder closed his mouth. His snot-soaked body was too slippery for him to mount any sort of escape. He felt a light bit of panic set in as he realized there not only was room to spare in the cavernous maw, but he was perched atop a tongue easily the size of him. The only light in this darkness was that Thunder appeared to be aware of the rules. He actively stopped himself from trying to swallow the cub, so whatever might happen he would not end up in an elephant belly. The little lion wasn't given a lot of time to enjoy this relief as the tongue beneath him began to stir.

Thunder was well-versed in using his mouth to secure a win. Most of the time he'd just suckle on his opponent's head until they tapped out, but with Simba he could suckle on the whole damn thing. An opportunity like this didn't present itself often and he would take full advantage of it. Already the weakly squirming body in his mouth tasted like a heady mix of his farts and his snot. A tasty blend for the elephant, who quickly began to salivate at the thought of playing with the lion cub in his mouth. He coiled his agile tongue around the little lion, licking him and scrubbing off some of the snot. It was replaced with a thick coat of saliva only marginally less sticky. But what it lacked in power was made up for in volume.

Simba held on as best he could with the large tongue slathering him in stinky elephant drool. Any attempt to run or hide was rendered moot by the slippery slime sticking to his body. With a tongue this size Thunder didn't need to try very hard to fully cover the cub, but he made sure to go over every part of him as much as he wanted to. The little lion almost grew familiar with the huge tongue coiling around him when the elephant introduced a new trick. Each time he wrapped his flexible tongue around the cub he squeezed it a little. Simba could barely believe what he felt. This tongue could constrict him too, just like the trunk? At least the pressure was only brief and manageable for the most part, or was Thunder simply holding back?

The elephant switched up the torment again, laying out the little cub on his tongue and pressing upwards against the roof of his mouth. The surface was hard and unyielding, Simba yelped as pain surged through him. Thunder quickly grew bored of this little squashing and dropped Simba past his tongue to the small pool of saliva at the bottom of his mouth. The heavy tongue simply rested in its neutral position, laying its weight atop the cub. Simba was surprised. This tongue may be pure muscle the size of him, but it was surprisingly light. He bucked a little and pushed it away with ease. It quickly swept to the size and wrapped itself around the cub again, going for some more good old licking and squeezing.

Thunder was almost done with his routine, but he knew one more fiendish trick to force the cub to surrender to him. He carefully probed his tongue between the lion's hind legs and began to lick his crotch repeatedly. Simba could barely hold on as he felt the coarse saliva-coated tongue rub against him. He felt what the elephant was up to. One last humiliation. He groaned as he felt the devious plan take effect. Slowly his cock emerged from its sheath and Thunder wasted no time giving it all the attention his tongue could offer. Simba's struggles were meaningless to the elephant, who grew a wicked grin as he assaulted the lion's puny cock with his huge tongue. With a muffled scream the cub came on Thunder's tongue, who swiftly lapped up the pathetic amount of white goo.

With some deft maneuvering Thunder pushed Simba forward until his saliva-coated head emerged between the elephant's lips. He looked thoroughly worn out, one eye glued shut with a blend of dried up snot and saliva. The large elephant let the vulture fly in to inspect the lion, opening his maw to show the rest of the knackered lion's body. The crowd was cheering loudly, seeing the king of the jungle lying still on the elephant's tongue. The vulture could see Simba was alive and uninjured, just exhausted. He mills it over for a moment before flying back to the side of the ring.

"Amazing, ladies and gentlemen. The young prince still has some fight in him!" He yelled. Simba wondered if the vulture was referring to a different prince. He could barely move, let alone fight. Least of all fight a huge elephant. Thunder simply smiled, closing his maw again around the lion and leaving his head peering out between two heavy lips. Next up, Thunder...
141111.title: Tongue torment

choices: The crowd calls for a different punishment.
1411112.content:
The elephant's flexible trunk reached in and neatly coiled itself around the dazed lion cub in his mouth. He opened wide and lifted Simba out, proudly showing him to the crowd. The cub just let the large elephant have his fun, hanging limp in the strong grip of the trunk. He was utterly drenched in saliva and snot, but thankful to still be alive.

"You still with me, squirt?" Thunder mockingly asked. He gave the little lion a powerful squeeze, making him twitch and sputter.

"Ah good, for a moment I was afraid you'd passed out on me." He said, still parading around the ring and holding the slimy body up high. The crowd cheered the elephant on with undying applause.

"Please..." The little lion sputtered out. Thunder held him closer to one of his large ears. "What was that, squirt?" The elephant asks. Simba repeats himself: "Please... mercy..."

Thunder laughed loudly. "He wants mercy! Tell you what people, I think he's got one more move in him. What will we use to finish the fight?" Simba gulped. The elephant still wasn't done with him? What had he done to deserve this? He listened as Thunder began to rattle off all the different ways in which he could be finished off, an overpowering sense of dread growing with each evil suggestion.

"Maybe another powerful squeeze of the 'ol trunk, I know that's always a crowd-pleaser." Thunder said, giving Simba a small sample as a demonstration. The little lion twitched and wriggled as the powerful trunk wrung the breath out of him. "Or maybe another ride up its length?" The cub felt the tip of the trunk loudly snorting next to his tail. The crowd's applause was unceasing, not growing any more or less intense for any of the suggestions. Unfazed, Thunder continued. "Maybe another quick dip into my hungry maw. A second taste of lion is always a nice treat. Or perhaps we go for some other part of my big 'ol body." Simba gulped. What more could he possibly have in store?

"Would y'all like to see me stomp him flat? Or squash him under my big belly?" Simba's eyes widened. That would be a death sentence for sure. How was Thunder going to stop himself from killing his opponent? He hoped feverishly for any other option. Even a trip up the trunk sounded positively relaxing compared to the prospect of being trampled by Thunder. "Or... Will this big butt see some action? It's been a while since I made someone disappear into it." The cub's mind was blown. How was this allowed? Did the rule about consuming opponents not count with butts? The crowd meanwhile knew what the elephant meant. They remembered the poor hyena that was pushed into Thunder's pucker. All the way up to its neck he was buried inside the elephant's colon, and after surrendering that's where he was kept as Thunder walked off victoriously. Nobody had seen that hyena since, leaving rumors aplenty about Thunder.

"Alright people, let me hear your favorite!" The elephant shouted, prompting the crowd to yell their choices at him. Simba couldn't hear a single favourite choice and simply continued hoping he would survive the fight to begin with.
1411112.title: He grabs Simba with his trunk.

14111121.content:
"The trunk! The trunk! Give him the trunk!" The crowd yelled above all things. Thunder smiled and lifted his victim up high for all to see. Simba braced himself as best he could, preparing for the muscular coils around him to crush him once again. Instead the elephant was ruminating on an idea. He'd thought about it before, but most of the time his opponents were too heavy to try this particular trick. With the little cub it could work.

The meaty trunk wrapped itself around the lion a little tighter, adding an extra coil to lock Simba in a powerful grip. Surprisingly the elephant seemed to hold back on the pressure. The cub knew well that he could squeeze a lót harder with his trunk. He wasn't given time to question the grey monster's actions any further as Thunder set his plan into motion. He stretched the trunk out as far as he could, holding the little cub firmly. Slowly he moved the little confused lion through the air in a circle. Simba was utterly bewildered. What in the hell was the elephant doing? As he went full circle the elephant span him around again, a little faster this time. Slowly it began to dawn on the cub what was happening as each lap went by faster and faster.

Thunder was cautious in the execution of what he'd dubbed 'the helicopter' in his mind. He wasn't sure if he could pull it off or whether flinging the little cub around over his head would hurt his trunk too much. He started easy to get a feel for things but quickly picked up the pace as he felt more confident in his ability to perform. Simba had taken to screaming as he was flung around faster still. The crowd could barely keep their eyes on the cub as he soared through the air, still firmly in the grasp of Thunder's strong trunk. Simba's world was nothing but a blur now, and his stomach felt queasy from the speed. After only a few seconds of full speed Thunder slowed down and gently set the little lion back down on the ground.

Simba stumbled and wobbled on his feet, barely able to stay upright. He tried to focus on his enemy, but he couldn't tell which of the three blurry spinning elephants was the real one. He felt sick to his stomach from the speed and the iron grip of the trunk. He inevitably fell over, failing to even find his feet again and stand up. Thunder almost felt bad for the little guy, leaning his trunk in for an inquisitive poke.

"You alright there, squirt?" He asked insincerely. The vulture smiled and flew into the ring to make things official.

"Simba is no longer able to fight! Your winner is Thunnnnder!" He yelled to raucous applause. The crowd cheered and clapped loudly, highly entertained by the merciless beatdown the elephant had laid upon the little cub. The vulture then turned his attention to Thunder.

"Now, as is our tradition, you are allowed to claim your opponent as your own. What will you do?"

"I think we both know where this cub is going, don't we?" The elephant answered playfully.
14111121.title: "Squeeze him with your trunk!"

141111211.content:
The vulture just nodded before leaving the two alone in the ring. Thunder wasted no time and quickly grabbed the dizzy lion with his trunk. He opened his mouth wide and dropped Simba in. The cub was in no position to fight, still barely able to see straight from being flung around. His body lay on the tongue, responding to its movements only by flopping and rolling around in the elephant's mouth. Thunder maneuvered him to lie straight, his head poking between the large lips of the elephant. He smiled, showing off the cub one last time to the cheering crowd.

With the little lion in his mouth Thunder stepped out of the ring and went on his way. He shooed away any remaining groupies before walking home through the empty savanna. Simba's vision was finally focused again, but his strength was still recovering from the pummeling it had taken. Not that it would matter much against the elephant, who hummed a cheery tune to himself. Suddenly the elephant interrupted his humming and spoke.

"It was nice to meet you in the ring. But you only really get to know someone out here..." Simba was confused as to what the pachyderm was on about.

"It's so much more intimate... no crowd... no ref... no rules..."
141111211.title: "In my mouth!"

choices: Simba wakes up in Thunder's colon.
1411112111.content:
The elephant's tongue shot into action, wrapping around Simba and pulling him towards the back of his throat. It shoved him into the elephant's waiting gullet and easily subdued the little lion's frantic struggles. The cub barely had time to panic before he felt the powerful muscles of Thunder's throat clamp down on his lower body. The large elephant closed his eyes and concentrated on the screaming lion in his mouth. Then, with one big gulp, he swallowed him whole.

Simba felt the gulp course across his body, pulling him off the tongue and into a narrow, squeezing tunnel. The fast movement was disorienting and he could do little to resist the powerful elephant all around him. The journey was smooth and slippery, the cub feeling his body being pushed along the tight passage of Thunder's esophagus, slowing only briefly before landing in his stomach with a big splash.

The little lion looked around in the dark chamber, but couldn't see anything. He heard the stomach ooze slosh about and a distinct dripping from the stomach walls. The stench was overwhelming, reminiscent of the stench in Thunder's mouth but a thousand times worse. Every few seconds the stomach would churn, the walls bumping into Simba and the ooze clinging to his fur. The cub was in a state beyond panicking now. What was there left he could do? The tough stomach lining wouldn't budge to any of his attacks and he doubted he'd be able to convince Thunder to let him out. The elephant probably couldn't even hear him if he tried.

The elephant continued on his merry way, cheerily humming a tune. Inside Simba slowly drifted out of consciousness. The putrid air in the big stomach was almost impossible to breathe. After only a few more minutes the little lion blacked out completely.
1411112111.title: Thunder swallows Simba

14111121111.content:
In the weeks to follow not a creature in the savanna caught sight of Simba. Timon and Pumbaa searched everywhere but came up empty-handed. The first animal they asked for his whereabouts was Thunder of course. The elephant was most helpful to them, explaining what happened after the fight.

"Simba? After our match we had a little private chat. I thanked him for not weaseling out of the fight and helping me put on a good show. We got to know eachother a little more closely and then we parted ways. I haven't seen him since, sorry."

They kept searching for a few more weeks, but ultimately had to accept they'd lost the little cub. They could only hope that wherever he wandered, Simba would be okay. Rumors about the lion's disappearance traveled far and wide, but only Thunder would know the truth.
14111121111.title: Simba is never seen again.

14111121112.content:
The next time Simba woke up, he immediately wished he didn't. He was swamped with the terrible and familiar fumes. He wasn't sure where he was, but it wasn't the stomach from before, and it wasn't outside either. Was he deeper in Thunder's digestive tract?

Outside, thunder felt something near his rear beginning to stir. He smirked as he realized his guest woke up.

"How you enjoyin' the tour, runt?" Thunder taunted, giving a little shake. Simba heard his voice, and started ramming against the walls of the colon, and Thunder grinned at his struggles. "There's no use fighting, kiddo. There's only one way out!" A shiver ran down Simba's spine at that statement. He rammed against the walls harder than before. "In the meantime, however, I know how we can pass the time!" he said in a sing-song-y voice. Simba was utterly horrified and disgusted, anything Thunder had in mind for him would've been gross.

Simba heard a familiar gurgling, though much louder than before, considering he was much closer to the source. It kept building and building, until another fart erupted over Simba. He groaned in disgust and coughed, barely clinging to consciousness.

"Oh, I bet you're gonna smell good after that one!" Thunder shouted, shaking her butt and his unfortunate guest. Simba was thrashed around inside the elephant's colon. The combination of the shaking and the horrid stench made Simba feel really woozy. Eventually, Thunder stopped shaking, leaving Simba to tumble to a stop. "But I can make you smell even better!" Another fart erupted over Simba, threatening to knock him out.
14111121112.title: Simba wakes up in Thunder's colon.

choices: Thunder pushes Simba out as slowly as possible
Thunder releases all his gas at once to launch Simba
141111211122.content:
A strange spec is visible up ahead. Simba can't quite determine what this tiny bright spot could be until it clicks. It's daylight, the light at the end of the world's most nightmarish tunnel. With each step the elephant took the cub could see it come closer. It also provided some context as to how much the pulsating bowels were moving him along. Though he could see the finish line ahead, it was still far away and Thunder was more than keen to take his time. The wiggling in his colon felt heavenly and any attempt the cub made to crawl out faster was punished. First with a powerful clench, then with a volley of noxious farts. Even back there the elephant was in complete control, forcing the cub to play along and let himself be toyed with.

"You know, it's probably not too difficult for me to keep you in there..."

The hulking pachyderm expected more panicked resistance to erupt in his colon, but the cub was remarkably subdued. Had he pushed him too far? It wasn't half as fun if the little lion wasn't going to try and struggle. Maybe the cub just needed some fresh air. The elephant mentally shrugged at the idea. Perhaps he could let him out for a little bit. It was not like any escape attempts would get far with the lion's dazed state. And if Simba started getting too rebellious or really just if the elephant felt like it he could always cram the cub right back in there. The powerful grasp of his rear had pulled in bigger prey than the cub. With a dark chuckle the elephant even contemplated giving the cub another full tour. Just wash him a little and give him a moment to drink some water and he'd be ready to struggle through his bowels again. The thought was very enticing, but his daydreaming was interrupted by a joyous feeling. The cub's head had reached his pucker and pushed through. Immediately he clenched it shut, squeezing it around the lion's neck and trapping him.

"Ah, you made it. Be honest with me Simba, how was the journey?" The little prince offered no more than disjointed coughing before speaking.

"That was the single most horrible, foul and disgusting thing I have ever experienced. If the other lions find out how you've treated me they'll eat well on your corpse." The elephant seemed unfazed, farting to show his disapproval. The hot gas blew past the cub, but the tight pucker held him down.

"I don't much like your tone. I'll have you remember that it takes me just an instant to swallow you again and send you through me all over. Or if you're a big fan of my butt I can show you just how long I can hold you inside." With those words the tunnel that housed Simba's body began to tighten.

The cub felt his movement get restrained and soon the elephant demonstrated his supreme control. The soft undulating of the bowels that had pushed the little lion along reversed. Were it not for the tight, twitching ring around his neck the cub would've been drawn back inside. With this terrifying demonstration carved into his mind, the prince offered no further resistance. With a sigh of relief Thunder relaxed himself, seizing his efforts to keep the cub in. But if the little guy was going to make an exit, he was going to need a little push. The elephant's rumbling belly effortlessly answered that question. It roiled and bubbled with built up gas and the cub would soon find himself in the line of fire. How does Thunder use his gas help Simba out of his huge elephantine ass?
141111211122.title: Simba's completely conscious when he "e...

choices: Let Simba stew in his rectum.

Rachel laughed as she felt the lion being crushed and struggling under her large rump. "You should have quit while you still had the chance, kid!" Rachel said as she bounced down a couple times on top of the lion.

The crowd roared demanding more and Rachel obliged and looked back at her 'seat' hearing muffled groans. "Looks like they want to see more." Rachel taunted at Simba. Rachel clenched her cheeks together. Simba felt his entire body being squashed by the large buttocks and yelped as they squeezed around his face. Rachel then stood up and several gasps came from the audience as the cub was nowhere to be found. She turned around and showed off her rump to the audience and wiggled it causing the tail of the cub to drop out from between his imprisonment allowing the audience to see. The crowd laughed at the flailing tail and Rachel smiled and walked around the ring, swaying her hips to pulverize her prey more. Simba felt faint from the combination of being basically chewed and beaten by the bulbous cheeks as they slide against him and a severe lack of air. Rachel noticed Simba's struggling weaken..
155111.title: Rachel continues tormenting Simba with her butt
