She unleashed one more, powerful blast
She squeezed the consciousness out of him
1551111.content:
"Some king you turned out to be," Rachael taunted. She began shaking her butt, bashing Simba with her buttocks with each swing. "The match barely started and you already disappeared into my booty. It feels like you really belong in there, runt," she said as she shook. The crowd laughed at his humiliation, which fueled Simba to try and break out more. However, the moment he showed resistance, Rachel spread her butt cheeks, only to clench them together, practically flattening Simba, who howled out in pain.

"I can only think of one thing that'd be more fitting for you~" the gazelle cooed out as a cruel idea entered her mind. She turned her backside towards one of the trees and backed up, eventually pressing her butt right against it, leaving the lion no chance to escape. She bent backwards, making sure to push as much of herself into Simba as possible. He wasn't sure what was coming, but he knew it couldn't be good. His fears would be confirmed when he began to smell a horrible smell, followed by a thunderous raspberry noise.

He gagged and squirmed even more as he was swamped with her foul air, which Rachel laughed at. "Ah~ Just the right punishment for you, tiny~" she taunted as she rubbed against the tree, and him by extension. The crowd laughed as they saw Rachel's butt cheeks shift uncontrollably, as a result of Simba's squirming. TImon and Pumbaa, however, just gagged in disgust at their friend's predicament. "Perhaps you need to learn your place a little more!" She leaned back again, and farted once more.

Her next stream sounded like machine gun blasts, pelting her prey with several smelly blasts. Simba wasn't sure how much longer he could hold on. Rachel took herself off of the tree and walked forward, brandishing the weakly squirming lion stuck in her butt.
1551111.title: She lets loose some farts

choices: Timon and Pumba beg for Simba's freedom
Timon and Pumba attempt a rescue
Timon and Pumba are kept away, Rachel enjoys her prize
15511113.content:
Rachel couldn't be happier. At the start of the match, she could tell Simba needed to be taken down a few pegs and she was only too happy to be the one to do it. She paraded around the ring with Simba's tail tangling from her thick hips as the crowd roared its approval.

"Think I can make him tap out?" the gazelle asked the audience. Their cheers only got louder.

"If he doesn't pass out first!" she laughed.

Simba heard her taunts, though her voice was muffled through the layers of ass fat and flesh on both sides of his body. He tried to push back against his fleshy prison, but between the battering she started with and the gas she continued with, he just didn't have the strength. His paw just sank slightly into Rachel's soft flesh.

The gazelle strode around the ring confidently, swinging her ass from side to side. With each swing, Simba was slammed from one cheek into the next and Rachel was slowly amping up the pressure as she flexed her glutes. Her soft flesh was getting more and more firm. Eventually it felt like she had his whole body locked in a vice.

She felt the lion's squirming slow and finally come to a stop. She paused in the middle of the ring and gave her ass one final, massive swing. When she reaches the apex, she relaxes her cheeks and lets Simba's unconscious body fly free out of her ass. The crowd gasps and cheers as they see the lion tumble to the floor in a heap.

"Winner!" the vulture shouts, raising Rachel's arm in the air. "Feel free to claim your prize Rachel," he says with a smile.

The gazelle strides toward Simba, but keeps walking past him. She shouts in victory as she climbs the corner of the ring and celebrates her win with the crowd. She looks back over her shoulder at the lion and notices that he's just beginning to stir. His eyes are fluttering open. Rachel smiles and bends her knees slightly, taking aim. She waves her enormous ass in the air, drawing the beaten cub's attention. Knowing that he's too weak to move, she launches herself toward his body, her cheeks spread as wide as they can.

SLAM!

Her aim is true and she lands squarely on Simba's body, clamping her cheeks shut before standing. The impact actually looked worse than it was for the lion as he remained conscious, although he would soon wish he wasn't. As Rachel stood, the crowd roared even louder as there wasn't a trace of Simba remaining, not even his tail was visible within her thick ass.

With a final victory pose, the gazelle exits the ring, clenching her ass over her new found prize. Timon and Pumba exchange worried glances. This did not go as planned.
15511113.title: Squeezed Unconscious

choices: "...win him from me in a sanctioned match!"
155111131.content:
Rachel confidently glides through the cheering crowd, clenching her cheeks over her not-so-hard earned prize as she swung her thick hips from side to side. If Simba wasn't already light headed, the motion and pressure would have certainly done it.

Simba's small friends, Timon and Pumba, hesitated for a moment, but ran after the tall gazelle as fast as they could. They put the lion up to this and they couldn't have their protector live out his days as an anal toy for this shapely woman. Fortunately for them, Rachel was in no hurry so they caught up quickly.

"Rachel! Miss Rachel!" Pumba called out loudly.

Hearing her name, the gazelle paused and saw the small animals who she recognized from the lion's corner during the match.

"Something I can help you boys with?" she asked, caressing her shapely rump.

The two friends swallowed hard. Rachel had a familiar seductive and flirtatious tone to her voice, but they couldn't let that distract them. They saw where that teasing got Simba.

"Miss Rachel, that was a truly outstanding match! Against a lion no less!" Timon started.

"Hey..." Pumba whispered to his friend.

"Quiet Pumba, let me do the talking here," Timon whispered back.

"Well thank you. Do I have a couple of new fans? Or maybe admirers?" Rachel giggled.

"Well we were certainly impressed!" the meerkat said in awe. "The thing is, Simba is...well he's our friend. We put him up to the fight. And what's more, he's really just a kid. We'd greatly appreciate it if you could let him come back home with us," Timon concluded.

Rachel smiled.

"You put him up to it?"

The friends nodded meekly.

"And you knew the stipulations of the match?"

They nodded again. Rachel burst out laughing.

"Some friends you are!" she squealed. "You're the reason the runt is currently squirming between my cheeks. So I guess I have you to thank for that!" she said, continuing to laugh.

"Well, as a thank you gesture, how about you let him go?" Pumba asked earnestly.

The gazelle rubbed her chin in silence for a moment considering her options. If she played her cards right, she could end up with more than one little toy out of this match.

"Ok guys, I tell you what I'll do. I'll give you a chance to get him back," she said with a smile.

"Oh thank you Miss Rachel!" Pumba exclaimed.

"Wait. What do you mean a chance?" Timon responded warily.

"Well, I do enjoy your friend squirming around, but the little warthog makes a good point. He wouldn't be there if it weren't for you, so I'll give you an opportunity to get him back. All you have to do is....
155111131.title: Given an Opportunity

choices: Both Timon and Pumba fight Rachel
Rachel rejects them, deciding to just keep Simba
1551111311.content:
Timon and Pumba's eyes widened. "You want us to fight you after mopping up the floor with Simba? Lady you must be nuts!" Timon yelled at the Gazelle. Rachel turned to face her generous ass in the duos direction, "Well I guess if you don't want to fight me, I guess i'll just be on my way with your puny little friend." she scoffed.

She placed her hands on each of her cheeks and began to massage them against each other, squashing the barely conscious cub that laid in between them. Timon and Pumba looked at each other nervously, they weren't sure either of them could take Rachel on.

"C'mon Timon, we have to fight to get Simba back." Pumba whispered to Timon. "I know, but there's no way either of us can win against Rachel she's undefeated!" Timon whispered back. "And just look at that big butt of hers, she could fit all three of us in there and still have room to spare!"

The both of them glanced over at Rachel's butt, still being massaged by her hands and getting rougher every second they spend debating with one another. "Don't be such a coward Timon. If that was us stuck in her butt Simba would do whatever it took to get us out." Pumba asserted. Timon looked down in shame, "I know, but I just don't think we can beat her Pumba." "Well we have to do something Timon." Pumba insisted.

The two were interrupted by a bellowing fart from Rachel. "Well if you two are done bickering I best be on my way. I've got a new lion toy to break in." She stated before walking away. Hearing this angered Pumba, he wasn't about to let this Gazelle get away with his friend. "We accept your challenge!" he yelled out.

Rachel halted and turned to Pumba, "Oh, you've made up your minds?" she said smugly. "We will fight you, for Simba!" Pumba yelled.

The shouting caught the attention of the entire crowd that was readying to leave and even caught the ears of the referee. A series of mumbles and chattering ensued from the audience.

~"Is that little guy going to fight the unbeatable Rachel?"
~"No way can either of them beat her!"
~"He must have a death wish to go up against Rachel!"

Hearing the audience speaking strongly of her sparked Rachel's ego, "So which one of you are foolish enough to challenge the great Rachel?" Pumba stepped forward...
1551111311.title: Impossible Challenge

15511113113.content:
"Both of us will fight you, together!" Pumba stated. Timon's eyes widened in shock, "Whoa whoa whoa, us?" Timon questioned his friend. Rachel smiled ear to ear upon hearing this, she could easily triple her reward at one fell swoop. Even with the both of them together, Rachel had a multitude of advantages over the two, including superior height, strength and most importantly experience.

Timon walked up to Pumba. "Are you sure about this Pumba? I know we gotta get Simba back, but..." Timon was interrupted by Pumba nudging him. "We have to do this Timon. For our little buddy." Pumba growled. "It's the right thing to do." Timon let out a sigh and reluctantly agreed with Pumba, it was the right thing to do.

"So we going to fight or what lady?" Timon spouted to the Gazelle. Rachel looked down at the duo, "Alright shrimps i'll take the both of you on." she replied. "But if I win, I get to keep all three of you." "Deal!" Pumba quickly shouted. Timon gulped audibly. After seeing what Rachel did with Simba, he wasn't at all looking forward to being her little play thing.

Rachel turned and strutted over to the vulture referee and began speaking with him. After a few moments, she finished talking with him and the referee then began an announcement. "Well ladies and gentlemen, it appears the great Rachel has a couple of new challengers! So sit back and get ready for the show!" The audience began to cheer, getting able to see the great Rachel fight twice in a row.

Rachel reached back into the great abyss that was her ass crack and yanked the little lion cub out by his tail. Simba took a deep breath finally able to get some fresh air. Every bit of his fur was ruffled and wet with sweat. He had a drunken look on his face from the tremendous beating he received from Rachel. The gazelle smirked, "I'm sorry to part with you my little lion cushion, but I have two new playthings I need to go win." she teased him. "I promise I won't be long." She brought him up to her face and gave him a drawn out kiss right on his lips. Simba wasn't in much of a state to fight back and was forced to endure the kiss. She turned to the audience and spotted a massive male wildebeest at the very edge of the crowd and walk over to him.

The wildebeest looked up at the gorgeous gazelle, "Hello there handsome." Rachel spoke in a seductive voice. "I, uhh, err um hello." he stammered. Rachel leaned forward and brought a hand up to his face "You sure look like a big, strong and capable wildebeest." she said while she dragged her hand tenderly across his cheek. The wildebeest chuckled nervously. "And I was wondering if you could babysit my little lion toy for me, I would hate if he were to get lost." Feeling lovestruck in the face of the beautiful gazelle, the wildebeest nodded his head in agreement. He stood up and let Rachel lay the lion down in his seat face up.

Rachel waved at Simba before the wildebeest slammed his fat ass back down in his seat and letting out a sloppy fart on the poor cub. Knowing he was in good hands, she walked back to the ring and stepped inside.

"Alright ladies and gents, the match you've all been waiting so patiently for!" the vulture announced. The referee flew over to Timon and Pumba, who were just climbing up into the ring. "Say, what are your guys' names?" the vulture asked. Pumba looked up at the ref, "My name is Pumba and this here is Timon. We're going to win Simba back!" Pumba announced. The referee rolled his eyes, "Yeah whatever, i'll make sure it's written on your gravestones." "Now wait just a minute!" Timon protested before being interrupted by the vulture.

"Today we have newcomers, Timon and Pumba, who will be fighting none other than the undefeated champion, Rachel the gazelle!" the vulture shouted. Rachel turned to pose so that the audience had a better view of her 'assets'. The audience cheered and applauded wildly, greatly feeding Rachel's ego. "But this match is a special match at the request of our great champion!" the vulture stated. "In this match, any contestants that fall out of the ring are automatically disqualified!"

Timon turned to his friend, "All right Pumba, we've got to strategize to take her down so here's the plan." he whispered. "When the match starts, i'll go in with the first strike and have her fight me. I'll put on a bit of a show and try to make her get down low and when she does, you will charge in from behind and jab her with your tusks right in that big butt of hers and knock her right out of the ring!" Pumba looked over at Timon. "C'mon Pumba it's a foolproof plan!" Timon encouraged. Before Pumba could answer, The vulture spoke up again. "Contestants. Get ready! and Fight!" With that, a bell was rung to initiate the fight.
15511113113.title: We got this

choices: Rachel notices too late and Pumba rings her out
Pumba hits Rachel, but doesn't ring her out
155111131132.content:
"All right Timon, let's go with your plan." Pumba replied. Timon smiled at him, "Okay then, i'll head left and get her attention. Get ready for my signal." Pumba nodded and waited while Timon went off.

"Splitting up are you? Try as you might, you can't possibly hope to beat me." Rachel stated with vanity, while strutting straight towards Pumba. "I'll start with you little piggy." Pumba's eyes widened at the statement and began to back up into the corner. Rachel took notice of his cowering. "Oh yes, I can't wait stuff you in this big beautiful ass of mine and feel you squirm like the little worm you are." Rachel explained while massaging her buns for emphasis.

Timon, who was now approaching Rachel's side, turned and spoke up, "Hey, right here! Come fight me!" he yelled flailing his arms around to get her attention, but he was promptly ignored and the gazelle continued to mosey towards Pumba. "Hey! Down here! Come on!" Timon continued yelling, but he could tell she was completely disinterested in him. She was solely focused on his warthog friend whom she planned to jam in between those wobbly cheeks of hers. Timon had to think of something quick, something that would undoubtedly get her attention. He knew she thought very highly of herself, perhaps he could bring her down a peg with a few choice words.

"Hey Rachel, I said i'm right here rhino butt!" The gazelle immediately stopped in her tracks right in front of a terrified Pumba. Yes, it's working he thought to himself. The audience gasped instantaneously. "You think you're so great and pretty, but you aren't much more appealing than a pile of hyena dung!" he yelled. The audience began to burst into laughter. He saw Rachel clench her fists before turning to him. Timon saw the utter fury in her expression. Her bright blue eyes now small black pupils that focused solely on him. Her teeth were shaking from such intense gritting that it was astonishing they didn't shatter from the pressure.

"What did you just say about me?" she growled. Timon scoffed. "You deaf or something lady? I said you look like-" Timon was cut off by Rachel charging towards him. She charged at him with such ferocity that Timon had little time to react. A swift kick to the face sent Timon flying into the ropes and launched back onto the floor face down in front of Rachel. He laid in a daze from the impact as a large familiar shadow loomed over him.

Timon rolled over onto his back and looked up to see Rachel standing over him, all sanity seemingly absent from her face. "HOW DARE YOU INSULT ME YOU LITTLE WEASEL!" the gazelle screamed as she lifted her foot directly above him. Timon closed his eyes before the foot fell upon him with a booming -SQUELCH-.

Rachel's move was met with thunderous cheers from the audience, but she didn't much care for their amusement at the moment as she was blind with fury at this little weasel throwing such petty insults at her. He damaged her ego and she planned to pay it back tenfold. She lifted her foot up off the ground and slammed it back down before twisting to side to side, treating Timon as if he were a piece of dung she had stepped in and was trying to get off.

All the while applause and cheers roared from the crowd. Seeing the hotheaded meerkat get put in his place was a sight for all to look at, minus Pumba who looked on in shock at the abuse his friend was receiving. He felt the vibrations in the ground each time she slammed her foot down and flinched knowing that Timon was taking the brunt of each one. He promptly looked away, being unable to stand watching it any further.

Rachel stomped her foot on Timon one last time, panting strenuously after taking out all her fury on the pathetic little meerkat. She lifted her foot up to check her handiwork, but was met with only a prominent footprint in the ground. Rachel raised an eyebrow before looking at the bottom of her foot and saw a certain meerkat flattened and motionless against her sole. She took a hold of her opponent's head and peeled him off her foot and brought his flat body up to her face.

A roar of laughter emerged from the spectators in the stands as they saw the flattened form of Timon looking as if he had been trampled by a stampede of hippos. Rachel couldn't help but to smile wickedly from ear to ear. "That is what happens when you mess with me you little weasel!" Rachel growled. The meerkat remained stupefied in her grasp as she took hold of his feet with her free hand and stretched his body like a rubber band before letting go of his feet and launching him to the corner opposite of Pumba and sending him slamming into the tree post.

Pumba looked back to see a flattened Timon crash into the tree post. He hated to see his close friend get beaten so horribly, he wish he had stepped in to help, but he had to stick to the plan were they to get Simba back. Pumba thought of how brave and loyal Timon was to take such a thrashing from the towering gazelle just for Simba's sake and smiled.

The audience cheered for Rachel as Timon's body slowly slid down the tree post and back down onto the floor of the arena. Every fiber of his body throbbed in pain as it began to reform after the brutality Rachel delivered him. His ears rang like a herd of elephants trumpeting in sync and his vision was nothing more than a blur. He leaned up against the post to catch his bearings, but was given little time as his blurry vision made out Rachel who was standing only a few feet away from him. Timon's lips quivered in fear of the gazelle.

"Please Rachel, have mercy!" the meerkat pleaded. Rachel was not one to show mercy to her opponents, especially ones so pitiful as this meerkat. She crouched down in front of Timon who in turn curled up into a fetal position. "Oh, what happened to all that bravado just a minute ago weasel?" Rachel badgered. She looked at the meerkat, who simply shook in his curled up position. Rachel rolled her eyes and looked towards the crowd of spectators cheering her on. "I was planning on making this little guy my personal butt toy, but due to recent events, I think i'll just go and eat him whole!" she hollered. The audience in turn began to chant her name and encouraged her to eat Timon. The chanting inflated Rachel's ego once again as she basked in her grandeur.

Timon looked up in a timid manner to see the gazelle turned away and quickly glanced in Pumba's director. He was still standing in the starting corner. Timon waved his arms to get Pumba's attention.

Pumba saw Timon waving towards him. That must be the signal Pumba thought to himself. He backed up slightly and fixed his eyes right on Rachel's bulbous backside. "CHARGE!" Pumba shouted, before charging towards Rachel.

Does Rachel take notice?
155111131132.title: Pumba goes with Timon's plan

choices: A battered Timon was recovering next to his friend in the ring - they win!
Timon is also outside the ring - A draw? (Reserved)
1551111311321.content:
Rachel's focus is completely absorbed by Timon. She crouched down and makes a show of lifting the meerkat high into the air as she licked her lips. She was so focused on the her small toy turned snack, she didn't hear Pumba's war cry from behind her or realize that in crouching, she had presented the warthog with a perfect target.

"CHAAAAARGE!" Pumba declared as he stampeded toward Rachel with as much strength as his short legs could supply. He impacted her soft flesh full force and felt his snout slip between her cheeks for a moment as he lifted his head up into the air.

The crowd gasped as the small warthog sent the champion flying. Rachel's expression went from one of easy dominance to one of shocked surprise as she felt Pumba's impact from behind her. Before she realized what had happened, she had been sent flying over the top rope and landed hard on the savanna floor outside the ring.

Before Rachel could scramble to hear feet and mount a counter attack, the ref flew in to stop the match.

But there was one small item he needed to examine before declaring a winner.

If Rachel had released Timon, and he landed inside the ring, Timon and Pumba were clearly the winners.

If Rachel had held onto Timon as she was sent out of the ring, or if he was sent flying out of the ring himself, there would be a draw of some sort. Although Pumba remained standing in the ring...
1551111311321.title: Sent Flying....With Company?

15511113113212.content:
As the vulture examines the ring area, he sees that Rachel lost her loose grip on the meerkat as she went flying. But fate was not smiling on Timon, as his momentum carried him out of the ring as well. With no real way to determine who hit first, he was uncertain of how to proceed...

Suddenly, inspiration struck!

Rachel and the crowd waited impatiently for a decision while Timon attempted a recovery and Pumba looked on happily.

The ref flew to the center of the ring and cleared his throat.

"Ahem. We have just one competitor left standing in the ring. Pumba is the winner!" some of the crowd cheered the underdog, while many more booed his decision as they wanted to see Rachel's brutality rewarded.

"Per the rules of the match, Simba is to be freed into Pumba's custody."

Timon started to get a little uncomfortable. Why all the focus on just Pumba? They worked together on this, right?

"However," the ref continued, "As two competitors were launched from the ring during the match, neither can be declared a winner or co-winner," he said, clearly focusing on Timon.

"You are one lucky audience, as you will be treated to a third match with our champion Rachel! This time, she will take on Timon in a one on one contest under normal ownership rules," he stated.

The crowd cheered wildly. They were ecstatic about the opportunity to see Rachel a third time in one night, and especially in anticipation of the dominant show they expected to see her put on against the talkative and diminutive meerkat.

"Rachel and Timon will return to the ring. As usual, no eating or full insertion. A loser will be declared when one competitor is declared unable to continue and that competitor will be awarded to the winner!"

The wildebeest who was tasked with...um....monitoring Simba begrudgingly pulled the cub from between his cheeks and tossed him at Pumba, who had been escorted out of the ring. As he returned to his seat, he happily stomped on Timon, who was attempting to escape through the crowd. Rachel smiled happily as she pulled her way through the ropes and watched the meerkat recover from his first match and from the light tap the wildebeest had delivered.

"So weasel," she teased as the ref rang the bell, "I guess you're safe from being lunch for now. But what do you think about my rhino ass now?" she teased, recalling the initial insult Timon had hurled her way while caressing her large, soft rump.

She was angry about losing her royal toy and was intent on taking her anger out on the tiny meerkat. But she wanted his punishment and pain to last, so she knew she had to be patient and wait for him to recover before she started her assault.

As she waited, she beckoned to the ref and whispered something in his ear. He nodded in agreement.

"At the request of the champion, in order to avoid an escape attempt from Timon the Terrible," he chuckled at the nickname, "this will now be a Lumberjill match! Will any large, female animals willing to serve as a lumber jill and prevent our competitors from leaving the ring please proceed to ringside!" the ref called.

Before he was finished, the ring shook as a stampede of female rhinos, hippos, wildebeests, and even an elephant and giraffe or two surrounded the ring with hungry looks on their faces.

"Oh look Simba!" Pumba observed happily, "Timon already has so many fans!" The battered cub just groaned in response.

Timon had finally fully recovered. He swallowed hard.
15511113113212.title: Yet Another Match!

155111131132121.content:
Timon rubbed his head, still feeling sore from Rachel's beating and looked around the ring at the colossal animals that swarmed it. It was bad enough that he was stuck in the ring alone with Rachel, but now there was massive beasts that surrounded the ring who would pummel him if he tried to leave the ring. The lumberjills all looked down at Timon with various looks of hunger and lust on their faces, imagining the "fun" they would have with him should he take just one step out of the ring.

Timon's eyes shot around at the jills that were grouped around the ring. As threatening as all the lumberjills around the ring were, Timon was truly afraid of the gazelle that stood across from him.

Rachel glared menacingly at the little meerkat in the opposite side of the ring. Her feelings towards him still soured over his disgraceful remarks about her beauty. Rhino butt. Hyena dung. Timon's words echoed in her head managing to infuriate her further. She was going was going to win this match and make that weasel her bitch for life.

"Both contestants ready? Fight!" the referee shouted, as the bell rang starting the match.

Rachel immediately ran towards Timon and jumped up into the air and putting her feet together aiming straight for the meerkat. Timon screamed as he saw the soles of the gazelle plummet towards him. He dove out of the way at the last second, leaving Rachel to miss and hit the ground where he once stood. A devilish grin spread across her face as she lifted her right foot and stomped Timon five times in succession. After the fifth stomp, Rachel twisted her foot side to side before lifting it to see a flattened meerkat shaped like her foot drawing laughter and cheers from the lumberjills and spectators alike. Rachel looked around the ring at all of her fans, arms stretched outwards and a narcissistic smile that stretched from ear to ear basking in glory as she stood over Timon waiting for him to recover.

A couple of minutes had passed before Timon was finally back to his normal shape. His whole body was aching and throbbing worse than before. It practically begged Timon to forfeit the fight immediately and end the suffering, but Timon was a stubborn meerkat. He slowly lifted himself, albeit barely, onto his knees in defiance of the champ and managed to draw a few gasps from the lumberjills.

Rachel chuckled at the feeble display of defiance as she extended her right arm into a ninety degree angle and executing an elbow drop onto the puny meerkat. The lumberjills and audience applauded Rachel as she crushed Timon back into a two dimensional door mat. She lifted her arm off her opponent leaving a once again flattened Timon on the ground. Rachel picked up Timon by the scruff of his neck and brought him up to her face.

"N-No more Rachel, p-please... I-I take back everything I said about you, h-honestly! F-forgive me!" Timon stammered.

The gazelle simply rolled her eyes, unmoved by his desperate pleas. "You are so pitiful." Rachel scoffed. "You insult me in front of my fans, cost me my royal lion toy and now you beg for forgiveness? Such insolence demands harsher punishment!" she announced aloud as she...
155111131132121.title: Back for more

choices: Rachel tosses Timon to the lumber jills
Rachel squeezes Timon (scissors or between her cheeks)
Rachel stomps him or uses her chest
155111131132122.content:
