"You realize you're just making the crowd want to see you punished more, right?" She started shaking against the tree, causing vibrations throughout the trunk. The vibrations shook Simba up, and he felt his claws slowly yank themselves out of the tree. The crowd started to cheer Savannah on, except for Timone and Pumba, who could barely watch the spectacle in front of them.

"No... No." His hind leg got unhooked, then his other, then one of his forelegs. He felt himself start to slide down the tree, before that claw was shaken off the tree too. "NO!" As Simba tumbled down to the arena, the next thing he saw was...
155332111.title: Simba escapes! It's not over yet!

choices: He was too weak to respond and passes out
155332113.content:
Simba continued his pathetic flails, hoping it would get her to budge, until he heard a very familiar sound. It sounded like a roar, or a growl, but he was wrong, it was Savannah's stomach gurgling. "If you thought this was bad, I have a surprise for you." Savannah had a devious look on her face. Simba wasn't completely sure what was about to happen. Soon, her cheeks clamped around him tightly and squeezed his whole body.

Savannah grunted and pushed, Simba heard her and was hit with a blast of warm smelly air for a good three long second. Simba coughed in response, 'Eww, did she just fart??" he thought to himself. Savannah sighed in relief, "How's the smell down there?" she teased Simba who shook his head in response. She felt him shaking his head and responded, "No need to be so polite, have some more!" On command, she farted again, even worse in the cub's face. It didn't help his situation that her cheeks enclosed the tight space and limiting his air. Savannah basked in the wake of the cheering and laughing audience chanting her name and begging for more.

Simba opened his mouth to cough, but regretted it as Savannah planted more of her hefty weight down on his tiny form and another butt bomb released from her posterior into his mouth and nose. Simba's eyes started to water from the stench and believed it be best to keep his mouth shut in fear of breathing in more noxious farts.

Simba then felt her weight lessen and he heard her speak to him, "Tell you what kid, you give up and i'll make you my personal little cushion." she ground her butt down for added effect. "Or, you can stay under there and i'll slowly make it worse on you." Savannah followed this up with a wet shaky fart. Simba winced in response, he knew he wouldn't last much longer and needed to get out from under her desperately. "Don't take too long, I feel the antelope meat settling in." The audience went quiet, waiting to see Simba's response while Timon and Pumba were nervously biting their nails.
155332113.title: Savannah's Gas

1553321131.content:
As the crowd hushed to await the answer, Savannah was getting restless, "Tick tock kid, we can't wait her all day." Simba coughed at the smell still lingering from her previous assaults. He tried his best, but even that couldn't even get her to budge. He was completely outmatched and he was now fully aware of this. Simba shifted his muzzle to get more room in Savannah's crack and with a defeated tone, "Okay... I give up... I'll... be your cushion..."

Savannah gave a toothy grin and sat up off the cub and a visible green fog rises up off her butt and Simba's face.. The crowd booed at the answer, they wanted more of a show from the two. Pumba faints and Timon fans him with his hand. "Savannah wins!" the announcer says. "And as custom, Savannah gets to claim her prize." Savannah looked down at the fallen cub, panting, eyes half open and sore. "Let's go home, 'cushion'." Savannah says. The last thing Simba saw was her large paw coming down on his face.

A couple weeks later, Savannah was at her home cave, taking full advantage of her prize. Sitting on him whenever she could, rubbing her paws on his face, laying on him and smothering him. "Come here, slave!" Savannah commanded. Simba lumbered in, no doubt exhausted from being this lioness' cushion. "Y-Yes, m-mistress?" he stuttered. Savannah pointed to a rock, makeshift to seat cushion. "Lay down." Simba obeyed and laid down on the rock on his back. Savannah turned around and presented her glorious rear to him, eclipsing him from any light and dropping down on his small form.

She shifted her butt so it covered his head and sat down with full weight, crushing the cub underneath her. Savannah stayed like this for a good twenty minutes, watching the wild life graze the lands below. Simba's whole body was practically molded to her buttocks at this point. A familiar noise is heard and a strong, wet fart expels from Savannah's tailhole. "Sniff." she commands. Simba reluctantly obeyed and lifted his snout to her tailhole and began sniffing at the fumes. By now, he had gotten used to the smell of her farts. She rubbed her butt down and let out another gas bomb which Simba breathed in by Savannah's command.

Savannah continued this for over most of the afternoon and evening, making her new slave practically worship her rump. When it was night time, she sat up off her 'cushion' who was coughing from the long period under her. "Bed." she commanded, and Simba got up and walked in the back of the cave to her bed made of dirt and grains. Simba laid down and Savannah stood over him and lowered herself onto him. Simba could only sigh as he felt his new mistress' weight fall down on top of him and compress him until she completely covered him with her body and fell asleep on top of him.
1553321131.title: "Okay, I give up..."

choices: Simba goes for the first attack
Terra goes to wrap his arm around Simba
1553322.content:
"You're in trouble, tyke," the vulture chuckled before flying off. Simba just pouted at the flying vulture. He went into the arena and entered his corner, looking confident. Then came his opponent, and his confidence quickly turned to confusion. In came a striped tiger, walking upright, wearing a brown loincloth in front of his groin. He was so muscular, Simba thought he might be able to bench press a boulder. This was Terra, Simba's opponent. He got to his corner, and looked at SImba with a smug expression.

"I thought I was fighting a lion, not a sweat rag," Terra taunted as he leaned back against the tree. Simba got angry and growled. This just got Terra to chuckle at the lion.

"And the MATCH... BEGINS... NOW!" the vulture announced.
1553322.title: Terra The Tiger

1553323.content:
Gene the cheetah - A beautiful adult cheetah known for her speed and strong legs. She takes pride in her species speed and is also vain and proud of her well shaped body. She loves to humiliate others and have them worshiper like a queen

Amy the African wild dog - An female wild dog, and leader of her pack. When she show up to battle, she's usually on her own, towering over Simba. However, she loves to howl, calling her pack to battle, who love to inconvenience Amy's prey by surrounding them, pinning him down, and even dog piling them.
1553323.title: Other

choices: Gene whips her legs around Simba
Gene plants her rear on top of Simba
15533231.content:
The vulture chuckled as she spread his wings and flew off to get the opponent. Simba scowled at his laughter and psyched himself up for the fight ahead. He crawled under a few vines and got to his corner of the arena. He put on a confident smirk, the crowd cheering, either for him or for his destruction. Suddenly, a rapid pitter-patter was heard from far away. It got louder and louder as it approached. Then, the opponent arrived, covered by a cloud of dirt.

They dirt suddenly stopped, and the cloud slowly dissipated, revealing a terrifying opponent. A lean cheetah, emanating a horrid stench and showing off some strong legs. This was none other than Gene, the terrifying cheetah. She approached Simba, looking him up and down.

"My opponent's a lion?" she asked, maintaining her expression.

"A regular king of the jungle," Simba said, practically emanating a smug aura. Gene's eyes suddenly flashed with malice.

"The same king that'd chase me off from a good meal?" Simba froze up at that. "Maybe I can finally teach one of them a lesson."
15533231.title: Fight the Speedy Cheetah

choices: Uh-oh, Gene is a bit gassy.
Gene shifts herself to a better position
155332312.content:
Gene bent down, lowering her head to Simba's level. Her dark brown eyes pierced through Simba's soul. At this position, he was beginning to realize the true size difference between the two. Simba shivered in fear of her fierce glare and grit his teeth to keep them from chattering, he knew was in over his head, but he mustn't show weakness. The little lion cub found an ounce of courage deep within in himself and glared back at Gene to show he wasn't afraid. The cheetah chuckled at the sight, knowing her opponent's move was only a facade and she knew how fearful he was of her. She squinted her eyes in a dominate matter to counter his scowl. Simba gulped, feeling she concluded his act, but he had to stand his ground. Just then, a low, deep growl came from the cheetah standing before him. The panicked cub was puzzled, until he saw her cheeks puff up... In the makeshift bleachers, the crowd waited in anticipation for the cheetah's move.

Gene inched fairly closer to Simba and let out a rowdy belch right into his face. The force of the blast blew his hair back and the stench that followed matched the power behind it. Simba coughed and wiped his nose with one of his paws, trying his best to relieve himself of the stench. It smelled like rotten antelope meat mixed with wildebeest that had stood out for weeks before being devoured. Gene rose her head up and looked upon her opponent stumbling just from a single belch. "What's wrong 'king of the jungle', can't handle a little burp?" Gene teased. Laughter ensued from the audience as Gene teased the little guy. She walked to the side of the disoriented cub and turned her backside towards him. With a quick bump, Gene's rump knocked over Simba to his side, catching him by surprise. The lion noticed a large shadow cast over his body. He turned to see the yellow and block spotted muscled backside of Gene approaching him. Before he was able to make any noise, or movement, her buttocks made contact with Simba. Her left flank planted on Simba's head, keeping him pinned down while her right flank planted on the side of his body near his mid-section covering a good portion of the runt and finally resting on top of a new found yellow furred seat.

Groans were emitted from Simba, partially muffled by the butt cheek pressing down on his face. "Enjoying yourself?" Gene asked. "I don't just let any old bumpkin have the honor of being my royal seat. I only let a few, 'special' peons enjoy such a noble bum." Gene said, giving a few small bounces for emphasis to the situation she was putting her adversary in. The audience laughed at the predicament Simba was in and cheered for Gene, however Timon kept his eyes covered with his hands, unsure if Simba would last through this fight. "I have something in mind, just for you." Gene said to the cub she was crushing under her. Her next move was-
155332312.title: A worthy seat

15533232.content:
Without a word, the vulture flew off to get the fighter. Timone patted Simba on the back and the lion ran towards the ring, oh so confident. Meanwhile, in came the opponent from afar. A large African wild dog crawled under one of the vines and into the arena. This was none other than Amy, a dangerous pack leader. She'd often call in her pack to help out in her battles. Simba was easily half her size.

She approached slowly.

"So, I'm facing a doggie?" Simba asked, tauntingly.

"Cats don't usually fair well against me," Amy taunted. Simba began to charge forward, aiming to tackle the dog down. As he approached, Amy howled into the air, a sound that would be heard 30 yards away. Simba leapt towards her, but Amy brought up a paw, slamming it against Simba's stomach and smacking him down to the ground. She brought her face down close to Simba.

"I've never tried lion before," she said, licking her lips. Simba's eyes went wide with her taunt. Amy opened wide and wrapped her jaws around Simba's head, completely enveloping him. The crowd, except for Timone and Pumbaa, cheered. SImba squirmed under her as he was instantly hit by her rancid breath. Amy started to suckle on him like a lollipop, her tongue running over his grimacing face as she tasted him.

As if the torture couldn't get any worse, Amy adjusted her paw to hold it around his head, keeping his snout close to her throat.

"URRRRRRP!" Amy belched. Suddenly, Simba was assaulted with what felt like a sea of grossness, flooding the inside of Amy's mouth. Simba squirmed even more as the sea of grossness began to drown him. With a pop, Simba's head plopped out of Amy's mouth. "Mmm! That'll be good when the match is over." Simba looked around, slowly recovering from the horrid smell, and noticed other dog's in the arena. "So nice of you all to finally arrive," Amy said, ginning. She and the pack looked down at Simba hungrily.
15533232.title: Fight Amy

155332322.content:
Simba looked around and saw that more of her pack cam to join her. "N no fair a pack against one lion" he protested earning a chuckle from the pack as the started fanning out.

"Aww poor whittle baby did they not tell you their is no such thing as a unfair fight" Amy said with a mocking tone giving him a predatory grin as she walked toward Simba.

Simba gulped fear showing in his eyes as the alpha female came closer. He backs up only to stop hearing a growl from behind him looking back he saw one of her pack mates and tried to escape another way.

Amy laughed "well whittle cub looks like your trapped" she said as she blocked the only remain exit.

Simba looked around and saw he was comply surrounded by the pack that had formed a circle blocking all hope of escape.

The crowed cheered seeing the cub trapped and knew what happened next.

Amy grinned and uttered two words that Simba did not want to hear. "Dog Pile" she called as all the dogs leaped and landed on Simba causing the cub to mew like a kitten.

The crowed cheered as Timon and Pumbaa winced at the sight.

Simba struggled under the mass of bodies begging for them to get off of him.

Amy got off the pile and gave the command for her pack mates to surround him again. Looking at the crowed "What you think this lion should get" she called waiting to hear the answer as Simba catches his breath.
155332322.title: They crowded around Simba

1553323222.content:
“Cub Sitter” the crowd shouted causing Amy to smile as she motion for her pack to hang back as she approached the cub. “The crowd has spoken” she said walking up to Simba turning and gave him a quick bump with her rump knocking him down.
As Simba recovered he did not like the sound of what the crowd decided. Looking at Amy he gulped as she approached him. He then noticed her turning around and he held his breath expecting her to fart but instead felt a blow to his head knocking him down knocking the air he was holding in. When he looked he saw a painted mass descending rapidly toward him. Amy smiled as she sat on the little lions head.
“Awww if I knew you wanted to be this close I would have sat on you sooner” Amy taunted wiggling her rump and causing Simba’s face to be wedged right in between her cheeks. As she wiggled her rump she saw the cubs little pride showing and decided to taste her soon to be pack member and started sucking causing Simba to cum quickly as the crowed realized who was controlling the ring.
1553323222.title: Cub sitter

15533233.content:
Leslie - A tapir the size of a rhinoceros. She's known for using her fat and horrid BO to smother opponents until they pass out. Then, while they're unconscious, she uses her tongue to play with them. While opponents are conscious, she squashes them under her great girth, roll over them, and force them to smell her BO.

Cameroon - A giant toad the size of a hippo. He likes to flick his tongue out to snatch up opponents, and either constrict them or pull them into his smelly maw. He's known for belching over opponents, snatching them into his mouth, licking particular spots on prey, and leaping to squash them under him.
15533233.title: Other

choices: Simba goes for the first blow.
155332331.content:
Simba had signed up for a match against Leslie, an unusually large tapir. The cub hurried to the ring, hoping to see his adversary before their match started. He'd never seen a tapir before and Timon's description of a tiny-trunked, pudgy elephant-like creature wasn't helping. According to the meerkat, they lived in the rainforests south of the Pridelands. On rare occasion one would venture out into the plains. Leslie was a little different though, something Simba would be quick to realize when he laid eyes upon her.

Timon would appear to be right on all accounts except for the size. Simba was expecting his opponent to be roughly the size of Pumbaa, but Leslie was considerably larger. Looking at the nearby spectators the cub put her on par with a rhino in size. The other thing that became clear was her stench. The tapir was on the other side of the ring, but the little lion could smell her easily. And her horrid odour was only the first of his concerns. In the ring with her was her previous adversary, an anthro lion. He was lying flat on his back with the tapir hovering over his face. His fur was shaggy and dirty from the wrestling, but he was spent. Whatever Leslie had done to him had worn him out completely. She seemed to celebrate her victory by plunging her long tongue down his throat in a cruel caricature of a kiss. His body twitched every time she went in, but he was too weak to stop her. After a minute or so of this torment the referee, a vulture, flies in.

"Makka is no longer able to fight, do you want to claim him?"

"Naw, I got another fight after this, and I don't want to spoil myself with too many toys." She said with a cocky smile. The tapir had seen Simba, smiling at what was certainly going to be an easy win.

Simba gulped as two spectators dragged the lion out of the ring and the ref motioned for the cub to enter.

"In this corner, hailing from Pride Rock! The Prince! Simba!!!" The ref announced enthusiastically. The crowd cheered for him. Or were the cheering for him to lose to Leslie?

"And in this corner, the titanic tapir! From jungles far away, it's Leslie!!!" The cheering exploded in intensity. It was clear who the crowd favorite was, but Simba wouldn't be shaken. He'll show them all his lion courage. He won't back down, even against an unusual opponent like Leslie.
155332331.title: Leslie

choices: She layed on top of him
1553323312.content:
Deciding not to let the tapir get the advantage early, Simba quickly darted towards her. He leapt in the air and poised to strike the animal from above. Leslie, meanwhile, turned around, her side facing the lion. Simba was surprised and began worrying as he approached. Upon striking her side, he sunk into her fat, getting a quick taste of her foul stench while he was that close. He was quickly flung back and onto the arena, recoiling from the sudden fling and horrid stench.

Leslie, meanwhile, approached the stunned Lion.
1553323312.title: Simba goes for the first blow.

choices: Leslie gets up, letting Simba recover.
Leslie smothers Simba until he's unconscious.
15533233121.content:
The tapir casually strolled towards the cub, thinking about the fun she was about to have. Her stench filled the air and Simba could smell every inch she got closer. He was still a bit dazed from his failed attack, but he was clear enough to see the pudgy mammal slowly walk towards him. Leslie looked him in the eye menacingly, her head now mere inches away from him and... kept walking? The cub was mighty confused. Was this beast blind or something? He was right there, how could she have missed him. It was only when she stopped walking that things fell into place for the cub.

He realized he hadn't gotten up yet and by now the vast expanse of her belly was hovering above him. Realization dawned on him with a long "Oooooooh... shi..." His words were cut off when Leslie simply laid down. Her vast body completely enveloped the little cub in fatty mass. The short fur on her belly pressing against his nose and her stench filling the minuscule pocket of air he had left.

Leslie smiled, feeling the trapped cub squirm weakly against her uncaring belly. This trick was by far her favorite. It wasn't as flashy as some others, but the simplicity and sheer brutality of just squashing her opponent underneath her was so satisfying. The only question left on her mind was whether she should hold him down until he lost consciousness or play with him a little more first.
15533233121.title: She layed on top of him

155332331212.content:
Leslie could think of a good few games to play with the little cub. But the rules of the arena would prohibit most of them. She mentally shrugged and resorted herself to waiting until she could take her opponent with her. Feeling the pathetic squirming beneath her big belly left her confident she wouldn't have to wait long. As soon as Simba would wear himself out he'd pass out and she would be able to claim him. The massive tapir instead spent her time thinking of all the evil little ways in which she'd handle the little lion after this 'fight'.

Simba was completely pinned beneath the sluggish mass of the tapir's immense gut. A powerful odour of stale sweat hung around him and her short belly fur felt coarse and bristly against his nose. The monstrous weight was worst of all. Every tiny movement was hard-fought. Every breath a little shallower than the last as Leslie's giant form slowly crushed him flat. Dull pain radiated all over his body, but compared to the stench and utter helplessness of his situation it was barely noticable. To make matters worse, he could hear the muffled audience cheering. They wanted to see him humiliated like this. Thankfully the excitement was dying down. Though if they got bored, does that mean they're feeling pity or waiting for Leslie to do even more to him? Maybe the dimming sound had something to do with this lightheaded feeling.

Leslie clearly felt the very moment the struggles stopped entirely. She had done it. She had smothered the prince into submission. And now it was time to claim him. She got up quickly and the vulture flew in. The tapir was frightful for a moment when she saw the flattened cub. She wanted to knock him out, not kill him. Thankfully some errant twitching happened when the ref poked him. He quickly declared her the winner and popped the all-important question. "Leslie, do you claim this lion?"

"Yes I do."

The pact was sealed. Simba now belonged to Leslie and the tapir could barely contain her excitement. "I can't wait to get started on you, little cub." Suddenly someone tapped her on the flank. It was the vulture again. "Small problem. You KO'd him so quickly the next match isn't ready yet. Think you can fill some time with your new toy? No rules ofcourse, just don't go completely overboard." Leslie smirked a little. The idea of publicly playing with the cub without any rules to hold her back was perfect. "Very well, I'll be your intermission act." The vulture let out a sigh of relief. "You're a lifesaver, Leslie. I owe you one." He flew to the center of the ring and made his announcement.

"Ladies aaaand gentlemen, a special treat for you right now. Whilst Marco and Atyeh get ready for their match, here is Leslie and her brand new toy, Simba!" The cub slowly blinked back into the land of the waking. The tapir wasn't going to wait though. She was eager to show her new toy all the ways she was going to abuse him. She starts by introducing the dazed cub to her...
155332331212.title: Leslie smothers Simba until he's unconscious.

choices: She felt a bump protrude from Simba's groin
1553323312121.content:
Simba groaned as he slowly woke up. He started to blink the sleep out of his eyes, and slowly regained his sight. The first thing he saw was a giant pair of buttocks pointed right at him. His eyes shot open with shock... a split second before Leslie lowered her butt onto him. Leslie's size made Simba disappear from view between her cheeks. She grinned as he felt his muffled screams and squirming. A little guy like him couldn't do anything to a big girl like her.

She rubbed her butt left and right on top of Simba, further asserting her dominance. Then...
1553323312121.title: large butt

1553323312122.content:
Simba's vision slowly adjusted from his dazed view to his usual view. And his vision was occupied by a giant, long tongue. He only had time to gasp before the tapir's tongue pressed against his face. He groaned and squirmed as the organ dragged itself up his face. He sputtered and spat, but despite his thrashing, Leslie had him pinned in place with a foot. He tried to thrash, but Leslie giggled at his attempts, and the crowd laughed in turn.

Simba then felt something weird. Leslie's tongue wrapped around his midsection, an impressive, if not gross, feat on its own, but what she did next was truly remarkable. She lifted Simba off of the ground and left him flailing wildly in the air, the crowd laughing uproariously. Leslie decided to assert her victory by squeezing the lion a little, making him gasp out as the air was forced out of his lungs. Leslie grew bored of that torture method, lifted upwards, and threw SImba against the ground.

Simba groaned in pain, and all he could hear was the deafening applause of the crowd. Leslie liked the initial assault, but she wasn't quite finished with Simba. Simba looked back, just in time to see Leslie's tongue...
1553323312122.title: long tongue

choices: Halftime show is over, she takes him with her.
One more move won't hurt, right?
15533233121221.content:
The crowd was amazed by this exotic halftime show. Normally they wheel out some jobber to get slapped around for a minute, but this was something new. Leslie's agile tongue didn't often posses the strength to hoist an opponent into the air and the brutal display of thrashing around Simba earned her lots of raucous applause. The cheering was just noise to the cub, who was lying dazed on his back in the middle of the ring. The pink blur that was Leslie's tongue hung over him, dripping a few drops of saliva on his face. The large tapir withdrew the organ for a moment to speak.

"Now... for the finisher!"

She stepped up to Simba, her head hovering over his groaning face. Her maw opened and her tongue lapped his cheek. He felt the slimy mass leave a trail across his mouth, which the cub kept firmly shut. Leslie quickly grew annoyed with these last scraps of resistance. She put a heavy foot on Simba's chest and whispered threateningly. "Open up or else..." The little lion still refuse to cooperate, drawing the tapir's ire. Her foot came down on his body like a building. The cub gasped in pained shock, strangely surprised that a rhino-sized tapir is that heavy. The open mouth was all she needed and with a hungry glint in her eyes she drives her tongue in.

Simba felt his mouth fill up with slithering, soggy muscle. The tapir's saliva tasted awful on his tongue and the stench of her breath could probably strip paint. The vile mass coiled around his tongue, thoroughly contaminating it. But Leslie had only just gotten started. The prying tip soon found it's way to the back of Simba's throat. The buildup of saliva not his own triggered an involuntary swallow, and the tongue followed right on in. The cub gagged at this alien sensation. The long tapir tongue was pushing it's way down his neck. He felt the long muscle sway and turn, his body twitching and moving seemingly of it's own accord. The crowd recognized Leslie's move and cheered her on. This wasn't the first time she'd probed someone so deeply. Several former opponents in the audience held their bellies, remembering well what they suffered. They did not envy Simba's position, seeing the little body quake at the strange probing. Only when the tip of Leslie's tongue dipped into Simba's stomach did she pull out to let him breathe.

"He's still with us, he's a resilient one." the tapir announced. Simba needed time to recover, but Leslie was not going to give him a second. What does she do next?
15533233121221.title: ...heading for his mouth

choices: Leslie regurgitates the cub, he's not done yet
15533233121223.content:
Simba watched with horror as Leslie began to reel that long agile tongue back into her maw. But the large tapir showed no signs of releasing at all. She opened her maw wide, letting the cub observe every little detail. The strands of saliva dripping down, the long rows of dull herbivore teeth. In the back of it all was her gullet. It looked easily big enough to swallow him whole. The fleshy passage glistened with copious amounts of saliva. Only now did the little lion see just how much Leslie had been drooling at the very idea of making a meal out of him. His fight grew more ferocious, but the tongue was brutal in its response. It simply rolled the cub towards the waiting maw, wrapping a second slobbery coil around him. Another squeeze left the cub gasping for air.

With no further resistance Leslie pulled her toy into her maw and hid him from the world. She fake-chewed on him, pushing him around with her tongue whilst pretending to the enraptured audience. They burst into applause when she opened her maw again to reveal Simba was just fine. As fine as a cub in his position could be at least. With her mouth closed and a struggling little lion inside the tapir looks at the ref. Both nod in agreement and a loud gulp echoes through the ring. The crowd is shocked silent. In a normal match Leslie would've been disqualified immediately, but for this halftime show she had special permission. She'd already beaten and claimed him, so for once she was allowed to do the eating of her opponent in the ring. The vulture ref considered in her reward for saving his ass with this last-minute halftime act.

When the tapir opened her big maw again half the cub was already engulfed by her hungering gullet. A small gulp pulled him in a little further, quickly intensifying his struggles. Against the powerful throat of Leslie the little lion had no chance. Another gulp pulled him in up to his neck. A last plea for help gets overruled by a loud gulp and Simba is gone. Only Leslie can detect him, a pleasurable feeling traveling to her belly. She didn't know what she had done to earn an opponent as delightful as him. But she'd do whatever it takes to get another one. What happens next?
15533233121223.title: ...pulling him into her maw

155332332.content:
Simba was waiting in his corner of the arena, as smug as ever. Timon and Pumba were cheering him on from the sidelines. As Simba waited for his opponent, he heard a booming crashing sound from far away. Simba tried to focus on the source of the sound. He realized that they belonged to a giant toad. It was easily the size of a hippo! With a single hop, he landed in the ring, and Simba felt the ground shake.

The giant toad stared down at Simba, licking his lips.

"It's such a shame I can't eat you outright," he said in a deep voice. Simba nervously gulped at his threat.
155332332.title: Cameroon

choices: He hits Simba with the tongue.
Simba dodges, he hits a small crowd member.
1553323321.content:
"Let's give you a little teaser of what'll happen after the match." Cameroon croaked. He shot out his tongue towards the cub. The smooth surface glistened with drool and the girth of it matched Simba's whole body. The cub narrowly managed to dodge the flying tongue, feeling it brush against the tuft of his tail. It didn't have any brakes and shot right into the crowd, hitting a hippo in the gut.

"Outside interference! Please don't lick the audience!" The ref said with a stern tone, stifling a giggle at the ridiculousness of what he just said.

The toad grunted. He didn't like to work for his food. He eyed up the little lion, who was now certainly going to stay light on his feet. Simba for his part saw a glimmer of hope in this otherwise onesided battle. If he could keep dodging that tongue and make Cameroon hit the crowd, the toad would get disqualified. It was a more sensible approach then anything else he could come up with. Trying to fight up close and personal just sounded like a one-way ticket into that huge maw. But up close and personal was exactly what the toad was aiming for. He leapt high into the sky. Simba's eyes widened with dread. Would he be able to dodge that? With great force Cameroon came back down again... exactly where he was. The ground shook from the impact but the toad hadn't moved an inch. The cub however, stumbled from the earth-shaking landing. Cameroon seized his moment and shot out his tongue again.
1553323321.title: Cameroon flicked his tongue towards Simba

15533233211.content:
The shaking of the ground gave Simba a quick vertigo spell, but even he could identify what just slapped him. He felt a slick, sticky, fleshy tip stuck to his fur. His vision cleared up, and his fears were answered. The toad's tongue was stuck to his underbelly, and it seemed that Cameroon wanted to give the lion enough time to register what was coming up. All sound around them seemed to disappear as the realization hit Simba.

Cameroon, grinned, then quickly reeled his tongue back in. Simba was yanked off of the ground and towards the creature's maw. He screamed as he saw himself quickly approaching the gaping maw of his opponent. Almost as quickly as Cameroon started pulling, Simba disappeared into his mouth. The crowd was allowed a few moments to realize the lion was trapped in his grinning maw. Simba turned towards the outside, fear painted on his face, and tried to yank himself off of the tongue. Unfortunately, Cameroon quickly shut his lips, sealing the tiny lion in his relatively cavernous mouth.

Simba was alone in the creeps smelly mouth. He wasn't sure what feeling gripped him more: the fear of being so close to something's throat, or the disgust of the smell surrounding him. He wouldn't get much time to figure that out, because the tongue quickly wrapped around him and constricted him. Simba was squeezed in an iron-like grip, but all anyone outside would see is the triumphant grin on Cameroon's face.

After a bit of constriction, Cameroon flicked his tongue up and down, smacking Simba along the roof and floor of his mouth. With the shaking in tandem with the smell, Simba wasn't sure how long he'd be able to take this.
15533233211.title: He hits Simba with the tongue.

choices: Cameroon leaps up high to squash the cub.
Cameroon slowly waddles to the cub.
155332332112.content:
Cameroon smiled, feeling the cub get thrashed around in his cavernous maw. The excitement was making him feel all special inside. Or was it something else? His gut gurgled and bubbled, the toad felt a burp coming up. He prepared himself and shortly after the gurgling seized he belched.

BRRRRMMMMPHFFFF

His wide maw inflated like a balloon, but the toad had managed to keep all of his noxious belch in. Simba's eyes watered from the hot gas and his breath was shallow. This wouldn't do for Cameroon, who tightened his tongue. The fleshy coil holding the lion's body bore down on him with crushing force. The cub gasped at the sudden squeeze forcing his lungs empty. The toad then quickly loosened his grip. Simba reflexively took a deep breath, inhaling the pungent gas. He coughed and gagged at its foul potency. Again the coiling tongue squeezed the air out of him. Cameroon was controlling exactly when the cub was allowed to breathe. He kept this up for a few minutes until he felt certain the little lion had inhaled most of his horrid burp. A good thing, as his stomach was bubbling once again. This time no attempt was made to contain the foul burst of gas.

Cameroon's tongue felt Simba's struggles fade, but he wasn't quite done yet. He'd play some more before claiming him for his next meal. The tongue let go of Simba, letting him flop onto the base of the toad's maw. He pursed his lips a little and guided the cub out with his next belch. The little lion flew a few feet before landing in the dirt. He was slathered in toad saliva and weary from breathing the rancid air in Cameroon's maw. The toad himself leapt up high and landed in his corner. There he sat and waited for Simba to regain his wits. Shrugging off the horrifying experience of being pulled into his maw would take the little lion some time. But Cameroon could wait. He wanted to savour the moment.

The ref kept a close eye on the situation. The cub was a little careworn, but well able to keep fighting. After a few minutes of Simba trying to shake off the worst of the toad slobber Cameroon went for his next move. What does he do? He'd not shown him yet what it feels like to have a hippo-sized toad jump on top of him. Or maybe he should just waddle on over to the cub. Maybe belch in his face some more or gobble him up again without even using his tongue.
155332332112.title: Cameroon belches Simba out

choices: Cameroon smothers him until he's unconscious
Cameroon squashes him with another part of his body
Cameroon gets off of him to try something else
1553323321121.content:
Cameroon already showed off his incredible maw and powerful belches. However, he hasn't show Simba his powerful squashing ability. He wiggled on his hind legs, and leapt to the sky, Simba looking on in horror. His eyes followed, until he was looking straight up at the toad's looming gut. He realized his situation, and tried to struggle to his feet faster. Unfortunately, he was still too weak.

Before he could escape, the next thing he felt was several hundreds of pounds of toad squeeze him against the dirt. Any spectator would've seen the lion completely disappear under Cameroon's mass. There wasn't a single inch of him uncovered by the super-sized monster. Cameroon ginned a cruel grin and shuffled side to side, grinding the lion underneath him. He began to feel him try to wriggle free of the powerful body slam, but his every attempt was for naught.

Simba was trying the impossible. He tried to lift the hippo-sized animal off of him, and all it accomplished was tickling the toad, who giggled. Whether that was from the tickling or Simba's vain attempts at escape, the lion couldn't tell. All he knew was that the smelly toad had him completely pinned and subject to whatever torture Cameroon could think of.
1553323321121.title: Cameroon leaps up high to squash the cub.

choices: Cameroon wrapped his lips around him
Cameroon layed on top of Simba
1553323323.content:
The giant toad waddled towards Simba, who looked on wearily. He feared what the creature would do to him, he knew how toads were carnivorous after all. The lion knew that fighters weren't allowed to eat each other, but he wasn't sure he could trust this guy to keep his word. His fears only grew when he heard a grumble come from the toad's stomach. However, this grumble wasn't a grumble from hunger, but a grumble from gas. Cameroon leaned forward, grinning at Simba, before he began to part his lips.

BRRRRRRRAP

Cameroon let loose a loud and nasty belch upon Simba. The noise started to make his ears ring and the stench was absolutely horrid. He felt like he was sniffing one of Pumba's gaseous strikes. The force of his belch caused Simba to fly backwards against the vines. He was thrown forward, and stumbled onto his stomach, groaning from the stench.

"Smell that?" Cameroon said. "That's the stench of everyone's that gone into my stomach. And soon, you're gonna add to that, bud." Cameroon chuckled as Simba tried to regain his bearings.
1553323323.title: Cameroon belched

155332333.content:
- Yewande   -

A leopard that used to roam the savannas of east Africa with impunity, until poachers encroached onto her land and she was forced to flee into the rain forest to survive. She respects bravery above all else. If an opponent fights with courage in battle, she will treat them with respect, even if they lose -- however, if her opponent is weak and cowardly, she will humiliate them without mercy.
155332333.title: Something else

1553323331.content:
“This tournament is proud to debut our first lion, Simba, who claims to hail all the way from the Pride Rock…” the vulture reads off the announcements, with a complete lack of any enthusiasm in her voice. “Being in the big cat species bracket, he will be faced against our only currently available feline competitor, Yewande.” Simba’s heart sunk at the announcement. He was going to be fighting another big cat? Simba had expected to a face a prey animal -- a caribou, a zebra, something that lions like him were born to hunt.

The big cat’s eyes burned bright orange, staring at him silently and incredulously. Her massive, athletic body was lean and sylphlike, built for speed, her impressive muscles showing clearly along her slender form. At 4 feet tall from her paws to her withers, she stood at an incredible height compared to the little lion. To see the enormous, beautiful feline loom over him was both terrifying and enchanting in equal measures. As he looked up at her, his confidence began to waver.

“Hmm… our very first lion, gracing our little oasis with his presence. And so scrawny, too. Have something to prove?” Yewande teased with a smirk. For a female, her voice sounded deep, booming and mature, further illustrating that leopard was far advanced in years. She reminded Simba of the lionesses back at the Pridelands. The way she was built, the way she carried herself… she was obviously an experienced predator. He looks around for some way to back out, but the doors to the coliseum had closed behind him, and Timon and Pumba were nowhere to be seen. “You may be the king of the jungle, mtoto… but you’re not in the jungle anymore,” she giggled. “You’re in the coliseum now. Locked in here with me...”

“Now, this will be a clean fight. Which means no biting, clawing at the throat, gouging of the eyes, and definitely no tail-pulling,” the vulture loudly interrupted before Simba could respond. By now, they were both squaring off in the middle of the dusty field, and Yewande was so close he would feel her meaty breath on his face. Simba couldn’t even bear to look her in the eye. “When the competitors are ready… begin!” With a blow of a whistle, the leopard’s composure immediately changed. As the two competitors circled each other, she arched her back like a veteran predator, her eyes staring daggers at the small lion.

The two fighters were now sizing each other up, both posed to strike at any second. They sized each other up, not knowing exactly what the other was capable of. Simba felt his fur bristling for the first time in years. The tension was palpable.
1553323331.title: Fight this character

choices: She stuffed his head in her mouth
She planted a paw on his nose
She turned to sit on him
15533233312.content:
When Yewande finally decided to strike, the attack was even faster than Simba imagined. She was upon him before he could even blink, and all he could do is tense up in reflex, assuming the leopard would rip out his throat and it would be all over. But instead, the feline ducked down her head and headbutted the cub into the air!

The cub flailed comedically as he flew across the coliseum, and though he landed on his feet, as all cats do, the laughter of the audience was mortifying. Yewande reared back again, that same smug smirk on her face. His side still aching, Simba was starting to realize just how strong the leopard was compared to him. She could apparently throw him around like a ragdoll with ease. How could he possibly compete with her? This wasn’t a fair fight… but it didn’t seem like he could back out now.

“Come on. Aren’t you going to fight back?” Yewande taunted, beckoning him over to her side of the ring.

Simba tried to think rationally, but his fear overcame him. The match must be rigged -- he was powerless against her! If he tried to fight back, she would destroy him for sure. There had to be another way out, some way to escape the coliseum. With that thought, Simba turned tail and ran.

“You know I can outrun you,” Yewande laughed, watching with bemusement as the cub fled as far from her as possible, checking desperately along the walls of the coliseum for a way out. The audience’s laughter was deafening, now, knowing that Simba had just sealed his fate.

It wasn’t long until the lion found what he was looking for. A rope, draped over the side of the coliseum wall! He wanted to climb up the robe as fast as he could, and just keep running, fast as he could, deep into the jungle until he never had to lay eyes on this damned coliseum ever again. But just as he latched onto the rope, he felt teeth grab the scruff of his neck and drag him away.

“No!” he demanded, doing his best trying to sound intimidating as the leopard easily dragged him away from his only salvation. “L-let me go!”

The veteran hunter’s strength seemed awe-inspiring compared to the fragile little cub’s. Even when he struggled with all his strength, the leopard easily kept him in her grip. The feeling of powerlessness was inspiring some kind of primal fear within Simba. Eventually, she pinned him to the ground, leaving his forepaws free to bat at her.

“You’re stronger than you know, mtoto. After all, you have your father’s blood,” Yewande insisted. “Come on! Don’t be a coward! Hit me with all you've got!” Yewande held her head there, obviously offering the cub a chance to strike back and show his strength. However, instead, Simba reached up and bit deeply into her shoulder.

“AUGH!” Her roar echoed throughout the coliseum, causing even the audience to cringe in shock. In her pain, she dropped the cub, and Simba darted away.

“Hey! Biting is forbidden!” The announcer jumped up in surprise.

“It’s alright, Gamba. I’ve got this,” Yewande yelled, before turning to nurse her wound. He had bit her right through the muscle, and the hole in her shoulder was now bleeding profusely. It ached every single time she moved her forearm. “Ugh… I try to be nice, and this is how you react? You are really starting to piss me off.”

Simba began pulling himself up the rope again, desperate to climb out of the arena before the leopard could retaliate. It wasn’t until he was halfway up the wall that he noticed her leaping at him-- and by then, it was already too late.

Before he knew it, the massive leopard was pinning him to the ground. He whimpered as she leered over him, pondering what she would do next...
15533233312.title: Simba acted cowardly...

155332333121.content:
Living in the pride, Simba never thought too much about the morality of the lions devouring their own subjects. ‘The circle of life’, is how they justified it, and Simba was satisfied with this. The little lion never questioned the circle of life while he was on top of the food chain… but now, staring down the leopard’s dark, seemingly endless throat, Simba finally realized what it was like to be prey.

In her anger, Yewande had wrapped her maw easily around the cub’s head, pressing his snout against the back of her throat. He squeezed his eyes shut as his head was marinated in saliva, and his nostrils were assaulted by the stench of her meaty breath. The leopard pulled forward in predatory dedication, and the lion cub realized that there was no talking his way out of this one. The once-great prince had been reduced to prey in some backwoods colosseum, and there was nothing he could do about it. This was the end. He cringed, preparing for the leopard to bite into his neck and finish him off… but instead, she took one big gulp, and pulled his snout deeper into her throat. She was swallowing him!

The leopardess’ throat muscles clamped down on his snout, undulating rhythmically around him on both sides as they pulled him deeper and deeper inside of the righteous predator. Yewande closed her eyes, letting the lion’s body rest on her tongue as she savored his flavor. Meanwhile, Simba was struggling harder than ever, terrified by the fate that was about to befall him. There had been a few lionesses in his pride that took great joy in swallowing smaller animals whole, a habit which always disturbed the lion cub. What was going to happen to him? Was he going to suffocate? Be masticated by her powerful muscles? Or worse… digested alive?

In truth, Yewande had no intention of hurting the cub. But to have a prince be so weak and cowardly is disgraceful, so the little cub needed a harsh lesson indeed. Once the lion’s body was almost completely within her mouth, she lifted her head up, displaying her helpless prey to the crowd, who roared in applause. Apathetic to the fate of the cub, they were just happy to see the arrogant little prince get put in his place. After satisfying the crowd, Yewande began gulping Simba down in earnest, trying to cram the immobile lion down her throat before she choked. Simba’s strength drained, he could barely move a muscle as her powerful throat muscles clamped tightly around him, pulling him down into her belly with terrifying speed. As his entire upper body entered her throat, and the leopardess closed her lips around his hind paws, the only trace of his existence was an incredible bulge in the leopardess’ neck.

The crowd watched in rapt attention as the bulge slowly travelled down her neck, as the lion inside was sealed off from the outside world, damned to the dark, wet, smelly tomb of her stomach. Simba could hardly even think at this point; the lion simply focused on trying to breath, letting the leopardess have complete control over his fate. Yewande flashed the crowd a big, smug smile as the bulge in her throat disappears into her muscular body. Just as he thought he was about to run out of breath, Simba’s head was painfully squeezed into a different, slightly roomier sac.

Soon, the cub was curled up inside the much larger leopardess’ belly, which expanded around him, giving him a bit of room to wriggle around. It smelled awful in here, and he was made dizzy by the moisture and head, feeling like her belly was a tiny, cramped sauna. A strange liquid filled the bottom third of her stomach, nipping at his fur slightly. Idly, he thinks to himself that he should be freaking out right now, but at this point he was too exhausted and light-headed to even care. This was just his fate now. It was far too late to do anything about it. All he wanted to do was lay back and let the warmth of the leopardess’ swinging belly swaddle him to sleep…

Meanwhile, the leopardess was showing off her bulging belly to the cheering crowd while Pumba and Timon looked on in horror. The lion cub was so small, the leopardess just looked moderately pregnant; still, her belly swayed back and forth enough while she walked to satisfy the crowd. “Delicious!” Yewande finally judged, giving the audience a perfect view of her stomach as it bulges and undulates.

“I think we have our winner!” The announcer said, satisfied with the outcome. Yewande strutted confidently off the colosseum grounds.

Later, backstage, as Yewande was wrapping at and getting ready to return home, Timon and Pumba appealed to the leopardess to release Simba unharmed. He is a prince, after all -- too valuable to be digested, they claim. “I shall not hurt him,” Yewande replied, stoically, not bothering to even look in their direction. “But I’m not giving him back, either. Not until I’m done with him.”

When pressed for an explanation, she turned to them angrily. “He’s an heir to the throne, is he not? And yet, it’s obvious you haven’t been properly training him,” Yewande judged them harshly. “Weak, cowardly, selfish. You’ve spoiled him. He must be taught what it takes to be a king.”

Realizing it was futile, the two of them gave up and fleed, lest they be devoured themselves.

---

To his surprise, Simba woke up.

He never thought he’d wake up again. Never on the outside world, at least. He looked at himself to make sure he was still there, and found no evidence of his stint in the leopardess’ belly. His fur was pristine, he smelled freshly bathed, he felt well-rested; for a moment, Simba thinks the events at the colosseum had just been some terrible dream… until he realized that his surroundings were entirely unfamiliar.

He was in some kind of overgrown cave, deep in the jungle. It looked like somebody’s den. Simba searched all over, but Timon and Pumba were nowhere to be seen. He was alone here. What happened, he wondered?

He flinched when he heard a heavy paw colliding with the cave’s floor. He reared back in horror as he saw Yewande, the massive leopardess, standing before him once again. She looked like she had been out to collect grub and berries, and ignored the cub as she put her findings away. Eventually, Simba worked up the courage to say something. “W-why am I here?” he asked, in as brave a voice as he could muster.

Yewande was silent for a few moments, before responding. “Are you unfamiliar with the colosseum’s rules?” she replied. “I won, so now I get to do anything I want with you.”

Simba continued, more confidently, “What are you going to do to me?”

“Train you,” Yewande responded simply. Simba stared at her for a while, confused. “As the prince of the pride, you’ve been pampered. You don’t understand the plight of your own subjects. If you ever want to reign, you must learn what it’s like to struggle to survive.” Yewande walked up to him, sitting down in front of him in the cave. “With dedication, you will become stronger, faster, braver,” the leopardess explained, while “Eventually, you and I will have a rematch in the colosseum. If you win this time, you’ll be free to go. If I win again, though...” Yewande chose not to finish that sentence, though Simba could assume she wouldn’t have mercy on him next time…

“I’m a lion. I don’t need any training,” Simba insisted, a little offended by the notion.

“Oh? Care to prove it, then?” Yewande asked, looming over him and licking her lips. Simba cowered away. “Thought so. We’ll start training after breakfast.”

The two of them sat and ate grubs for a while, in completely silence. Simba glanced at Yewande, trying to understand her intentions, but her expression was unreadable. She was just… stoic. As if this happens everyday. Simba didn’t know whether to be outraged by all this, or terrified. Clearly, his status as a lion won’t carry him very far here. He just had to bide his time until he could escape this crazy old hag…

Today, Yewande would be training Simba’s...
155332333121.title: Voracious Mentor

choices: Simba was stubborn, and Yewande made the punishment worse
Simba relented, and Yewande had mercy on him
1553323331211.content:
The strength training was a lot harder than the lion expected. Simba’s just been eating bugs and lounging around with Timon and Pumba for the past months, so he’s gotten pretty out of shape. Thus, even Yewande’s simple instruction -- climbing a small saugage tree -- proved almost impossible for the lion. Simba felt humiliated as he fell off again and again, unable to support his own weight. Within only a few minutes, the lion was too exhausted to continue, slumping to the ground. “Pathetic,” Yewande rolled her eyes, seeing the lion cub giving up so easily. Already angry, the insult made Simba’s temperature reach the boiling point, and he quickly lost his temper.

“Your… stupid regimen isn’t working, lady!” Simba stood up and yelled, finally laying down the law (or so he thought).

“Is that so?” Yewande smirked, amused by Simba’s frustration. “Let’s try something else, then.” Simba rolled her eyes, waiting to see what new, stupid ‘exercise’ routine Yewande came up with… only to be stunned when he looked back to see the leopardess’ huge rear descending upon him!

Yewande didn’t even sit down on Simba with her full weight, but it was still enough to press the lion painfully against the ground. Simba’s face was pressed uncomfortably against the dirt as her large, plush rump pressed against his back.Eventually, Simba lifted her up enough to issue a complaint. “What the hell...” He managed to yell, his frustration and exhaustion evident in his voice. For the boastful prince, being used as a glorified chair was even more humiliating than being swallowed whole had been. “G… get off me!”

Yewande giggled. The little lion was so small, only his tail and snout managed to avoid being covered by her rear end. He clearly wasn’t in the position to be making demands. “Just stand up and push me off,” Yewande instructed. “I’m only sixty pounds. You are a lion, aren’t you? Aren’t you supposed to be strong?”

Seeing that he wasn’t going to be able to talk his way out of this one, Simba relented, pressing his paws firmly against the ground and pushing upwards with all his strength. Even though the leopardess’ rump was almost big enough to cover his entire body, his innate strength as a lion did allow him to raise her to raise up a little bit. “Urgh…” he groaned, putting more effort into this than he had put into anything for the past couple years. Yewande raised a brow, a little big impressed by the tiny feline’s power. Perhaps he really was stronger than she thought he was. Of course, Yewande was going just easy on him right now…

Just as Simba was about to escape from under her rump, Yewande finally sat down with her full weight. Simba was smashed against the ground yet again, the leopardess’ rear pressing down on him almost harder than he could stand. “Agh!” he screamed, agonized, as the leopardess so easily overpowered him. Luckily, her rump was surprisingly plump and soft for such a muscular leopardess, which made the experience at least bearable, if no less humiliating.

“Whoops!” Yewande giggled, shifting back and forth on her ‘seat’. “Sorry! Just getting comfortable…” Simba futilely tried to push her upwards once again, just to get some room to breathe; unfortunately for him, this time, she wasn’t going to allow it. “Is that all you’ve got?” Yewande laughed, entertained by the futile squirming of the lion under her rear. “You can’t even budge me an inch. What a weak king you’d be! If somebody wanted to steal your throne, all they’d have to do is sit on you!” She cackled wildly at the thought. “Careful down there. Don’t break anything!”

Eventually, just as Simba was running low on air, Yewande decided to relent on this particular bit of “training”. She stood up, chuckling as the lion immediately started gasping down the fresh air. “Aww. Was that routine a little too advanced for you?” she said, as Simba rolled over onto his back, facing his captor. “Well, just admit that I know what I’m talking about, and we can get back to our scheduled training.”

Thinking over what had just happened to him, instead of becoming scared, Simba just got angrier. This leopard was toying with him. None of what she did made any sense. “You’re… crazy…” he said between breaths. “You don’t know… anything.”

Yewande was a bit taken aback. She never expected him to be THIS stubborn. “Hm. I keep trying to extend an olive branch, little lion, but your pride overcomes your common sense,” she shrugged. “Oh well! Nothing a good humbling can’t fix.” Simba looks on, horrified, as she brings her full weight down upon him again; this time vertically, so his body was partially submerged between her soft cheeks. Now he was wracked with not only pain, but also tortured by the smell, as his snout was lodged in the leopardess’ crack.

His struggles before were nothing compared to his desperate struggles now. Yewande was normally pretty clean and refined, but with his nose just a hair’s breadth away from her tail hole, the smell was about as foul as you’d expect. Even living with Pumba, Simba had never experienced something that so disgusted him. However, this time, Yewande wasn’t playing around; this was a punishment, not a test. Thus, Simba would be under there for quite a long time…
1553323331211.title: Strength Training

1553323332.content: Scentra the skunk a larger than normal skunk who leads a sisterhood of skunks and loves to mess with creatures smaller and weaker than her. Her most noticeable asset is her large tail, behind, and her smell
1553323332.title: Other

choices: Scentra turned her backside towards him
15533233321.content:
Simba waited for his opponent to show up. However, his boredom was replaced by disgust as a horrid stench wafted about the arena. He covered up his nose, as did a lot of the crowd. Simba then watched as several skunks suddenly invaded the onlookers, each wearing a grin as if they were about to watch some slapstick comedy. Then, he heard something bigger march towards the arena. He looked ahead.

Suddenly, a mess of black and white fur leapt over the upper vines and into the arena. The skunks cheered as the infamous Scentra leapt in. She looked around 3 times the size of the skunks around her, and boasted a giant tail and butt. She wore a grin similar to the skunks surrounding her.

"Is this shrimp my opponent today?" Scentra said. She shrugged, keeping up her expression, and began to march to the middle of the ring. Simba, cautiously, approached, hoping to handle her. The vulture, from afar, told them both to begin.

Known for using the opponent's sexual desires as a weapon, he manipulates his stronger adversaries into complete submission, but when he's facing a weaker prey, he dominates them with both pain and pleasure, using bearhugs and crotch grabs as his favorite tools.
He's also known to fuck his opponent once he defeats them, and depending on how the enemy trats him, can make it a pleasant experience, or downright one-sided.

choices: Simba tries to land a sneak attack

Simba was downright scared, he couldn't believe his uncle was fighting against him in the ring. As he begins to Pace around the ring, the cub couldn't help but to look at his large package as well as his muscular rear... despite being an old lion, he is quite a looker.

Scar then gets up into Simba's face and taunts him:

After the bell rings...

Simba makes the first move!
Running full speed into scar, he hopes to push him down for a mounted assault, but instead runs head-first into scars powerful abs.
'Oh my, I didn't know you missed your dear old uncle that much. Very well then, come here. Let uncle scar...'
1553323332212.title: Old, but not out
